homehomehot topicscurrent affairsworld newsbusiness & # 38 ; financeindustry sectorstechnology ( 14 new ) sciencesport ( 8 new ) lifestyleentertainment & # 38 ; artsworld newsworld newseuropenorth americalatin americacaribbeanasiaafricamiddle eastsouth pacificcaribbeancaribbeanbahamasbarbadoscubadominican republichaitijamaicapuerto ricocubafidel castrosport pcs.production.1.20130822.1311 ( pewsuwvmwapp02 ) nouvelles de presse canadienne – nouvelles canada de la presse canadienne | pc sources de nouvellescarte de couverture des nouvellessondagehistoirenos gens et nos valeurs journalistiquespartenariatsallocutions et visites des salles de rédactioncarri & # 232 ; resdiversitépostuler pour des débouchés d ’ emploistructure de l ’ entreprise l 'agence de presse indépendante du canada , responsable de tenir les canadiens informés.la presse canadienne est l 'agence de presse et d 'information multimédia au canada .
la presse canadienne tient les canadiens au courant de l 'actualité canadienne depuis près d 'un siècle ( voir l 'histoire de la presse canadienne ) .plus de 250 journalistes de la presse canadienne produisent des nouvelles primées , des photos , des graphiques , de l 'audio et de la vidéo ( voir nos gens ) .
la transmission de ses nouvelles primées , photos , graphiques , audio et vidéo rejoint en temps réel , jour et nuit , plus de 600 journaux , et stations de radio et de télévision .
tous se fient aux reportages de la presse canadienne dans la préparation de leur mise en page , leur mise en onde ou de la mise en ligne de leur site ( voir qui nous desservons ) .de plus , les gouvernements , les entreprises , les éditeurs , et les associations sont abonnés aux services hors pair d 'information et de nouvelles de la presse canadienne pour la transmission de contenu de qualité à des milliers de sites web , magazines , écrans d 'ascenseurs et dispositifs sans fil .
pour les professionnels des communications et des relations publiques , la presse canadienne offre une suite complète de livraison de pubs , de distribution de photos et de surveillance des nouvelles ( voir nos produits et services ) .la presse canadienne est la source de nouvelles numéro 1 au canada , livrant des reportages complets , exacts , impartiaux et équilibrés en provenance du canada et d 'à travers le monde ( voir processus de ceuillette et d 'échange de nouvelles et nos valeurs journalistiques ) .relier les canadiens entre eux et avec le mondeles canadiens reconnaissent facilement le logo de la ( pc ) en tête d 'innombrables articles de journaux et sur les photos illustrant l 'actualité canadienne . toutefois , plusieurs seraient surpris d 'apprendre qu 'une grande partie du contenu multimédia qui se retrouve sur internet provient aussi de la presse canadienne.la couverture de la presse canadienne s 'étend aux quatre coins du globe .
la majorité des nouvelles internationales proviennent de l 'associated press , la plus grande agence de presse au monde dont la presse canadienne est le distributeur exclusif au canada .
le pupitre international de la presse canadienne épluche à toutes les heures du jour un nombre considérable de nouvelles à travers le monde à la recherche de nouvelles d 'intérêt pour le canada .
la presse canadienne assure la couverture des grands événements internationaux et des nouvelles à incidence canadienne grâce à un réseau de pigistes et à ses reporters basés à londres et washington , qui se déplacent à travers le monde.c 'est ce qui permet de produire des reportages inégalés pour leur profondeur , leur envergure , leur à-propos et leur diversité . l 'importance du rôle de la presse canadienne en tant que seule agence de presse nationale au canada extrait du rapport du sénat de juin 2006 sur les médias canadiensles agences de presse facilitent la couverture d 'un pays aussi vaste que le canada , dont une bonne partie du territoire est peu peuplée.le comité estime qu 'une des façons de favoriser la diversité dans les sources de nouvelles consiste à voir à ce que le canada dispose d 'agences de presse rentables et efficaces , car elles permettent d 'offrir aux lecteurs des journaux locaux de toute taille des informations provenant des autres journaux membres des quatre coins du pays .
même les grands quotidiens comme le toronto star et le globe and mail ont dit au comité qu 'ils ne pouvaient pas à eux seuls couvrir toute l 'actualité.par exemple , la presse canadienne possède son propre réseau de journalistes , de photographes et de bureaux d 'un océan à l 'autre .
la presse canadienne étant structurée en coopérative , elle profite de la mise en commun des nouvelles et des photographies de ses membres .
ce réseau pancanadien d 'organes de presse fournit à tous ses membres des nouvelles de sources variées et , contrairement aux autres , il le fait dans les deux langues officielles .
la presse canadienne a par ailleurs beaucoup investi pour être présente aussi sur internet.voir le rapport intégral du sénat à www.parl.gc.ca law service " .

ash wednesday , the day to be unabashedly catholic , is february 13 .
it ’ s the day when a smudge on the forehead , for those who understand it , means i ’ ll try to be better .
i ’ ll do what lent asks : more prayer , more sacrifice , more almsgiving .
those who administer ashes on another ’ s brow can use either a formula emphasizing hope : & ldquo ; turn away from sin and be faithful to the gospel & rdquo ; or one of stark reality : & ldquo ; remember , you are dust and to dust you will return . & rdquo ; the sacramentals feed that emotional side .
ash wednesday does so especially .
we can feel a little funny with ashes on our foreheads , but for catholics , that ’ s how we mark the start of lent .
ashes don ’ t say we ’ re holy .
they say we ’ re sinners .
they don ’ t say we ’ re perfect , only that we ’ re willing to try .
they don ’ t say we ’ re models of religiosity , but they do say we belong .
in today ’ s world of loners and isolates , that says a lot. expérimentée et à leurs plateformes importing personal & commercial items to thailand if importing into thailand we can assist you for all clearances of your shipment .

en tant que seule agence de presse nationale du canada depuis 1917 , la presse canadienne est la source d 'information sur laquelle comptent plus de 600 journaux quotidiens et stations de radio / télévision pour ses reportages d 'actualité diffusés sur le fil de presse de la presse canadienne .
en tant qu 'éditeur , vous pouvez aussi avoir accès au fil de presse de la presse canadienne par notre service internet nouvelles sur commande et avoir la possibilité de : recevoir automatiquement par courriel des alertes au sujet des nouvelles intéressant vos lecteurs .
faire des recherches dans l 'ensemble du fil des nouvelles canadiennes , du fil des nouvelles économiques et dans plus de 30 catégories / sujets en français et en anglais .
réutiliser de récentes dépêches en entier ou comme copie bouche-trou .
avoir accès à deux ans d 'archives de nouvelles canadiennes pour les besoins de recherche .
nos clients du secteur de la publication estiment qu 'il est commode et peu coûteux de s 'en remettre au fil de presse de la presse canadienne parce qu 'ils peuvent ainsi demander à leur personnel de rédaction de se concentrer sur des exclusivités et des documentaires .
pour plus d 'information sur la republication des nouvelles du fil de presse de la presse canadienne , communiquez avec nous aujourd 'hui .
inscrivez-vous maintenant pour un essai gratuit en soumettant un formulaire en ligne .
il vous faut une concession de licence pour des photos intéressantes ?
la presse canadienne offre l 'accès en ligne pour la recherche , le visionnement et le téléchargement de photos d 'actualité et documentaires qui ajoutent un impact visuel aux reportages des magazines .
il vous faut du contenu frais pour votre publication en ligne ?
la presse canadienne vous facilite la tâche pour afficher des nouvelles quotidiennes mises à jour sur votre site web afin de tenir votre audience informée .

artinternational i̇stanbul 16 eylülde başlayacak15 : 02 - kuzey irakta seçim gerilimi14 : 58 - bankacılık sektörü son derece sağlam14 : 23 - yeni yatırım fırsatı : hayvan hastanesi14 : 09 - darphanede grev sona erdibankacılık sektörü son derece sağlam13 eylül 2013 cuma 14 : 58son güncelleme : 15 : 01başbakan yardımcısı babacan , türkiye 'nin bankacılık sektörünün son derece sağlam olduğunu , düzenleme ve denetleme konusunda muhafazakar davrandıkları için başarılı olduklarını belirtti.dali̇an - dünya ekonomi forumu 'nun ( wef ) çin 'de yapılan toplantılarına katılmak üzere dalian 'a gelen ve forumun son gününde " küresel ekonomiye asya 'dan bakış " oturumuna katılan başbakan yardımcısı ali babacan , dünyada ekonomik toparlanmanın ne kadar kalıcı olup olmadığının yanı sıra gelişmekte olan ülkelerdeki ekonomik büyümenin ele alındığı oturumda , küresel ekonominin yeni bir döneme girdiğini anlattı.avrupa ekonomisinin yavaş yavaş toparlanma işaretleri verdiğini , fed 'in açıklamalarıyla ortaya çıkan sermaye kaçışında , ülkeleri tek bir kriter değil spesifik olarak değerlendirmek gerektiğine dikkati çeken babacan , sadece büyüme odaklı hareket etmek değil , istihdam yaratan büyümenin önemine vurgu yaptı.moderatörün çin bankacılık sistemi ve son dönemde yaşanan gölge bankacılık sorunlarını hatırlatarak , " bu anlamda çin bankacılık sisteminin türkiye 'den alacağı dersler olduğunu " söylemesi üzerine babacan , türkiye ile çin arasındaki durumun farklı olduğunu ancak türk ekonomisinin iki güçlü unsurunun " güçlü bankacılık ve mali disiplin " olduğunu vurguladı .
türkiye 'de 2001'de yaşanan krizin ardından son 10 yılda yakalanan ekonomik başarının sorulması üzerine babacan , " 2001'deki bankacılık krizinde türkiye gsyh 'nın üçte birini kaybetti " dedi.2004'ten sonra birçok reform yaptıklarını , bankacılık ve kredi sistemlerinde yeni düzenlemelere gidildiğini anımsatan babacan , " türkiye 'de bankacılık sektörü son derece sağlam ...
düzenleme ve denetleme konusunda muhafazakar davrandık , başarılı olduk " diye konuştu .
babacan , türkiye 'nin bütçe açığının düşük , borç sürdürülebilirlik oranının ise çok yüksek olduğunu belirtti.90 ülkeden 1.500 katılımcının biraraya geldiği etkinlik sona ererken , başbakan yardımcısı babacan 'ın bugün ülkeden ayrılması bekleniyor .

he noted that many craft brewers started out brewing at home .
“ rather than see it as threat , ( craft brewers ) see it as a way for folks who are really serious to leave the hobby realm and move over to the professional realm , " he said .
koch ’ s advice to state lawmakers is to give home brewers the benefit of the doubt while putting reasonable safeguards in place : “ home brewers have an enormous amount of respect for the dignity of beer , so cut them a little slack , ” he said .

parish information ( select the first letter of the city in which the parish is located . ) abcdefghiklmnoprstvw kniha gorily v podsvetí od g. murína vyjde na portáli webmagazin.sk - novinky - tasr.sk kniha gorily v podsvetí od g. murína vyjde na portáli webmagazin.sk kniha gorily v podsvetí prináša rozšírenú a aktualizovanú históriu slovenského podsvetia od primitívneho výpalníctva až po najväčšiu korupčnú kauzu gorila .
foto : webmagazin.skbratislava 23. novembra 2012 ( tasr ) - portál o životnom štýle webmagazin.sk začal dnes uverejňovať na pokračovanie knihu gorily v podsvetí od spisovateľa a publicistu gustáva murína .
nové kapitoly si čitatelia budú môcť prečítať vždy v piatok , v pondelok a v stredu od 13 : 00 .
kniha gorily v podsvetí prináša rozšírenú a aktualizovanú históriu slovenského podsvetia od primitívneho výpalníctva až po najväčšiu korupčnú kauzu gorila .
popisuje koniec veľkých mafiánskych bossov a nástup mafie v bielych rukavičkách .
približuje štvrťstoročie lúpežného ťaženia po slovensku so samopalom v jednej a zlatou kreditnou kartou v druhej ruke .
gustáv murín je spisovateľ a publicista , ktorý doteraz vydal 27 kníh - román , novelu , zbierky poviedok a esejí , zbierku článkov o kultúre a médiách , vedecko-popularizačnú štúdiu o biológii , dlhovekosti , manželstve , encyklopédie a zbierky cestovných príbehov .
na svoje knižné konto si pripísal aj štyri štúdie o podsvetí na slovensku v 90-tych rokoch .
jednu z nich s názvom gorily v podsvetí prinesie portál webmagazin.sk.
webmagazin.sk odštartoval v septembri 2012 .
počas prvého mesiaca ho navštívilo viac ako 50 000 unikátnych návštevníkov .
tlačová agentúra slovenskej republiky ( tasr ) je lídrom na slovenskom agentúrnom trhu .
mesačne odvysiela cca 14 000 textových správ , viac ako 1200 zvukov , 600 videí a desaťtisíce fotografií .
okrem toho je prevádzkovateľom spravodajského portálu teraz.sk a webmagazin.sk a skolskyservis.sk.

" mourinho ile i̇nter 'de çalışmadan önce birbirimizi kişisel olarak tanımıyorduk ve bu nedenle ilişkimiz biraz gergindi " diyen eto 'o , " sanırım bir seferinde , jose 'nin teknik direktör olduğu takımda asla oynamayacağıma dair yemin bile etmiştim " dedi.mourinho 'ya ilişkin yargısının onu tanıyınca değiştiğini vurgulayan kamerunlu golcü , " allah her şeyin en iyisini bilir ve bana yanıldığımı gösterdi .
bugün jose ile arkadaşız ve o benim yeniden teknik direktörüm oldu " şeklinde konuştu.mourinho ile chelsea 'de tekrar çalışmaktan duyduğu memnuniyeti belirten eto 'o , " onun takımında yer almak gerçek bir zevk .
dışarıda olduğu kadar sahada da iyi ve gerçekten çok ender rastlanan kalitede bir teknik adam " yorumunda bulundu .

this provision of the ppa expired at the end of 2007 .
this new legislation allows the owner of a traditional or roth ira , who is 70 ½ years of age or older , to make a direct distribution from the ira to a public charity .
the distribution , provided it is made directly to the charity , will not be included in the donor ’ s taxable income and it will count toward the donor ’ s mandatory withdrawal requirements .
using a distribution from your ira may be an excellent way for you to make a payment on your from age to age pledge , to add to one of the endowments of the foundation for the diocese of helena , or to make an end-of-year gift to your parish .
call bernie hewitt , glenda seipp or beth yeakel at 1-800-584-8914 if you would like more information .

information sur le secours d ’ urgence pour les salles de rédaction êtes-vous un journal sociétaire de la presse canadienne ou un client de le fil radio incapable d ’ avoir accès à nos fils de presse ?
nous vous conseillons d ’ appeler d ’ abord notre service d ’ aide pour qu ’ un de nos techniciens d ’ expérience puisse régler votre problème particulier ou le référer au superviseur concerné .
comme deuxième étape , vous êtes prié de suivre les directives de secours d ’ urgence ci-dessous pour avoir accès à nos fils par internet en cas de problèmes de transmission satellite ou de logiciel dans la salle de rédaction .
inscrivez vos nom d ’ utilisateur et mot de passe .
s ’ il vous faut un nom d ’ utilisateur et un mot de passe , communiquez avec le service d ’ aide technique au 514-985-7210 ou 416-507-2099 . la première page affiche les manchettes des plus récentes dépêches transmises sur les fils .
cliquez sur le lien “ catégories de nouvelles ” dans le menu bleu à gauche pour voir les dépêches par sujet .
note : ce service est protégé par les exclusions dans les marchés concurrentiels .
les sociétaires doivent continuer à transmettre leurs nouvelles à la presse canadienne comme à l 'habitude .
inscrivez vos nom d ’ utilisateur et mot de passe .
s ’ il vous faut un nom d ’ utilisateur et un mot de passe , communiquez avec la presse canadienne à 1-866-599-0599 ou archives @ cpimages.com.
appuyez sur le bouton go .
les photos apparaîtront de la plus récente à la plus ancienne .
vous pouvez cliquer pour la page suivante à l ’ aide des flèches gauche et droite dans le menu à gauche .
note : il n 'y a pas de frais pour les téléchargements de photos en deçà de sept jours .

see faqspattaya condo investment scam leaves investors broke in pattaya single minded tourists and ex pat haven boasting some 1600 bars .
it is situated on a 4 km stretch of road along the sea & along the north end are around 96 formally a us military rest stop and recreation from the 60s and 70s it saw a even the nice looking painted artist impression above , one cannot resist the temptation to get in first and buy a condo right on the pattaya beach .
great stories etc .
well it seems theres no condo complex called the royal view talay condominium and the beach remains the same .
did ian turn to embezzling investors ? ?
he owned air king but all these companies have folded we understand and ian is back again enjoying the free money or should we say everyone elses money .
why he did it---well business in thailand is hard and many foreigners who have tried to make it don 't and his pattaya info paper was no match to peter mulhotras pattaya mail or even neils pattaya people .
with no money they trun to the easy way---get it off gullible foreigners who are dumb enough to not check on what they spend in thailand .
as at 2013 is he involved in the www.pattayainfo.com & is he really back in business in pattaya ? ? we know he is in new condo developments .
1 / .
never buy off a plan .
an artists impression is just that ? its not even built .
it does not have sufficient cash to complete without foreigner funds ? no penalty clauses in favour of the buyer if its not finished & no refund 2 / .
is the land really owned by the company--check chanote [ title ] .as those who invested with one richard haughton of harlequin in pattaya --thailand property and media exhibition company ltd . , found out their titles were sold to kasikornbank by haughton to borrow off & they now have no condos nor comeback ? 6 / .
if you give a deposit don 't expect anything back .
do not use paypal , ask for a contract first then get it checked out but please don 't buy off a plan--more and more condos fails as they do not have the cash flow to even start let alopne finish .
pattaya mail that great mag of peter " the indian media mogul " - moulhotra has had his work cut out over the years with the many mags that have circulated in pattaya , but has stood his ground and is still here .
peter is a businessman and a nice guy that knows pattaya inside out and has survived the competition from all sectors . ( which is also regularly available all over thailand & he has also a chiangmai mail ) .
peter being a success as he is has weathered every storm and watches the rest slowly retreat as its not easy publishing in thailand even with the likes of the famous drew noyes the american conman whose pattaya times has shrunk to low lows due to his many foreigner ripoff exploits as portrayed by andrew drummond--the reknown uk crimes & scam reporter .
in fact pattaya mail is the most successful paper to read in pattaya as at 2013 .
ian on the other hand always said his publication pattaya info was multi-language to appeal to many nationalities , and is more of a guide to things thai , with helpful hints , and local news but in fact did not have substance and how he made money beats us hence his turn to being a bigtime property development investment sensation-- ? ? ? .
well , wouldn 't you if the chips are down , you can 't leave the goodlife as youre too old to get a job back in stateside and you read how property developers can get away with it ?
one also needs to boost the bank account to survive the pattaya off season storm and the added expenses like the work permit , visa , taxes living costs and company fees .
was ian up for tax for the magazine & did he have the funds to survive the pattaya highlife rush ? ? ? that he decided to try his hand at property development or was it some other hand telling him to do it .
richard ian silver did disappear with all the money : some say its 20m while others say its 120 m baht so who is right ? ? ? ? some say he 's just taken a vacation & is back in business behind the scenes as at 2013 ?
but why he did it only ian can answer as he 's not a bad sort of guy . not many of the investors have come forward but we would sure like to hear from you fellas so don 't be shy .
maybe ian will read this and feel sorry for you but of course its hard to face the music when one can hide behind a legit thai company--easy to do for the upsuspecting foreigner wanting to buy a condo thats not even built , then scratching his head on how to get his money back .
but we hear he is living the good life some place near the sea and conducting business as usual---yes you got it selling more soon to be started condos in bang saray & jomtien .
we will update you soon april 2013 .

lakip sa giingong mag-atubang sa kasong plunder mao sila si senador jinggoy estrada , bong revilla ug juan ponce enrile ingon man ang laing napulo ka mga tawo .
dunay nitambok ang bulsa sa pork barrel , duna say makalabuso sa pork barrel .
pero kinahanglan tingaling palapdan ang im ­ bestigasyon sa national bureau of investigation ug sa department of justice niining pork barrel scam .
asa na man diay kadtong giingon nga 28 ka mga kongresista ug mga senador nga apil sa pork barrel scam ?
morag giundangan man ang imbestigasyon kay dunay nahadlok nga tingalig maapil ang tanan .
mas mosamot ang kasuko sa katawhan kon pilion lang ang pasakaan og kaso mahitungod sa pag-abuso sa pork barrel .
gipahunong niadtong martes sa korte suprema pinaagi sa usa ka temporary restraining order ( tro ) ang pag-release sa nahibiling pork barrel o priority development assistance fund ( pdaf ) sa mga kongresista ug mga senador .
lakip na ang binilyon ka pesos nga presidential special funds ( psf ) ug ang malampaya fund nga pareho ra sab og pork barrel sa presidente , kay ubos sa balaod siya ra man ang makabuot unsaon kini sa paggasto .
apan angay nga paminawon kining kabalaka ni cebu gov. hilario davide iii nga ang mga kabus maoy mosamot kaalaut niingong tro nga giluwatan sa korte suprema sa pag-release sa pork barrel sa mga magbabalaod .
matod pa ni davide , niabot nag p20 milyunes gikan sa pork barrel sa mga magbabalaod ang gi-release ning tuiga sa department of budget and management ngadto sa vicente sotto memorial medical center alang sa bayranan sa mga pasyente .
kon wa nay pork barrel , mosaril na kanang propaganda sa usa ka produkto nga , “ bawal magkasakit . ”
tan-awa ra gud , tungod sa binuang sa ubang mga magbabalaod , naamong intawon ang mga kabus nga nakapahimus sa tabang gikan sa pork barrel niadtong mga magbabalaod nga nagbinuang sa ilang pork barrel .
pero nganong di na man lang gyud librehon ang tanan sa tambal ug hospitalization sa mga ospital sa gobyerno ?
kon mahitabo kini , kinsa pay mangitag pork barrel sa ilang mga kongresista ?
i. occupancy : no one is permitted to reside in a nycha apartment during the course of a tenancy unless he / she is : remained continuously in the apartment , meaning on all affidavits of income .
after a tenancy ends , a remaining family member ( rfm ) claimant may request an rfm grievance hearing if he / she is not granted a lease to the apartment .
the rfm grievance is a three step process as follows : in all steps of the grievance process , the rfm claimant has the burden to prove that he / she is eligible to succeed to the nycha lease .
no one may live in a nycha apartment unless he or she has authorization from nycha .
if an authorized household member leaves the apartment , the tenant is required to notify nycha in writing and submit verification .

billeting is a vital and often overlooked aspect of the ohl experience , the team said in a news release , and the success of a good match impacts the player , on and off the ice , long after his playing days in the ohl are done .

vaše pr správy v servise tasr a na portáloch tasr ponúkame vám možnosť uverejnenia vašich pr správ ( komerčné tlačové správy , stanoviská , oznámenia ) bez redakčných zásahov v spravodajskom servise tasr i v rámci koncových médií , ktorými sú portály tasr ( www.teraz.sk , www.webmagazin.sk , www.skolskyservis.sk ) .
správa vydaná v spravodajskom servise tasr sa dostane k abonentom tasr ( zo štátneho , komerčného i súkromného sektoru ) a objaví sa na stránke www.tasr.sk v sekcii ots .
správy uverejnené na portáloch tasr dopĺňame o dodanú fotografiu / obrázok / logo spoločnosti bez ďalšieho príplatku , v cene je taktiež možnosť umiestnenia aktívnych prelinkov v rámci textu , prípadne tiež videa prostredníctvom embed kódu .
správy uverejnené na spravodajskom portáli teraz.sk sú dostupné aj prostredníctvom rovnomennej aplikácie pre smarfóny s ios a android , klient má tiež možnosť zviditeľniť svoju pr správu na teraz.sk pomocou príplatkových pozícií .
návštevnosť portálu teraz.sk podľa oficiálneho auditu návštevnosti slovenských webov aimmonitor k dispozícii tu tasr si vyhradzuje právo odmietnuť zverejnenie pr správy odberateľa , ktorej obsah je v rozpore so všeobecne záväzným právnym predpisom , dobrými mravmi alebo etickými normami prípadne obsahuje vulgarizmy , nedodržiava zásady jazykovej kultúry , zasahuje do práv iných osôb alebo ktorá môže poškodiť dobré meno tasr alebo jej záujmy .
tasr je povinná túto skutočnosť oznámiť odberateľovi , avšak nie je povinná odmietnutie zdôvodňovať. meetings for 4 ½ years , do a lot of reading johnson said .

ito at para hindi na madagdagan ang mga bihag ng mnlf .
nasa 13,000 residente na ang umalis sa kanilang mga tahanan para iwasan ang gulo .
ang iba ay sa mga bangka na lang sumakay at nagpalutang-lutang para hindi mapahamak .
hirap na sila sa sitwasyon .
halos tumigil na ang buhay sa zamboanga city .
kanselado ang mga flight at apektado ang ekonomiya .
iyan ang mga bunga ng gulong ito .
nasa peligro pa ang 170 sibilyan na ginagamit na panang ­ ga ng mnlf .
limang araw na ang krisis na ito .
sari-saring impormasyon ang lumalabas mula sa zam-boanga .
may mga ulat na mga taga-suporta ni nur mi-suari , may mga ulat na wala raw basbas ni misuari ang kumander ng grupong ito na nasa zamboanga .
nahihirapan na ang mga residenteng lumikas .
tuloy pa rin ang putukan sa dalawang panig at 12 na ang kumpirmadong patay .
base sa kasaysayan , habang tumatagal ang isang standoff , nagiging desperado na ang isang panig .
sa sitwasyong ito , ang mnlf ang nalalagay sa ganyang posisyon .
kaya mahalaga na magkaroon na ng pag-uusap para matapos na ang krisis , lalo na ’ t may mga bihag ang rebelde .
napapaligiran na sila , kaya tila lumiit na ang kanilang mundo .
kung mga tauhan nga ni misuari , siya dapat ang kumausap sa kanyang kumander na sumuko na .
walang may gusto ng labanan , mapa-sundalo , rebelde at sibilyan .
nagtungo si president aquino sa zamboanga para pag-aralan ang sitwasyon at para makausap ang kanyang mga heneral .
dalangin ng lahat ay matapos nang mapayapa ang krisis .
hindi ito kailangan ng mindanao .
hindi ito kaila-ngan ng bansa .
masasayang ang lahat nang tagumpay ng bansa kung mababahiran na naman ng rebelyon .

this flows off the antarctic continent into the weddell sea at a rate of 2m per day , breaking off at the edge to form giant icebergs .
measurements are taken of the ice of antarctica beneath , of the air in the troposphere above , of the ozone in the stratosphere above that , and of the plasma in the geospace beyond them all .
no , that is not a typo .
literally is now formally defined as “ not literally . ”
how is it possible for a word to be defined as “ not itself ” ?
that is the same as defining table as “ not table ” or jumping as “ not jumping . ”
with this new definition , it is impossible for people to use this word without including an anecdote about which definition of the word is being used .
now , in daily language , it is impossible to decipher between “ literally ” and “ not literally . ”
a new word must be used to describe the opposite of “ figurative . ”
words such as “ actually ” and “ really ” may be used in place of “ literally ” , but how long until the definition of these words changes as well ?
since the prolonged misuse of a “ literally ” has led to a new definition , what is there to stop this from happening again ?
as well , all the people who have been misusing “ literally ” for years are now told they are grammatically correct .
what is the point in striving towards using words properly if misuses can become correct ?
how much integrity can the english language maintain if it is so easily influenced by how people misuse it ? anyhoo ... the linc volt is incredibly cool , and if the story calls attention to the fact that you can run around in a huge cruisy car without damaging the environment , then i 'm all for it .

this video was directed by mat whitecross in 2011 and was filmed in south africa and london get demi 's new single " heart attack " on itunes - http : / / smarturl.it / dlituness3 introducción al álgebra .
principios básicos del álgebra con ejemplos .
hecho por academiava ...
it allows the general formulation of arithmetical laws ( such as a + b = b + a for all a and b ) , and thus is the first step to a systematic exploration of the properties of the real number system .
identity elements : the numbers zero and one are abstracted to give the notion of an identity element for an operation .
zero is the identity element for addition and one is the identity element for multiplication .
for a general binary operator ∗ the identity element e must satisfy a ∗ e = a and e ∗ a = a .
this holds for addition as a + 0 = a and 0 + a = a and multiplication a × 1 = a and 1 × a = a .
not all set and operator combinations have an identity element ; for example , the positive natural numbers ( 1 , 2 , 3 , ... ) have no identity element for addition .
combining the above concepts gives one of the most important structures in mathematics : a group .
a group is a combination of a set s and a single binary operation ∗ , defined in any way you choose , but with the following properties : an identity element e exists , such that for every member a of s , e ∗ a and a ∗ e are both identical to a .
the operation is associative : if a , b and c are members of s , then ( a ∗ b ) ∗ c is identical to a ∗ ( b ∗ c ) .
if a group is also commutative — that is , for any two members a and b of s , a ∗ b is identical to b ∗ a — then the group is said to be abelian .
the integers under the multiplication operation , however , do not form a group .
this is because , in general , the multiplicative inverse of an integer is not an integer .
for example , 4 is an integer , but its multiplicative inverse is ¼ , which is not an integer .
distributivity generalises the distributive law for numbers , and specifies the order in which the operators should be applied , ( called the precedence ) .
for the integers ( a + b ) × c = a × c + b × c and c × ( a + b ) = c × a + c × b , and × is said to be distributive over + . ^ roshdi rashed ( november 2009 ) , al khwarizmi : the beginnings of algebra , saqi books , isbn & # 160 ; 0-86356-430-5 & # 160 ; ^ ( boyer 1991 , " the arabic hegemony " p .
229 ) " it is not certain just what the terms al-jabr and muqabalah mean , but the usual interpretation is similar to that implied in the translation above .
the word al-jabr presumably meant something like " restoration " or " completion " and seems to refer to the transposition of subtracted terms to the other side of an equation ; the word muqabalah is said to refer to " reduction " or " balancing " – that is , the cancellation of like terms on opposite sides of the equation . " ^ gandz and saloman ( 1936 ) , the sources of al-khwarizmi 's algebra , osiris i , p .
263 – 277 : " in a sense , khwarizmi is more entitled to be called " the father of algebra " than diophantus because khwarizmi is the first to teach algebra in an elementary form and for its own sake , diophantus is primarily concerned with the theory of numbers " .

after repeated visits , his family sought a way for najib to escape , and paid a smuggler to take him to the uk .

adică el e sănătos , în putere , da-i vai de capu ’ lui !
trebuie să tragă până cade în genunchi .
iarăşi se ridică , iar e pus la ham , iar i se încarcă în spinare pietre de moară .
în cazul de faţă pietrele de moară sunt factorii de decizie din minister .
unde , bineînţeles , cel mai „ greu ” este ministrul .
uneori chiar cel mai greu de cap .
n-am nimic personal cu remus pricopie .
da ’ mă enervează !
ce anume ?
totul .
parc-ar fi un tocilar la ora de sport .
învăţământului românesc îi trebuie vână , are nevoie de vitamine , pentru că în ciuda aparenţelor este suprasolicitat .
salarii de mizerie , logistică zero , harababură la manuale , degringoladă în programa şcolară , colac peste pupăză presa îi percheziţionează pe profesori şi face din şcolari vedete porno & # 8230 ; diferenţele de statut social în rândul elevilor şi între unii dintre ei şi profesori sunt atât de mari încât demoralizează .
toată povara asta este de multe ori zdrobitoare pentru întregul sistem .
nemaivorbind despre copiii care se pierd fiindcă persoana desemnată de un partid să reprezinte statul român în relaţia cu nişte oameni care vor şi trebuie să înveţe este abulică .
revin şi spun : învăţământul românesc are nevoie de autoritate şi clarviziune .
nu merge aşa , telelee-lee .
nu , într-adevăr , remus pricopie nu a greşit fundamental pentru că nu a făcut nimic .
vrea să introducă a doua limbă străină din clasa a treia .
foarte bine .
pe vremea lui ceauşescu eu am făcut spaniola din clasa a doua .
deci , care-i treaba ?
cică , trebuie să calculeze , mai durează vreun an-doi .
ce să calculezi ?
a , da , banii , că-ţi mai trebuie nişte profesori sau , eventual , celor care sunt deja trebuie să le plăteşti ore suplimentare .
aşa .
şi ? !
ce face toată liota aia de funcţionari din ministerul educaţiei naţionale ?
să le cumpere calculatoare de alea cu baterii solare , casio , 37 de lei unu , şi în şase zile de lucru , 6 & # 215 ; 8 = 48 de ore , fo cinci grăsani ajung la un rezultat .
chiar dacă transipraţi .
după aia cu cifra rezultată te duci în plic la colegul de partid – nu spui cine , persoană importantă & # 8211 ; şi vezi ce se întâmplă : se bagă a doua ( limbă străină ) dintr-a treia ori ba ?
lui remus pricopie îţi vine să-i plângi de milă când îl vezi în conferinţele de presă , dacă aş putea i-aş goni pe toţi ziariştii ăia din jurul lui .
e nevinovat .
cu clasa pregătitoare o bibileşte atâta de ţi se face şi ruşine că asişti .
lugu-lugu , de la grădiniţă la clasa întâi şi înapoi , avem loc în bancă sau nu ? , poate că reuşim să ne mai înghesuim niţel , remus pricopie e ca un adolescent care vrea să-şi sărute iubita , da ’ nu ştie cum .
fac o paranteză .
mie mi-a plăcut andrei marga şi este singurul ministru al învăţământului care a reuşit o reformă fundamentală & # 8211 ; a transformat bacalaureatul în ceea ce trebuie să fie , adică cel mai important examen din viaţa unui adolescent .
punct .
şi a relaxat regimul de selecţie , deci de stres , pentru copiii cu vârste mai mici .
încă o dată punct .
am închis paranteza .
despre reforma curiculară se poate vorbi mult şi în contradictoriu .
toţi miniştrii învăţământului au avut ambiţia de a-şi lăsa amprenta asupra acestui domeniu .
într-un fel este firesc să vrei să-ţi impui un anumit fel de a preda anumite cunoştinţe elevilor .
personal sunt adeptul sistemului care oferă posibilitatea de a alege dintr-o paletă cât mai largă de materii , prezentate generic , urmând ca specializarea , detaliile , să urmeze gradual .
ce face remus pricopie mi se pare greu de înţeles .
pedeliştii au sărit ca ţaţa anuţa din căruţă cu scandalul de la liceul dimitrie bolintineanu din timpul bacalaureatului .
bre , ce treabă are ministrul învăţământului cu şpăgile pe care le fac unii profesori pe la colţul blocului ?
nu , ministrul învăţământului are treabă cu felul în care un copil se formează ca om matur .
remus pricopie dixit că în unele ţări copiii merg la scoală de la trei-patru ani .
daaaa ? ? ?
ok , bine , dacă zici tu & # 8230 ; da ’ e vorba de şcoală sau de grădiniţă , că aşa am fi şi noi în rândul lumii bune .
domn ’ e , ia , atenţia încordată la maxim !
fac următoarea enumerare : cristian adomniţei , pixelul albastru şi remus pricopie .
întrebare : care este diferenţa dintre ei ?
răspuns corect : niciuna .
ăla , adomniţei , făcea pe şmecheru ’ în faţa prichindeilor care-l informau câte state sunt în ue .
lu ’ funeriu îi dicta , în direct , consiliera , ce să spună la conferinţa de presă .
norocu ’ lui că are auzul bun , că ar fi fost culmea să întrebe „ ceee ? ” , ca moşii .
remus pricopie vorbeşte cu „ decât ” în loc de „ doar ” .
stimaţi telespectatori & # 8230 ; deci nu ! , cum ar spune dan diaconescu .
nu ministrul învăţământului .
l-am înghiţit pe mircea geoană & # 8211 ; pentru că nu voia să fie decât preşedintele româniei & # 8211 ; dar nu ministrul învăţământului .
remus , lasă puţin treaba de la minister şi fii atent !
decât să merg pe jos mai bine iau autobuzul .
şi : au mai rămas doar doi elevi din cinci .
nu , au mai rămas „ decât ” doi elevi din cinci .
este , domn ’ ministru ?
este !
cu „ datorită ” şi „ din cauza ” , pot să vă ajut ?
remus pricopie este politician .
unui politician i se iartă totul „ a priori ” .
( despre independenţa şi suveranitatea româniei nu se poate vorbi decât între paranteze . )
dar un ministru al învăţământului trebuie să aibă ştaif intelectual .
vezi , ca exemplu de pesedist , pe alexandru athanasiu .
mai sunt şi alţii .
remus pricopie a făcut chimia .
ca şi & # 8230 ; da & # 8230 ; .da & # 8230 ; da & # 8230 ; da & # 8230 ; niel funeriu .
ăla i-a rupt cu bacu ’ , ăsta i-a trecut cu toptanu ’ .
un element de continuitate totuşi există .
camerele de supraveghere .
acum , mă întreb şi eu , ca un necioplit ce sunt .
ce s-ar fi întâmplat cu ele dacă , prin absurd , ar fi fost desfiinţate ?
le-ar fi vândut remus pricopie la second-hand ?
zic şi eu & # 8230 ; de exemplu , personal , aş fi organizat în fiecare clasă o licitaţie pentru cumpărarea camerei de luat vederi .
vă daţi seama , pe la vreun liceu de ăsta mai bengos , şmecherul clasei , care coboară în faţa porţii din limuzină , ce ar mai fi îngroşat conturile ministerului !
e trist & # 8230 ; e foarte trist .
nu suntem noi cea mai dezvolată pepinieră de inteligenţă , dar ca şi în india , şi aici există copiii excepţionali .
la care remus pricopie se uită neputincios , de opt luni .
nu mă refer doar la excepţii – pentru că , spunea nichita stănescu , un om care are ceva de spus în viaţă o va face până la urmă & # 8211 ; ci la mulţimea de elevi pentru care şcoala a devenit un fel de fortăreaţă inexpugnabilă .
n-are remus pricopie o baghetă magică .
dar parcă n-are nici energie , nici strategie , nici talent şi nici chef .
s-ar putea să greşesc eu din cauză că sunt sătul de chimişti la ministerul învăţământului .
dar este limpede cristal că remus pricopie vorbeşte cu „ decât ” în loc de „ doar ” .
e trist .
cred , sper ! , că sunt foarte mulţi şcolari pe care îi zgârie pe ureche felul în care vorbeşte ministrul învăţământului .
cu cele 40 de milioane de lei primite la rectificarea bugetară poate dă o mână de vopsea și montează niște geamuri prin școli , că altfel & # 8230 ; e trist !

cette section souligne les zones spécifiques de notre site web qui intéressent les quelque 100 journaux quotidiens et 500 stations de radio et de télévision qui comptent sur la presse canadienne et son service radio pour la distribution de nouvelles et d ’ information multimédia en temps réel depuis 1917 .

à qui dois-je m 'adresser à propos d 'une nouvelle de la presse canadienne a fun thing to do in -60 ° f cold weather is to throw a pot of boiling water into the air .
often , a solar halo is formed around the sun by the ice crystals in the air .
air of different temperatures refracts light in different ways .
mirages are commonly seen on the horizon in the winter or at the end of winter when the sea-ice has just broken up .
they are a result of temperature differences in the bottom few yards just above the ice or sea surface .
this is the same phenomena responsible for " heat haze " as seen above a road on a very hot day .
ice blink refers to a white glare seen on the underside of low clouds indicating the presence of ice which may be beyond the range of vision .
a corona is a ring of deflected light that surrounds the sun or moon , sometimes forming a colorful disk with the sun or moon at its center .
a fog bow is similar to a rainbow , but without any colors due to the very small size of the water droplets . -google home-advertising programmes-business solutions-privacy & terms-about google bienvenue chez marketwire .
votre partenaire fiable et novateur en diffusion de nouvelles et en communication .
tunisia + 4 others tunisie : près de 300 réfugiés à la dérive secourus en mer ( ong ) tunis , 18 août 2013 ( afp ) - près de 300 réfugies africains tentant une traversée vers l 'europe ont été secourus dans la nuit de samedi à dimanche au large de la tunisie par les autorités tunisiennes , a annoncé dimanche à l 'afp l 'association boats for people .
une première embarcation avec 240 personnes à bord a été secourue " après trois jours de mer au large des îles kerkennah ( sud de la tunisie , ndlr ) , où elle était échouée sur un banc de sable " , a déclaré nicanor haon , un responsable de l 'ong .

none of it may be reproduced in any form whatsoever without the express permission of agence france-presse .
tunisia + 2 others la délégation régionale du cicr à tunis la délégation régionale de tunis couvre la tunisie et le maroc / sahara occidental .
ses activités principales sont les visites aux personnes privées de liberté en tunisie , la réponse aux conséquences humanitaires du conflit au sahara occidental , le rétablissement du contact entre les membres de familles dispersées et la promotion du droit international humanitaire .
tunisia tunisie : des manifestants affirment avoir été attaqués au gaz lacrymogène et brutalisés ( tunis ) – les violences policières subies par des manifestants pacifiques , le 27 juillet 2013 à tunis , soulignent la nécessité pour le gouvernement tunisien de donner à la police des instructions claires visant à garantir et protéger le droit de manifester pacifiquement sur la voie publique , ainsi que de nouvelles directives sur les circonstances et la manière dont les gaz lacrymogènes peuvent être utilisés .

c 'est la question à laquelle la cntb au burundi doit répondre quand le propriétaire , chassé par la guerre , rentre au c ’ est une épine sur le chemin de la réconciliation au burundi .
la recrudescence des conflits fonciers nés du rapatriement des réfugiés hutus .
durant les années de crise , et au cours des différentes guerres interethniques qu ’ a connues le pays , près de 700 000 burundais hutus ont fui pour se réfugier à l ’ étranger .
depuis 2002 , une grande partie d ’ entre eux a été rapatriée .
mais à leur retour , les terres ou maisons qu ’ ils possédaient étaient occupées .
pour la première fois depuis des années , un quartier de la capitale du burundi a été la scène d ’ émeutes aux relents ethniques à l ’ occasion de la restitution d 'une maison à une famille hutue spoliée il y a 40 ans .
cela s 'est passé le mardi 28 mai .
en charge de la résolution de ces conflits : la commission nationale des terres et autres biens ( cntb ) .
son rôle : régler les la plupart des litiges concernent des familles qui ont fui le pays en 1972 , il y a plus de 40 ans .
sur 30 000 dossiers enregistrés , la cntb revendique 22 000 cas réglés , dont plus de 60 & percnt à l ’ amiable .
mais elle est controversée : une partie de l ’ opinion publique l ’ accuse de raviver les tensions ethniques en privilégiant les rapatriés hutus dans ses décisions , sans tenir compte de l ’ éventuelle bonne foi des nouveaux occupants .
car qu 'ils soient tutsi ou hutus , ils ont parfois acquis leur bien en toute légalité et ne reçoivent aucune le gouvernement semble avoir pris la mesure du malaise et envisagerait une réforme du système .
d ’ autant que jusqu ’ à présent , la commission s 'est concentrée sur les conflits concernant les parcelles de terre , jugés les plus urgents .
mais près de 200 000 autres plaintes sont encore en attente .
elles concernent des maisons , des voitures ou comptes en banque .
un vaste chantier de nature , craignent certains , à saper un processus de réconciliation déjà bien mal en by leslie p. nortonlenovo came out of nowhere to become the global leader in pcs .

yolcu treni raydan çıktı15 : 43 - perakende satışlar beklentilerin altında15 : 33 - arsenalin yeni bergkampı özil olacak15 : 26 - yıl sonu enflasyon beklentisi yüzde 7,44e çıktı15 : 06 - mourinhonun takımında oynamayacağıma yemin etmiştim15 : 03 - artinternational i̇stanbul 16 eylülde başlayacak15 : 02 - kuzey irakta seçim gerilimi14 : 58 - bankacılık sektörü son derece sağlam14 : 23 - yeni yatırım fırsatı : hayvan hastanesi14 : 09 - darphanede grev sona erdiartinternational i̇stanbul 16 eylül 'de başlayacak13 eylül 2013 cuma 15 : 03haliç kongre merkezi 'nde i̇stanbul 'dan new york 'a , dubai 'den viyana 'ya 62 galerinin katılımıyla gerçekleştirilecek fuar , çağdaş sanat tutkunlarını buluşturacak.i̇stanbul - türkiye 'nin yeni uluslararası çağdaş sanat fuarı artinternational i̇stanbul 16 eylül 'de başlayacak.artinternational i̇stanbul 'dan yapılan yazılı açıklamaya göre , i̇stanbul 'dan new york 'a , dubai 'den viyana 'ya 62 galerinin katılımıyla gerçekleştirilecek fuar , haliç kongre merkezi 'nde çağdaş sanat tutkunlarını buluşturacak.türkiye , orta doğu ve ötesine odaklanan , koleksiyonerlere uluslararası çağdaş sanata rakipsiz erişim imkanı yaratmayı ve evrensel sanat toplumunu birbirine bağlamayı amaçlayan fuar , angus montgomery ile fiera milano i̇nterteks işbirliğiyle yapılacak.dyala nusseibeh 'in koordinatörlüğü ve stephane ackermann 'ın artistik direktörlüğünde gerçekleşecek artinternational i̇stanbul 'a , avrupa , amerika ve ortadoğu 'dan toplam 62 galeri katılacak.dünyaca ünlü sanatçıların işlerinin görülebileceği fuarda yer alacak galeriler arasında londra 'dan pace ve lisson gallery , paris 'ten yvon lambert , berlin 'den arndt bulunuyor.fuarın , türkiye ayağında ise i̇stanbul 'un güncel sanat dünyasının odak noktası olmayı başarmış 10 galeri yer alıyor .
komitenin , uluslararası sergileri ve başarılarını dikkate alarak yaptığı seçim sonucu artsümer , egeran galleri , galeri zilberman , galeri mana , galeri non , galerist , pi artworks , pilot galeri , rampa gallery ve x-ist fuardaki yerini alacak.galeri sergileri dışında sanatsal aktiviteler ve özel projelerin de düzenleneceği fuar , 18 eylül 'de sona erecek .

on the sixth day of the standoff , defense secretary voltaire gazmin said the ceasefire is yet to be implemented , and fighting continues as of this posting saturday .
misuari has not been seen in public since the standoff began .
" there are lines they should not cross , " aquino said of the rebels .
he said the government would be obligated to use " the force of the state " if those lines are crossed .
( ap / pna / kathrina alvarez / sunnex ) as of 1 p.m. on saturday , volleys of gunfire have not ebbed in this part of the country despite the announcement of a ceasefire plan close to midnight friday and the moro national liberation front ( mnlf ) founding chair nur misuari showed his uncharacteristic self in the siege of zamboanga city : shunning the limelight .
as of 12 p.m. friday , the death toll in the ongoing standoff rose to 53 . but even as misuari ’ s hand could not be directly identified in the zamboanga attacks , his recent actuations and pronouncements most likely inspired the staging of a political drama by his loyal supporters that led to the fresh outbreak of hostilities .
milf chief negotiator mohagher iqbal described misuari ’ s stance as a way of asserting his or the mnlf ’ s “ franchise ” for solving the so-called bangsamoro question .
a week after the fab signing , misuari led a rally in davao city where he was introduced as president of the bangsamoro republic .
the crisis in sabah starting mid-february owing to the incursion of armed men belonging to the so-called royal army of the sulu sultanate provided misuari a new platform to pitch for his personal aspiration .
the incident happened two weeks prior to an exploratory meeting between government and the milf in kuala lumpur .
misuari himself has admitted that some of his men figured in the lahad datu incursion .
interviewed by al-jazeera television at the height of the standoff , misuari said his faction of the mnlf “ cannot support the gph-milf talks because it will be counterproductive on our part . ”
“ the milf is organized as a spoiler to derail our struggle , ” he said .
but he clarified that he is willing to go back to the negotiating table for talks in jakarta under oic auspices .
misuari claimed that he was forced to do the action because of government ’ s move to put “ closure to the 1996 fpa . ”
the review is participated by government , the mnlf factions led by misuari and muslimin sema , and the oic .
indonesia chairs the meetings , in its capacity as chair of the oic ’ s peace committee for southern philippines ( pcsp ) .
“ the subject matters and the territorial application overlap .
the constituency – the bangsamoro – are the same , ” she explained .
“ details may differ – there may be peculiarities here and there that are more in tune with contemporary realities as when they were negotiated in the 1990s .
but the sum total effectively builds on what the mnlf achieved , or did not achieve , for one reason or another , ” she further said .
june and early july can be the best time to see multiple blue sharks and we start off a bit chilly ( low 60 's ) in june , but warm quite nicely by july .

as we cruised back into montauk harbor , the sun finally poking through the low overcast , we were thrilled to have shared the ocean with one of its most among the creatures you could see on this type of adventure .
the trips are 8-12 hours long , so come prepared for a full day on the diving begins to cover the procedure and to acclimate divers to the cage if you are not certified .
the cage floats on the surface with a maximum along for the ride to enjoy all the sights and sounds above the surface .
although being in the water and meeting a shark face to face is the idene - the idene was a 120 ' steel hulled fishing trawler sunk as an artificial reef by the state of r.i. in 1991 .
the wreck sits but should only be done by qualified divers .
the top of idene can be reached at in 1939 .
today the wreck is unrecognizable as a ship , but still offers an island lies one of the most interesting dives in new england .
the submarine was depth charged on may 6th , 1945 .
the wreck is a must see for the enterprising deep diver .
though the sub is upright and intact , penetration is possible but should be considered dangerous do to the possibility of decaying wreckage .
the wreck is easy to navigate and a all divers are required to sign a waiver and release ofliability , you will need a lot of weight if using a drysuit. are secured to the inside of the cage .
regulators are attached to anodized aluminum pipe and is fully welded at all seams. into the cages top hatch .
once inside , the hatch is closed and sea turtle is a 36 ' bhm downeast style boat .
she is powered by a expeditions and can be made by contacting us through our participates do not have to be certified to cage dive. mailing list and we will email you if anything changes in our divers to the cage if you are not certified .
the cage floats on the surface with you , as a diver should be able to enter and exit the cages on your own .
example : can you easily climb in and out of a swimming pool without the use of stairs or a ladder ?
you should be in reasonably physically fit frequent access to medical facilities you may not be eligible to if a diver chooses not to go out and the tour was not canceled that constitutes a no show and the cost of the trip is safety of the passengers will be decided by the captain at the dock .
every attempt will be made by the expedition company to reschedule divers in the event the captain cancels the trip due to bad weather and / or unsafe sea dive boat cannot be held responsible for bad weather , if a diver chooses not to go out and the tour was not canceled that by the crew for the duration of the trip .
zero tolerance policy is enforced .
no illegal substances will be permitted on the boat .
a waiver and release of diver on each trip .
the crew will log you in and out of the water and will assist you in any way possible , but you are solely responsible for your recommendations for lodging in the montauk area and lots more !

he is a friend of barbara keyes because consejo shores is in his part of the district , and he likes to go out to the casablanca and listen to i go out and talk to mr. maxie , and on the spot , he offers me a i think about the extra money , and how it might be used , and accede .
in a couple days , i meet the vice-principal in an entirely different valdimar tells me that i will need a work permit , where to get the he pronounces it " oogo " and i think of ooogy pringle , one of the students on " our miss brooks " but hugo is an accomplished he is the music director for an assembly of god church around the teach music any more , but he wants his son viktor ( actually " viktor maxie asks me to come out and chat , and then offers me the full-time job .
perhaps not as impressive as " adjunct professor " - the title maxie asks me how old i am , and i tell him .
mandatory retirement age is 65 , and i will hit that in the fall 2000. is pretty young to be taking the full time job , but he gets the part-time job i write demerits for the students who don 't bring instruments , and put my bag ( full of music , chalk , recorder ) on the teacher 's chair behind the desk , my guitar gigbag in the corner and challenge the class .

sanayinin alt sektörleri incelendiğinde , 2013 yılı temmuz ayında , bir önceki yılın aynı ayına göre ; madencilik ve taşocakçılığı endeksi % 11,7 , imalat sanayi endeksi ise % 15,0 arttı.i̇malat sanayi alt sektörlerinin 2013 yılı temmuz ayında 2012 yılı aynı ayına göre yüzde değişim oranları incelendiğinde , en yüksek artış oranının % 79,3 ile diğer ulaşım araçları imalatında gerçekleştiği görüldü .
bunu % 37,8 ile motorlu kara taşıtı , treyler ( römork ) ve yarı treyler ( yarı römork ) imalatı takip etti.i̇malat sanayi alt gruplarında en fazla düşüş diğer imalatlarda gerçekleştii̇malat sanayi alt sektörlerinin 2013 yılı temmuz ayında 2012 yılı aynı ayına göre yüzde değişim oranları incelendiğinde , en fazla düşüş oranının % 28,2 ile diğer imalatlarda gerçekleştiği görüldü .
bunu % 1,3 ile ağaç , ağaç ve mantar ürünleri ( mobilya hariç ) imalatı takip etti .

but on a friday in farah 's capital , the offices of malalai joya , who is running for parliament , crackle with life .
all activity focuses on a woman who is slumped in a chair , her head bowed and the side of her face swollen .
her mouth hangs slack and her tongue worries at her crooked teeth .
" i criticise my countrymen for allowing the legitimacy and legality of this loya jirga to be questioned by the presence of those criminals who brought our country to this state , " read the transcripts of what she said .
" it is a mistake to test those who have already been tested .
they should be taken to the world court . "
warlords are not the only thing on malalai joya 's mind .
a large coterie of impoverished men and women work for her and depend on her , too - inevitable flotsam washed up by a quarter-century of war .
she says the plight of such people has galvanised her ever since she was a refugee in the camps in pakistan .
" i once met a mother who had dressed her child in mourning clothes and was waiting for him to die because she didn 't have money to take him to a doctor , " she says .
" she was just waiting for him to die . "

why are some of the opposition in the diaspora extremely pessimistic towards the country ?
what does it mean to wish bloodshed on ones brothers and sisters ? why is that some in the diaspora believe there is no way for peaceful transition of power ?
why can ’ t they believe in peaceful resistances ( like civil disobedience ) , instead of taking arm to fight ?

otherwise , as a view it is absolutely ok and acceptable to live a personal life abroad .
it is most certainly expected one to worry about one ’ s nation , but it is also important to make sure if one is capable of dictating on such a serious matter for a nation that is fragile and struggling to make it to the next day .
the current approach by some parts of the opposition in the diaspora , intellectuals and journalists of always predicting the worst , hate speeches and terrorizing posts on social media and other outlets and blind opposition to anyone are all most certainly irresponsible , disloyal and uncalled for by ethiopians who are patient and aspire for a logical and well-thought means to improve the status of democracy and human rights in the country .

radyo ang iyang unang gugma .
pagka magsisibya ang unang trabaho nga iyang gi-aplayan .
bisan napakyas ang pipila niya ka pagsuway , wa mapawong ang iyang damgo sa pagsibya .
gisudlan ang ubang trabaho nga nagamit ang iyang tingog .
apil nang pagka announcer sa higanteng kompaniya sa softdrink nga nilibot sa tibuok nasud alang sa ilang libreng mga sine .
apan radyo gihapon ang gipitik sa iyang kasingkasing .
bisan nahimo nang malampuson nga negosyante , nilambo ug nananga na ang iyang maribago bluewater beach resort sa kabisay-an ug mindanao , radyo lang gihapon ang ganahan niyang balikan .
bisan napakyas ang pagsuway pagpalit og estasyon sa radyo sa sugbo pila ka tuig ang nilabay .
nagsugod ang iyang gugma tungod sa drama sa kzrc nga gipasiugdahan sa bantogang peryodista nga si juan mercado .
nabukhad ang batan-ong kabuot sa bag-ong kalibotan pagpintal sa gamhanan nga mga talan-awon ug mga sugilanon pinaagi lang sa tingog .
nadani siya sa pagmugna sa tunob sa asno nga gisakyan ni hesukristo pagsud sa jerusalem pinaagi sa pagpadapat sa bagol sa gagmayng bato ug sa dugdog pinaagi sa paghapak og kahoy sa sin .
labing nakasuyop niya mao ang kahigayonan pag-angkon og lehitimong kinabuhi pinaagi lang sa paggamit sa tingog .
maong sa nisunod nga kapin sa unom ka dekada gitipigan ang iyang damgo nga mahilambigit sa radyo .
nga natuman sa dakbayan sa butuan .
diin iyang gikakita , gihalaran sa iyang gugma ug gipakaslan ang inahan sa iyang mga anak , giumol ang ilang pamilya ug gisugdan ang ilang patigayon .
sa sugbo nahimugso ang iyang gugma sa radyo apan sa butuan nakaangkon og bayhon sa niaging semana .
si consul arcadio “ dodong ” alegrado nipaila ngadto sa suod niyang mga higala sa iyang estasyon sa radyo nga nahimutang sa almont hotel , usa sa labing una niyang patigayon , sa kinapusoran sa butuan .
gipiling septiyembre 11 , ang halandumong sumad sa ilang kaminyuon sa nitaliwan niyang asawa , sa inugurasyon sa dxam fm , pahinungod sa ilang mga ngan ug apelyido--arcadio ug marley , alegrado ug montalban .
nakaseguro ko nga ang lapad niyang kasinatian sa kinabuhi nakatudlo ni consul alegrado nga way kuwarta sa radyo .
nagduda gani ko nga sa tago nagpasalamat siya nga wa dayon makasud sa radyo ug nakahigayon pa pagsuway sa mas malambuon nga mga panginabuhi ug patigayon .
apan bisan kini wa kaiban sa iyang gugma .
nipasabot si consul alegrado nga gitukod niya ang dxam fm bisan sa kahinog na sa iyang pangedarong 79 uban ang paglaom nga padayunon ug palambuon sa iyang mga anak ug mga apo .
mas mahinungdanon kay sa estasyon sa radyo ug sa uban nilang patigayon mao ang gibilin niyang pagtulon-an alang sa iyang mga anak ug mga apo ug natong tanan : ang pagdumili pagtahan sa atong damgo .

you can read mirna 's the back where the guy is sitting , but that 's it .

like the market , rudolph is gone -- he got tb and died .

it ’ s not logical and it doesn ’ t provide harmony ... .... ( size : 1.6kb ) completeness , of a logical system , which means that if a formula is true , it can be proven ( if it is true , it is a theorem of the system ) .
in languages , modality deals with the phenomenon that sub-parts of a sentence may have their semantics modified by special verbs or modal particles .
for example , " we go to the games " can be modified to give " we should go to the games " , and " we can go to the games " " and perhaps " we will go to the games " .
more abstractly , we might say that modality affects the circumstances in which we take an assertion to be satisfied .
one of the boldest attempts to apply logic to mathematics was undoubtedly the logicism pioneered by philosopher-logicians such as gottlob frege and bertrand russell : the idea was that mathematical theories were logical tautologies , and the programme was to show this by means to a reduction of mathematics to logic . [ 9 ] the various attempts to carry this out met with a series of failures , from the crippling of frege 's project in his grundgesetze by russell 's paradox , to the defeat of hilbert 's program by gödel 's incompleteness theorems .
intuitionistic logic was proposed by l.e.j. brouwer as the correct logic for reasoning about mathematics , based upon his rejection of the law of the excluded middle as part of his intuitionism .
brouwer rejected formalisation in mathematics , but his student arend heyting studied intuitionistic logic formally , as did gerhard gentzen .
intuitionistic logic has come to be of great interest to computer scientists , as it is a constructive logic and can be applied for extracting verified programs from proofs .
another paper by the same name by sir michael dummett argues that putnam 's desire for realism mandates the law of distributivity . [ 36 ] distributivity of logic is essential for the realist 's understanding of how propositions are true of the world in just the same way as he has argued the principle of bivalence is .
in this way , the question , " is logic empirical ? " can be seen to lead naturally into the fundamental controversy in metaphysics on realism versus anti-realism . ^ mohists and the school of names date back at 2200 years . ^ nietzsche , 1873 , on truth and lies in a nonmoral sense .
smith , b. , ( 1989 ) .
" logic and the sachverhalt " .
the monist 72 ( 1 ) : 52 – 69 .
" symbolic logic " and " the game of logic " , lewis carroll , 1896 .

barron 's & ldquo ; i don ’ t care if people think i am doing this to promote my business , & rdquo ; said yerga who owns a printing shop . & ldquo ; these pictures costed me a lot and i put them out there because the pm was really dear to me and i wanted to show and share my grief .
if the authorities ask me to move them , i will .
otherwise i don ’ t mind if they are out there as long as possible , & rdquo ; he said .
as a culture , ethiopians seem to always choose the safe road by assimilating themselves with their neighbors .
hirut , who owns a beauty shop , said she posted the picture of the late pm outside her door after watching all of her neighbor do the same . & ldquo ; i didn ’ t want to be labelled in any way .
that will defiantly affect my relationship with the kebele administration .
so i bought the picture and hang it on with my business name on it .
i do not really think it is a smart way of promoting business to the public .
especially for a beauty shop , the picture of meles is not relevant at all .
however , i think it ’ s a way of keeping the peace with the authorities who always look for a reason to mess people ’ s business & rdquo ; .
yakob who says he never attended the mourning ceremonies nor does have a picture of the pm outside his door says the fear is all in people ’ s mind .
he owns a spare parts business and showed no sign of grief for the late pm using his business . & ldquo ; i actually told my friends who are eprdf members that i don ’ t think the death of the pm is a big deal .
i am not saying i wanted him dead .
however , i always wanted change and may be that was the way to get it .
nothing happened to me .
i am doing business as usual .
for me , the government is not responsible for intimidating the people .
it is the people , probably using the mentality of the past regimes , who put themselves in a position of being intimidated for no reason , & rdquo ; he said .
some residents are suggesting that may be it is time to move on and let meles zenawi rest for good . & ldquo ; for those who consider him a hero or maybe an enemy , there is no way he will lose his place in their heart .
however the pictures are making us look like we haven ’ t found a way to move our nation forward , & rdquo ; commented abdu , a trader in addis ababa . " said to be in line for a much larger presence " on " today . "

artinternational i̇stanbul 16 eylülde başlayacak15 : 02 - kuzey irakta seçim gerilimi14 : 58 - bankacılık sektörü son derece sağlam14 : 23 - yeni yatırım fırsatı : hayvan hastanesi14 : 09 - darphanede grev sona erdiesnafa uyarı : " turistlere iyi davranın " 12 eylül 2013 perşembe 16 : 48son güncelleme : 13 : 27londra kültür ve tanıtım müşavirliğine yapılan şikayet üzerine marmaris 'teki esnaflar , resmi yazıyla turistlere iyi davranmaları konusunda uyarıldı.muğla - i̇ngiliz bir turistin londra kültür ve tanıtım müşavirliğine yaptığı şikayet üzerine marmaris 'teki esnaflara resmi yazıyla uyarıda bulunuldu.bir süre önce marmaris 'te tatil yapan richard bourlat , ülkesinden dönünce türkiye 'nin londra kültür ve tanıtma müşavirliğine ilçede karşılaştığı olumsuz esnaf davranışlarıyla ilgili şikayetleri içeren dilekçe verdi.müşavirlikten muğla kültür ve turizm müdürlüğüne gönderilen yazıda , turistin " marmaris 'te vatandaşların turistlere karşı kaba oldukları , özellikle dükkan ve restoran gibi iş yerlerinde çalışanların turistlere uygun olmayan davranışlarda bulunulduğu " şikayeti iletildi .
bunun üzerine muğla vali yardımcısı mehmet denizlioğlu imzasıyla marmaris belediyesine gönderilen , şikayetin de bulunduğu resmi uyarı yazısı çoğaltılarak zabıtalar tarafından ilçedeki esnafa dağıtıldı .
uyarı yazısında , " i̇limiz turizminde önemli bir yere sahip i̇ngiliz pazarında bu tür sıkıntılara meydan verilmemesi için gerekli önlemlerin alınması , özellikle hanutçuluğun önününe geçilerek ilimizin tanıtımında kaliteli hizmetin ön plana çıkartılmasının büyük önem arz ettiği bilinmektedir " ifadelerine yer verildi.anketlerde turistlerin en fazla şikayetçi oldukları konuların başında gelen hanutçuluk gibi kötü davranışlar konusunda ilçedeki esnafın ilk kez resmi yazıyla uyarıldığı belirtildi . " turist velinimetimiz " muğla esnaf odaları birliği ve marmaris esnaf sanatkarlar odası başkanı şükrü ayyıldız , aa muhabirine yaptığı açıklamada , gelen turist zengin de olsa fakir de olsa velinimet olduğunu , bir bardak çay bile içse ülkeye döviz bıraktığını söyledi.hanutçuluk gibi olumsuz davranışların turizmi daha da kötüne götürdüğüne işaret eden ayyıldız , şöyle konuştu : " ben esnaf arkadaşlarımıza her zaman ' sizin de anneniz , kız kardeşiniz var .
onlara böyle kötü davranışlarda bulunulsa ne yaparsınız ' diyorum .
kendimize yapılmasını istemediğimiz şeyi , gelen misafirlerimize de yapmayalım .
paralı turiste dönüş için titizlikle hizmet vermeliyiz .
tabi hizmet verelim derken kendimiz de küçültmemeliyiz . " yerinde tanıtımın önemine değinen ayyıldız , mutlu bir şekilde ayrılan turistlerin fuarda yapılan tanıtımlardan daha etkili olduğunu vurguladı.turistlere karşı olumsuz davranışların münferit olduğuna inandıklarını ifade eden ayyıldız , misafirlere kötü davranışlarda bulunan esnafın bu hareketlerden vazgeçmesini istedi .
yorumlarekonomik meslek kuruluşlarıesnafa uyarı : " turistlere iyi davranın " lobi , 22 milyar dolarlık açığı kolluyor " yapılan zam fırsatçılıktan başka bir şey değil " müsi̇ad 'dan kuzey irak çıkarmasıato 'dan kimliklendirilmiş konut önerisi " gezi parkı olaylarının zararını esnaf çekiyor " tüsi̇ad 'dan ' denetim ' açıklamasıhisarcıklıoğlu yeniden başkantobb 'da yeni yönetim seçiliyor ‘ aileler , evlatlarına sanayiyi bırakmaya artık korkar oldu ’ tesk : esnafın girdileri tüm kesimlerden pahalıperakende satış hacmi yüzde 1.8 arttıbaşarılı ihracatçılar ödüllendirildi2 bin sözleşmeli hemşire alınacakti̇m , türkiye-abd için etki analizi yapacaktürk pilotlar işsiz kalmayacaktüm adana sanayisini temsil edeceğizato 'dan hisarcıklıoğlu 'na tam destekkur riski uzun vadeli bir risk değiltek yol kırsal kalkınma how clegg removed criticism of tim farron from his lib dem rally ...

people are always fond of saying " if the ralph fonseca goes to the us and negotiates a hundred million dollar loan for people are fond of calling it " funny money " but it 's not funny .
now , having said that , do you understand why i say the us and its social security system , are not " bankrupt " and will not go bankrupt in the foreseeable future .
social security puts a deposit in my bank in the us every month , and it is _ money _ , whether i ever change any of it into currency .
i do -- i write a us check to a belizean friend and he gives me belizean dollars to spend in belize .
he takes my check ( i left the " pay to " blank ) and sells it to a belizean businessman who needs us dollars to buy things for sale if you want to buy gold , do it because you think it 's a good investment ; don 't do it because you think the money you have now is worthless .

for example , the express bus from belize city to corozal is off-season for about $ 300 .

or you can spend the night in the hotel and fly to chetumal the next morning for about $ 110 us .
if you can 't get a seat on a superbus ( below ) after you arrive , spend the night at the margueritas and go the next morniing .
the " first class " bus is not really first class -- you 'll be lucky to get any sleep at all .

so maybe technology is a new field , but entrepreneurship is not new to us . & rdquo ; parnell and his supporters say the answer to alaska ’ s woes is simple : cut taxes .
“ this is alaska ’ s most important decision in the last half of the century , ” said dan donkel , owner of donkel oil and gas , an independent producer .
“ it effectively gives away alaska ’ s oil , ” said ray metcalfe , a former republican legislator who is spearheading a petition effort that would let alaskans vote on the tax break on the 2014 ballot .
“ those who are unfamiliar with the shortcomings of the government take as a criterion tend to overuse it , ” the interior-commissioned report says .
parnell ’ s critics , however , point out the rate of alaska ’ s production decline has slowed slightly in recent years , while oil and gas employment has increased as signs that alaska ’ s fate under palin ’ s brainchild is not all doom and gloom .
meanwhile , wielechowski remains optimistic that improvements in technology and new discoveries of unconventional oil and gas open up taps on the north slope , helping alaska refill its coffers and keep its permanent fund permanent .
“ with or without a tax cut , ” wielechowski said , “ you ’ re going to see production ramp up . ”

nagkadugo nga kasaysayan sa upat na ka dekada nga rebelyon sa mga muslim sa mindanao magtudlo nato nga di hingpit nga gubat kun dili matinud-anon nga sabutsabot sa kalinaw ang sulbad sa kagubot .
unom na ka presidente sa pilipinas ang nisuway pagpatigbabaw sa kalinaw sa mindanao .
pipila nila nipili sa gubat apan kasagaran nidangop sa pakigsabutsabot .
nataliwad-an 42 ka tuig nga langyab sukad sa pagtukod sa batan-ong nur misuari sa moro national liberation front niadtong 1971 hangtod sa labing uwahi niyang pag-atake sa zamboanga city niadtong lunes sa kadlawon ang daghan nang mga pagsuway sa pakiggubat ug pakigsabot sa kalinaw sa mindanao .
labing unang nilusad sa gubat batok sa mnlf mao si kanhi presidente ferdinand marcos duha ka tuig human gideklarar ang martial law .
niadtong 1974 , si marcos naghupot sa hingpit nga gahom sa usa ka diktador .
hingpit niyang gikontrolar ang armadong kusog .
nahipos niya ang tanang lider sa oposisyon ug mga aktibista busa wa nay makabaraw bisan unsay iyang himuon .
apan napakyas ang gubat ni marcos pagpahunong sa rebelyon nilang misuari ug kaubanan .
gawas sa pagpabanaw sa dugo ug pagkutlo sa kaliboan ka kinabuhi .
maong si marcos mismo niuyon sa pakigsabutsabot ni misuari .
nga nisangpot sa pagkaumol sa tripoli agreement niadtong 1976 nga nihatag og otonomiya sa mga dapit nga gidominahan sa mga muslim .
laing nilusad og gubat batok sa mga rebeldeng muslim mao si kanhi presidente joseph estrada .
kinsa nilampos sa pagsakmit sa kampo abu bakar , ang labing dakong kampo sa moro islamic liberation front .
apan nagpadayon ang rebelyon sa mindanao nga si estrada way laing kapilian gawas sa pagpadayon sa sabutsabot sa kalinaw .
mas malampuson ang mga sabutsabot sa kalinaw nga gipasiugdahan nilang anhing presidente cory aquino ug kanhi presidente fidel ramos nga nisangpot sa kauyonan sa kalinaw sa 1996 .
natukod ang autonomous region of muslim mindanao ug si misuari ang napili nga labing unang gobernador .
nagpasiugda sab og buwag nga sabutsabot sa kalinaw uban sa milf silang ramos ug kanhi presidente gloria arroyo .
apan ang kauyonan sa kalinaw nga nakab-ot ni arroyo uban sa milf gibasura sa korte suprema nga ilegal ug unconstitutional .
nilampos hinuon si presidente aquino pagbanhaw sa sabutsabot ug nakaumol og makasaysayanong kauyonan sa kalinaw uban sa milf sa niaging tuig .
di ni unang higayon nga nangatake si misuari sa zamboanga city .
nanung sab siya niadtong 2001 ug dihang gigukod sa kasundalohan nagpalaban sa malaysia .
apan giposasan siya ug giuli sa pilipinas .
gitanggong siya sa fort sto .
domingo sa sta .
rosa city sa laguna , ang nahimutangan karon ni janet lim-napoles .
dayong kapupos sa termino ni arroyo gisibog sa gobyerno ang tanang kasong kriminal batok ni misuari .
key to tackling the problem and bringing abusers to book is disarming illegal militias and establishing a functioning judiciary and police force , the group said .

liberia ten years since the end of the conflict , ‘ ma annie ’ continues her quest for peace in liberia newton g. teeweh is one of liberia ’ s deeply committed teachers .
he is proud to be doing the critical but unglamorous work of teaching the nation ’ s children how to read so they can read to learn .
he once had been a struggling reader himself , so it wasn ’ t always obvious that he would become a teacher .

ang biktima giila sa kapulisan nga si rene segovia , alyas roy , 33 , residente sa kilometro 9 , matina pangi ning siyudad .
subay sa pasiunang impormasyon nga nahipos sa talomo police station , nasayran nga nagmaneho ang biktima sa iyang traysikel , uban ang iyang kapuyo nga si jean bautista .
dunay usa ka lalaki ang mipara ug misakay kaniya nga magpahatod sa alpha homes ug nangutana kon pilay bayad .
mihanyag og p50 ang pasahero , apan nagdumili ang biktima gumikan kay dako ra kaayo .
pwede , matud pa ang pasahe , nga p30 .
pag-abot sa nasampit nga dapit , mipara ang pasahero dayon kalit miduol ang usa ka lalaki nga naghulat daan sa lugar nga sakay og motorsiklo ug dayon gipusil makausa ka higayon ang biktima .
human maigo sa likod ang biktima , nahagba siya sa iyang gidrayban nga traysikel .
gisaysay sa kapuyo nga human sa hitabo , ang pasahero misakay sa motor sa mamumuno dayon mipadagan padung sa wala matino nga direksiyon .
dugang nasayran sa superbalita nga ang biktima dunay 48 ka mga babaye nga gikapuyo , kon diin si jean ang iyang katapusang giipon karon .
sa wala pa mahitabo ang krimen , giangkon ni jean nga duna nay nadawat nga bahad ang biktima gikan sa giingong mga nakaipon sa biktima .
nagtuo ang kapulisan nga ang pagpatay sa biktima posibleng panimalos sa mga babaye nga gikaipon niini .
nasayran nga sa dihang gidala ang patay nga lawas sa biktima didto sa collado funeral parlor sa bangkal , nag-abot ang duha ka mga babaye nga gikapuyo kaniadto ni segovia ug nagminahayay sa hitabo .
samtang gisulat ning balita ning sabado , ang kapulisan mihimo na og dugang imbestigasyon aron nga mailhan ug madakpan ang utok sa krimen .
si segovia ang ika-50 nga gipusil-patay sa wa pa mailhing mamumuno sa siyudad sa davao sukad hulyo 1 .
