the greatest pleasure of interviewing inbetweeners co-creator and writer damon beesley was finding out that the stuff viewers didn ’ t see on camera was just as funny as what made it onto tv in the bafta-winning show .
ahead of talking to fans at a q & a and screening of the inbetweeners movie , damonrevealed his sense of humour was still equally as juvenileas that ofwill , simon , jay and neil . & ldquo ; when we were filming on the boat for the field trip episode and joe had to stand naked , there was a quite a lot of concern for him because it was freezing cold in january . & ldquo ; in the scene , he falls into the water and they have to take all his clothes off because he is going to get hypothermia and at one point he stands up naked , to wave back at the land . & ldquo ; we all fell about laughing and because it was so funny , during the edit we wrote in a few lines to the script that neil [ played by blake harrison ] had put a sock over his parts – why would you do that ? & ldquo ; but it was brilliant and it made a good joke . & rdquo ; rarely do you get to see the spectacular tunes of the early days of rock and roll performed live .
save the last dance for me is based on the music of songwriting duo doc pomus and mort shuman and is the latest in a line of new jukebox musical to hit the stage .
the finale of the story , save the last dance for me , is a bittersweet gem , when its remembered as a lament from crutch bound doc pomus , who had polio as a child , and was never able to dance .
the man at the top of the uk ’ s largest independent theatre company and the everton fc chairman – a bit random in many people ’ s eyes – launches his latest jukebox musical save the last dance for me in kent this week .
why did you choose to launch save the last dance for me in dartford rather than a big west end theatre or one in a larger city ? & ldquo ; [ i see myself as ] a provincial theatre producer who has big broadway and west end successes .
i love the audiences out there .
when do you know whether a show is going to be a success ?
so after the success of dreamboats and petticoats , is a similar type of musical like save the last dance for me not too much of a risk ? & ldquo ; you never see a show that does not cost half a million , so that is a bit of a risk . & rdquo ; & ldquo ; because i think they will recoup one day .
it is called a nervous hit .
when it is not quite a flop and not quite a hit and just , is there .
the audience are enjoying it but you are not making a lot of money and you decide you are going to live with it for a little while .
are people stuggling to go out to the theatre now ? & ldquo ; yes i do think times are very tough financially and now you have got all the colossal distractions of what you can see on your tv , your dvd and you ipads .
it is extraordinary what is out there .
for people to go and see shows is an effort .
that is why you have got to try to find something that an audience responds to . & rdquo ; all of this istoppedoff with baby-faced sticksman callum norton .
what more could a fan want ?
perhaps it was just me – my mate told me he felt like the same thing was happening to him – but when i watched , drinking in their sound , i had to avert my eyes .
dale was looking me in the face the whole time .
it was uncomfortable .

des algériens mangent en public en plein ramadan , une première plus de 500 algériens ont mangé et bu en public en plein ramadan samedi dans la ville " rebelle " de tizi ouzou , dans une première action collective du genre pour marquer leur liberté de choix face à " l 'islamisation " du pays .
" il y a un climat de terreur qui règne contre ceux qui ne jeûnent pas " durant le mois de jeûne sacré musulman du ramadan , dénonce à l 'afp l 'un d 'eux , ali , la quarantaine , un technicien de cette ville kabyle située à 100 km d 'alger. acquiesce .
" il faut que la religion reste du domaine du privé " , dit-il en parmi les participants à cette action , figurent des citoyens sans affiliation et des militants politiques , surtout berbères , qui n 'hésitent pas à afficher le un étudiant de 18 ans , lounès , va encore plus loin en arborant une pancarte sur laquelle est écrit : " je ne suis pas arabe .
je ne suis pas obligé d 'être la ville de tizi ouzou a été le théâtre de troubles parfois sanglants liés aux revendications culturelles et identitaires des kabyles qui ont très mal vécu face à un public essentiellement jeune et masculin , armé de bouteilles d 'eau , de jus , de pain , de cigarettes et même de bières pour l 'un d 'eux , le président du mouvement pour l 'autonomie de la kabylie ( mak ) , bouaziz aït chebib , a revendiqué " l 'attachement ancestral " des kabyles " à la liberté de conscience " . de la religion " , lance-t-il , applaudi par les manifestants postés devant la préfecture sur le principal axe routier de cette ville de quelque 150.000 habitants , sans le moindre contrôle apparent de forces de sécurité .
et d 'annoncer que des manifestations similaires sont prévues ce jour à bejaïa , ville portuaire kabyle , et même en france et au canada , où vivent d 'importantes pendant le ramadan durant lequel les musulmans s 'abstiennent de boire , de manger , de fumer et d 'avoir des relations sexuelles du lever jusqu 'au coucher du soleil , les restaurants sont ouverts seulement dans les hôtels de luxe , et les autorités tout autant que les religieux incitent la population à respecter le jusque dans les années 1980 , dans les villes au moins , les restaurants étaient ouverts et ne jeûnaient que ceux qui le voulaient .
la guerre anti-islamiste de plus de dix ans ( à partir des années 1990 ) a changé la donne .
depuis , la société civile et nombre de partis d 'opposition avec le printemps arabe qui a vu l 'arrivée au pouvoir d 'islamistes dans ce rassemblement à tizi ouzou , l 'une des principales villes de kabylie , a été lancé dans la foulée d 'un contrôle de police effectué sur dénonciation le 19 juillet dans un bar fermé d 'une commune proche , tigzirt , où des jeunes déjeunaient .
le propriétaire , qui s 'était vu retirer sa licence , a finalement pu le wali de tizi ouzou , abdelkader bouazeghi , avait alors expliqué qu 'il ce n 'était pas la première fois que des mesures au moins vexatoires étaient prises contre des non jeûneurs .
des chrétiens algériens se sont même retrouvés devant la justice ces dernières années pour avoir refusé de faire carême .
" quelque 80 & percnt des algériens sont d 'accord avec ceux qui protestent contre le pouvoir grandissant des religieux dans le pays " , dit le technicien ali .
pour hamid , un retraité de tizi ouzou venu exprimer son soutien au mouvement , " il faut bien mettre un holà à tout cela : on ne peut pas forcer tout le monde à aller au paradis " , la fin ultime " promise " à tout pratiquant .

webmagazín.sk podľa štatistík aimmonitora zaznamenal 69.322 návštevníkov a školský servis.sk 36.795 návštevníkov .
portály tasr koncom marca vstúpili do aim monitora , ktorý oficiálne monitoruje návštevnosť slovenských webov .
pre majiteľov smartfónov a tabletov s iným operačným systémom má tasr k dispozícií aj mobilnú aplikáciu pre ios alebo mobilnú verziu stránky dostupnú na m.teraz.sk.
jedinečnosť projektu skolskyservis.sk podčiarkuje aj skutočnosť , že všetky príspevky od žiakov a študentov editujú skúsení editori , ktorí prispievateľom dajú aj spätnú väzbu .
spravodajský portál teraz.sk je na mediálnom trhu práve jeden rok portál bude denne ponúkať správy z produkcie študentov a pedagógov rozčlenené podľa základných druhov škôl .
portál teraz.sk sa počas deviatich mesiacov etabloval na slovenskom spravodajskom internetovom trhu .
fotografi tasr m. baumann a p. neubauer žiarili na slovak press photo martin baumann zvíťazil v kategórii šport a pavel neubauer v kategórii aktualita. audio webmagazin.sk je už tretím internetovým projektom , ktorý v roku 2012 tasr spustila .
prvé miesto na slovensku získala už druhý deň po jej uvedení .
aplikácia je dostupná zadarmo .
návštevnosť spravodajského portálu teraz.sk naďalej rastie , v máji portál navštívilo takmer štvrť milióna unikátnych návštevníkov , ktorí si pozreli viac ako 1,5 milióna stránok .
spravodajský portál tasr teraz.sk v apríli navštívilo viac ako 160 000 unikátnych návštevníkov , ktorí si pozreli viac ako 1,62 milióna stránok .
vyplýva to zo štatistík google analytics .
among the opposition mps present in the house , only augustine mrema mp for vunjo ( tlp ) remained in the debating chamber .
the argument was that it was unfair for the committee not meet the stakeholders in zanzibar as partners in the union .
mkanyageni legislator habib mohamed mnyaa ( cuf ) requested for the speaker ’ s guidance as to what was the logic of debating the proposed bill which had not incorporated the views of zanzibar stakeholders .
ubungo mp john mnyika called for cancellation of the two new subsections which were not in the original draft of the bill and were not discussed during the preparatory stage under the parliamentary committee . & ldquo ; during its sittings in dar es salaam , the committee invited stakeholders from zanzibar including the elections director for the purpose , & rdquo ; she said .
and in a more confusing scenario the konde mp ( cuf ) khatib said haji told the house that there was one legislator who sent him an unsigned message that he and mp salum barwany ( lindi urban , cuf ) would be dealt with accordingly for their support of the matters presented by tundu lissu .

father william fournier was ordained to the priesthood on june 9 , 1973 , by bishop paul anderson for the oblates of mary immaculate .
in 1992 , he entered the diocese of duluth and was incardinated to the diocese in 1994 .
father fournier served as the director of communications and as auditor in the tribunal for the diocese of duluth and was a board member for st. ann ’ s residence in duluth .
msgr. alexander suchan was ordained to the priesthood at the cathedral in katowic , poland , in 1988 .
home | about | search | site maphayvan hastanesi sayısı 27ye ulaştı dünya gazetesionline abonelike-gazetedolar rezervi eriyor13 eylül 2013 cumaanasayfaekonomifinansdış haberlerpolitikatoplumsektörlerkategori̇lerfinansne , nerede , ne zamangündembi̇k i̇lanlarıdünya ihtdış i̇lişkileremtiai̇şletme-yönetimmevzuatnews in englishgüncelyorum i̇ncelemebölgelerdenözel dosyalarresmi gazetetiger monitorbankacılık sektörübilişimdemir-çelik sektörüenerji sektörügıda sektörühaberleşme sektörühizmetleri̇nşaat sektörükimya-petrokimya sektörümadencilik sektörümağazacılık-perakendecilik sektörümedya sektörüotomotiv sektörüplastik-kauçuk sektörüsanayisavunma sanayiisigortacılık sektörütarım ve hayvancılıktaşımacılık sektörütekstil sektörüturizm sektörü16 : 14 - yolcu treni raydan çıktı15 : 43 - perakende satışlar beklentilerin altında15 : 33 - arsenalin yeni bergkampı özil olacak15 : 26 - yıl sonu enflasyon beklentisi yüzde 7,44e çıktı15 : 06 - mourinhonun takımında oynamayacağıma yemin etmiştim15 : 03 - artinternational i̇stanbul 16 eylülde başlayacak15 : 02 - kuzey irakta seçim gerilimi14 : 58 - bankacılık sektörü son derece sağlam14 : 23 - yeni yatırım fırsatı : hayvan hastanesi14 : 09 - darphanede grev sona erdihayvan hastanesi sayısı 27'ye ulaştı13 eylül 2013 cuma 09 : 10son güncelleme : 14 : 34evde hayvan besleme modası , sağlıkta yeni bir sektörün doğmasına yol açtı .
ruhsatlı hayvan hastanelerinin sayısı 27'ye çıktı.kezban karaboğai̇stanbul - türkiye 'de hayvan hastanelerinin sayısı 27'ye ulaştı .
sadece istanbul 'da 600 ruhsatlı klinik var .
bu hastanelerin bazılarında profesörler , doçentler , uzman veteriner hekimler çalışıyor.bazı hastanelerdeki hekim kadrosu 10'u buluyor .
anatolia hayvan hastanesinde 2 uzman , 7 veteriner hekim , 1 danışman profesör , bir cerrahi doçent , toplam 28 personel var .
i̇stanbul vet - line 6 katlı binada 22 kadroyla hizmet veriyor .
yine eskişehir sempati hayvan hastanesi 4 katlı binada faaliyet gösteriyor .
anadolu 'nun en büyük hastanesi olarak biliniyor.bu hastenelerde en az 70 lira muayene ücreti alınıyor .
rakam 100 lirayı bulabiliyor .
türkiye 'deki sayısı 33 bini bulan veteriner hekimler , birleşerek klinikler , hastaneler kuruyor .
özel klinisyenlerin sayısının 6-7 bin civarında olduğu tahmin ediliyor .
sektörün gelişimi eğitim alanına yansıdı .
veteriner hekimlik fakültesi sayısı ise 20'yi geçti .
evde hayvan besleme , hayvanları aile bireyi olarak görme , aile bütçesinden harcama yapma eğilimi artıyor .
türkiye 'de evinde , sokakta , bahçesinde çiftliğinde kedi köpek besleyenlerin sayısının 4 milyona ulaştığı tahmin ediliyor .
sektör sadece hastane , poliklinik , muayene değil aynı zamanda pet , aksesuar , mama , diğer hizmetler kuaför , pansiyon , yetiştiricilik vb. hizmet alanlarıyla birlikte sürekli büyüyor .
hem toplamda hayvan sahipliği sayısı hem de nitelikli hizmet talebi artıyor .
giderek daha fazla insan veteriner sağlık hizmeti alıyor , aşılama yaptırıyor .
artık insanlar sahip oldukları hayvanlar için karne almak , kulak küpesi yaptırmak veya hayvanını bir veteriner hekime veya en azından bir barınağa götürerek kısırlaştırılıp aşılanmasının gerekli olduğunu düşünüyor .
bu da koca bir sektörün doğmasına yolaçtı .
sektördeki gelişme yeni iş kapıları açıyor , klinikler , hastaneler , hayvan otelleri doğuyor .
komplike cerrahi operasyonların her klinikte yapılamaması nedeniyle girişimci veteriner hekimler bir araya gelerek , maliyetleri de minimize edebilmek için , hayvan hasteneleri kuruyor .
hayvan hastanelerinde tıpkı insan hekimliğinde olduğu gibi doğum , cerrahi , dahiliye gibi departmanlar oluşturuluyor .
hatta bunlar da kendi içlerinde dermatoloji , transfüzyon gibi benzeri bölümlere ayrılıyor.i̇stanbul veteriner hekimler birliği başkanı prof. dr. murat arslan , " hekimlerimiz arasında aynı sokağa ayrı ayrı birer klinik açmak yerine bir araya gelip tek bir mekanda poliklinik ya da hastane açma eğilimi var .
bu maliyetleri de düşürüyor .
bazı teknik sorunlar var ama o sorunları da aşalabilirlerse yakın zamanda hastane sayısının daha da artacağını düşünüyorum .
27 hastane içinde büyük hayvanlara hizmet veren yetiştirici birliklerinin kurduğu hastaneler var .
hayvan hastaneleri açıyorlar .
bunları da kattığımızda önümüzdeki 5-10 yıl içinde hem hastane sayısı hem de nitelikli hizmet miktarının artacağını , hayvan hastanelerinin sayısının 2'ye katlanacağını hatta bunu geçebileceğini düşünüyorum " dedi.özel hayvan kan bankası açılacakoperasyonlar için sağlıklı kan kaynağı bulamadıklarını belirten prof. dr. murat arslan , " i̇stanbul üniversitesi 'nde hayvan kan bankasını 2006 yılında açtık .
ancak şu anda teknik nedenlerle kurumdaki çalışmalar yavaşlamış durumda .
kan gurubu tayini yapıyoruz fakat bir veteriner kliniğinde kan ihtiyacı olduğunda gönderemiyoruz .
teknik sorunları hallettikten sonra yeniden çalışmaya devam edeceğiz .
asıl olarak türkiye 'de özel bir hayvan kan bankasına ihtiyaç var .
şu anda mevuzat çalışılıyor .
o tamamlanırsa türkiye 'de özel kan bankası açılacak " dedi.göz ameliyatı bin 750 lirai̇stanbul 'da hayvan hastanelerinde asgari muayene ücreti kedi ve köpekte 70 lira .
bu rakam büyük baş hayvanda daha fazla .
örneğin kedi için katarakt operasyonu 1.275 lira .
bu operasyon fako cihazıyla yapıldığında 1.750 liraya çıkıyor .
apse tedavisi 220 lirayken küçük doku yırtığı 180 , büyük doku yırtığı 485 lira .
yapılması zorunlu aşılardan rabies yani kuduz aşısı kedi ve köpekte de aynı fiyat yani 45 lira.1.5 milyon lira yatırım gerekiyortürkiye 'de yaklaşık 1.5 milyon liralık yatırımla bir hayvan hastanesi açmanın mümkün olduğunu belirten murat arslan , " i̇ngiltere 'de 2009 yılında 15 milyon sterlin yatırımla hayvan hastanesi açıldı .
bu hastanede beşeri hastanelerde bulunan mr 'dan ultrasona cerrahi bazı teşhis cihazlarından kanser departmanlarına kadar her türlü her türlü makine ve teknik teçhiza , fizyoterapi , ortopedi departmanlarına kadar hepsi var .
türkiye 'de de giderek gelişiyor .
bunu mama sektörünün gelişmesinden görüyoruz .
talep artıyor " diye konuştu.i̇htisas hayvan hastaneleri açılacakhayvan hastaneleri beşeri hastaneler gibi ihtisaslaşıyor .
bazı poliklinikler , hastaneler örneğin sadece gözle ilgili muayene , teşhis ve tedavi yapıyor .
aşı ya da başka bir hizmet vermiyor .
diş ve dermatoloji yani deri hastalıkları , dahili vakalarda ve özellikle cerrahide giderek ihtisaslaşma yaşanıyor .
murat arslan , " i̇htisaslaşma nedeniyle gelecekte ihtisas hastaneleri , cerrahi merkezleri , poliklinikleri açılabilir , bu yönde düşünen meslektaşlarımız var " dedi . ' üretim ve eğitim çiftliği kurmalıyız 'murat arslan ilginç bir noktaya da dikkat çekiyor .
türkiye 'deki kedi ve köpeklerin çoğunun kaçak yollardan türkiye 'ye getirldiğini belirten arslan , " hükümetin zaman geçirmeden kedi ve köpekte üretim yeri için teşvik vermesi gerekiyor .
bizde üretim yok .
türkiye 'de üretim yüzde 1-2 .
türkiye 'kiler yerli ırk değil .
daha çok doğu bloku ülkelerinden aracın arkasında , valizde vb. yollarla gelen hayvanlar .
bu hayvancılığımız , toplum sağlığı ve ekonomik açıdan riskli ve kötü .
kontrolsüz geldiği için hastalık taşıyabilir .
ekonomik kayıp çünkü yurt dışına sürekli para gönderiyoruz .
yavaş yavaş kurulmaya başlandı eğer devlet de üretim yerlerine tıpkı büyük baş küçük başta olduğu gibi çok da büyük olmayan bir teşvik verirse hem burada üretiriz hem de kaçakçılığı önlemiş oluruz " diye konuştu.i̇stanbul 'da 1 milyon kedi köpek vari̇stanbul 'da 600 veteriner hekim kliniği var .
murat arslan , bu rakamdan yola çıkarak i̇stanbul 'daki hayvan sayısının sahipli ve kayıtlı pet ( kedi-köpek ) sayının yaklaşık 1 mliyon olduğunu söyledi.hayvan hastanesi açmak için ne yapmak gerekir ? girişimci veteriner hekimlerin hayvan hastanesi kurabilmesi için gıda , tarım ve hayvancılık bakanlığı 'nın hayvan hastaneleri yönetmeliğinde belirtilen şartlara uymaları gerekiyor .
buna göre hazırlık yapıp bakanlığa başvuru yapılıyor .
örneğin en az 5 hekimi istihdam etmeniz gerekiyor .
bu hekimler arasında yönetici konumunda bir sorumlu hekim ve ayrıca dahiliye , cerrahi veya doğum konusunda doktorasını yapmış bir uzman veteriner hekimin olması gerekiyor .
ayrıca yardımcı personel ve anestezi uzmanları da olmalı .
bir hastanede 20-25 kişilik bir ekibin olması gerekiyor.animalia hayvan hastanesi veteriner hekimi i̇lhan gökgöl : ' yılda 18 bin hastaya bakıyoruz ' " animalia hayvan hastanesi 1992'de levent 'te kuruldu .
2009'da gökgöl animallia hayvan polikliniği olarak yeniden yapılandık .
yılda ortalama 18 bin hasta görüyoruz .
bu rakamın ortalama 2 bin kadarı operasyon için gelen hastalarımızdan oluşuyor .
her tür operasyonu kliniğimizde yapabiliyoruz .
18-20 hasta yatarak , ayakta bakım için 4 poliniğimiz var .
özel hastane ve polikliniklerin artışı sektördeki talep ve verilen hizmet kalitesinden kaynaklanıyor .
önümüzdeki 5 yılda bu büyüme devam eder .
en büyük problemimiz hayvan sayısının net bilinmememesi .
hayvan sayısındaki artış ivmeleri düşük .
evcil hayvan sahipliği gelecekte artacaktır .
yeni kuşaklar daha yoğun hayvan sevgisiyle geliyor . " anatolia hayvan hastanesi veteriner hekimi suhat eren : ' her türlü operasyon için teknik donanımız var 'anatolia hayvan hastanesi , 1995'te kadıköy şaşkınbakkal 'da açıldı .
18 yıldır faaliyet gösteriyoruz .
yedi gün 24 saat açığız .
yirmi kişilik kadromuzda bir danışman profesör , kadrolu doçent , tecrübeli hekimlerimiz ve yardımcı personelimiz var .
operasyonlarımızı cerrahi doçenti ve anestezi konusunda uzman hekimimizle birlikte üç kişilik bir ekip her gün yapıyor .
her türlü operasyonu gerçekleştirecek teknik donanımız var .
kapalı devre anestezi ile göğüs cerrahisi , her türlü kırıklar ve geriatri hastalardaki müdahaleler dahil hastanemizde uyguluyoruz .
hastanemizde 10 adet büyük köpek ve 30 adet kedi veya küçük köpek toplam 40 pet yatırabiliyoruz .
renkli dopler , cr xray ve kan tahlil cihazları var .
dört muayene odası , bir ameliyathanesi ve yoğun bakım odası ile aynı anda hem ameliyat yapıp hem dört hastayı muayenesini ve tahlillerini yapabiliriz . hastane adı i̇li1 anatolia hayvan hastanesi i̇stanbul2 sempati hayvan hastanesi eskişehir3 animalia hayvan hastanesi i̇stanbul4 vet hospital hayvan hastanesi ankara5 vet-line hayvan hastanesi i̇stanbul6 terapi hayvan hastanesi i̇zmir7 türkyie jokey klübü yarış atları hastanesi i̇stanbul8 i̇nternational veterinary hospital antalya9 atlantis pet hastanesi muğla10 tjk i̇zmir hipodromu yarış atları hastanesi i̇zmir11 antalya damızlık sığır yetiştiricileri birli .

nato begins macedonia mission mixers sinelyuhan ang isang puwesto sa quarters | psn palaro , pilipino star ngayon sections , pilipino star ngayon | philstar.com manila , philippines - dumiretso ang san mig coffee sa kanilang ikaapat na sunod na arangkada matapos gibain ang barako bull , 81-77 , at makapasok sa top four sa quarterfinal round ng 2013 pba go ­ vernor ’ s cup kahapon sa smart araneta coliseum .
umiskor si import marqus blakely ng 22 points , habang nagdagdag naman sina allein maliksi at mark barroca ng 18 at 12 markers , ayon sa pagkakasunod , para sa mixers .
ang top four team sa quarterfinals ang magkakaroon ng ‘ twice-to-beat ’ advantage laban sa apat na koponang mahuhulog sa lower bracket .
matapos kunin ng mi ­ xers ang 64-58 abante sa pagsisimula ng fourth period mula sa dalawang free throws ni maliksi ay isang 17-2 atake ang ginawa nina import michael singletary , mark macapagal at dave marcelo para sa 75-66 kalamangan ng energy sa gitna ng nasabing yugto .
nagtuwang naman sina blakely , maliksi at bar ­ roca para itabla ang mixers sa energy , 77-77 sa huling 45.2 segundo .
ang turnover ni single ­ tary sa posesyon ng ener ­ ­ gy ang nagresulta sa dalawang free throws ni barroca buhat sa foul ni danny seigle para sa 79-77 abante ng mixers sa natitirang 18.3 segundo .
sa ikalawang laro , nagsalpak si mac baracael ng tatlong free throws sa natitirang 0.3 segundo matapos ma-foul sa 3-point line para tulungan ang barangay ginebra sa 101-100 paglusot sa nagdedepensang rain or shine .

now he gets periodic gifts of bison jerky as a thank you they may offer support during times of stress , but for now they are " dead money " within a portfolio , he says .
" i never feel annoyed or upset that i have to get up or go to the office .
i 'm getting paid to do what i like to do anyway – help people , and talk about the markets . "
now that he 's older and wiser , zier accepts that knowledge like that can be elusive .
" the market is always changing ; it 's like a puzzle or a game that you can never win because someone rewrites the rules or hides a piece , and you have to go back to try to figure out what has happened , " he says .
" but at least i now feel that i understand the principles and how it works . "
lapann has only recently hired a manager who uses dividend-paying stocks .
" i had to ask myself , have i been missing out on something here by being a contrarian ? "
" it was almost a given that lapann would hang out his own shingle after a spell in portfolio management at pell rudman : he hails from a long line of entrepreneurs .
at the other end of the spectrum , lapann is hiring managers to scour the landscape for companies that are growing sustainably at a more rapid clip than the global economy .
one is swedish radiation-therapy equipment manufacturer elekta francais 's lowest grades in college were in accounting and taxation -- but he ended up as a tax partner at deloitte before moving on to aspiriant .
an entrepreneur asked francais to help him identify which of his two sons , rivals since childhood , was best-suited to take over the reins at the family-owned firm .
" one of the sons called one of the interviews i did ' the spanish inquisition , ' " he says .
the transition was successful and all the family members are still speaking to each other . "
the best bet in stocks now , he maintains , are blue-chips with the ability to access new markets and use technology to cut costs ; apple as a teenager , brighton saw people in his parents ' well-off social circle – ivy league-educated , working as professionals – make big financial errors .
so he resolved at an early age that he wouldn 't do the same .
he also said , at the end of the month , tra is in a good position to know how much each efd user has to pay as a monthly vat obligation .
he urged the public to go to the tra offices for clarification on tax matters and why it is vital to put in place proper issuing of receipts in the sale of goods .
poursuivons , pour la dernière semaine , sur le sujet du lexique de l ’ immobilier .
commençons cette chronique par trois emprunts intégraux à l ’ anglais : home staging , relooking et walk-in .
bien qu ’ ils soient fréquemment usités , hormis peut-être relooking , ces vocables ne correspondent pas au système du français , particulièrement sur le plan de la graphie et de la prononciation.le home staging consiste à rendre une habitation plus attrayante afin d ’ accélérer sa vente et d ’ en obtenir un meilleur prix .
il existe trois syntagmes français qui traduisent parfaitement et clairement cette opération : valorisation immobilière , valorisation résidentielle et mise en valeur de propriété , que je préconise.pour ce qui est de relooking , c ’ est plus compliqué .
pour ceux qui l ’ ignorent , il s ’ agit de l ’ art de transformer une pièce à peu de frais .
les ouvrages de référence sont peu loquaces à ce sujet .
bien que relooking semble faire partie du jargon de l ’ immobilier , je vous propose de recourir à « changement de décor à peu de frais .
je sais , c ’ est un peu long .
il existe un autre vocable qui pourrait faire l ’ affaire : restylage , qui est cependant surtout usité dans le domaine de la mode .
walk-in & hellip ; j ’ estime que ce mot n ’ a pas sa place dans notre vocabulaire .
exprimons-nous en français : salle-penderie !
on peut toujours aussi employer vestiaire , commun en france .
sachez toutefois que le vestiaire désigne aussi un meuble où l ’ on range les vêtements .
au québec , on a plutôt tendance à associer ce terme à la pièce où les membres d ’ une équipe sportive laissent leurs vêtements pendant qu ’ ils pratiquent leur sport .
l ’ anglicisme chambre des joueurs est , bien entendu , à éviter ici.ce qu ’ on appelle au québec une balayeuse est plutôt un aspirateur .
la balayeuse est soit une employée de la voirie qui balaie les rues , soit un véhicule équipé pour le nettoyage des voies publiques.enfin , le populaire bain-tourbillon , calque de l ’ anglais « whirlpool bath .
on dira mieux : baignoire à remous , baignoire d ’ hydromassage ou encore baignoire à hydromassage .
après tout , l ’ hydromassage est beaucoup plus satisfaisant ( et plus relaxant ) que le tourbillon !
à moins d ’ aimer les sensations fortes & hellip ; puis-je me permettre d ’ ajouter « mon grain de sel » , avec votre accord ?
relooking peut aussi se traduire par « relooker » ou « revisiter » au sens figuré walk-in , en effet peut se traduire par « penderie » l ’ endroit où l ’ on pend les vêtements .
quand à vestiaire , ce mot est surtout utilisé dans les stades pour sportif .
j ’ aime bien cette rubrique « en français s ’ il vous plait » qui toujours intéressante , bien qu ’ un peu courte .

i don ’ t consider myself well read by any means .
when i look into a library , i am embarrassed by the fact that even if i were to spend the rest of my life drowning in the sea of books , i wouldn ’ t even make it out of the kiddie pool before my hair grayed and my arms sagged and i breathed my last weak , little breath over a page of tolstoy or chemometrics for pattern recognition .
i would die without making a dent in the avalanche of books .
vonnegut is great because he writes not as a man who wishes to be remembered but as a man who wishes to remember man .
and like humankind who is a cluster of paradoxes , hypocrisies , and illogical policies , vonnegut writes with a curious blend of wisdom and bitterness , wit and resignation , and an endless nose thumbing at the universe .
all in all , vonnegut is a funny man who blurs the subtlety of sadness and happiness in life because as he said in a man without a country , “ life is no way to treat an animal . ”
below is a kurt vonnegut bookbag of sorts because if you read nothing else or if you decide that the flurry of books is too daunting , then kurt vonnegut is a good place to start and end your literary escapade .
it ’ s enough , but just barely and so it goes , vonnegut would tell you .
arguably vonnegut ’ s most recognized and quoted book , slaughterhouse five is not so much an antiwar book ( there ’ s better luck in “ writing an anti-glacier book ” ) as it is a discussion of the inevitability of hardship , dying , and those brief illusions of a controlled , stable reality .
employing the harrowing yet uplifting phrase that appears detached from the prose it self – so it goes – the narrative suggests an acquiescence to a life , and ultimately death , that we can barely call our own due to circumstances that we are as much in control of as a bird in a birdcage .
the story ends that way too – birds chirp and chirp and chirp again .
in a class assignment : “ do not bubble .
do not spin your wheels .
use words i know . ”

the following guidelines are not intended as restraints to the enjoyment of park visitors , but as aids for orderly operation , visitor safety and for the protection of the environment and public property .
complete rules and regulations are posted at the entrances to all campgrounds and copies are available at entry stations .
all campers and their visitors are required to register at the entry station .
reservations for individual and group campsites can be made by calling 1-877-444-6777 or on the web atwww.reserveusa.com.

" now i am free to do my work .

i 'm not happy with this job , but i have to do this because i have no choice , " she says quietly .
" if i could get a good job , i would give this job up immediately but i can 't .
i 'm illiterate .
i can do this up to the age of 40 .
then i don 't know what [ i will do ] , " she adds .
her voice is soft and her laughter rings out , echoing the jangle of the gold bangles which adorn her wrists .
" i was also happy .
i was tired of being an immigrant in other countries .
i wanted to be home .
now there is democracy [ but ] there are no jobs . "

if i did not do that i would not eat .

bissau , 10 septembre 2013 ( afp ) - un projet de loi qui visait à accorder une amnistie aux auteurs du coup d 'etat du 12 avril 2012 en guinée-bissau a été rejeté mardi par l 'assemblée nationale de ce pays , où le putsch a ouvert la voie à une transition toujours en cours , a constaté un journaliste de l 'afp .
guinea-bissau guinée-bissau : la transition suit son cours , affirme le représentant spécial au conseil de sécurité 5 septembre 2013 – en dépit du retard que pourrait prendre les élections prévues en novembre , la guinée-bissau enregistre des progrès sur le plan politique et la situation sécuritaire est calme , a déclaré jeudi un haut fonctionnaire de l 'onu aux membres du conseil de sécurité .
l 'afrique de l ’ ouest peut être divisée en trois zones agro-écologiques ou en trois bassins commerciaux ( bassins de l ’ ouest , bassin du centre , bassin de l ’ est ) .
les deux sont importants pour l 'interprétation du comportement et de la dynamique du marché .
guinea-bissau is one of the poorest countries in the world , where the prevalence of malnutrition and food insecurity is persistently high .
political instability has led to severe disruption and suspension of united nations development programmes with the exception of humanitarian interventions .
the transitional government appointed by the military command is not yet recognized by the majority of the international community .
new restrictions on abortion may limit women ’ s access to health care services – stateline nouriel roubini has been ordered by nyc to remove his hot tub — often the site of wild parties with younger models — from his manhattan penthouse 's roof , according to a report .
the singer is cashing out of the mansion market , listing two of her trophy properties in florida and montreal for a total of more than $ 100 million .

pananglit sa gipaambit ni ruth rances mahitungod sa kahimtang sa iyang igsoon nga si rosenda .
may sakit nga diabetes si rosenda ug nagtumar og tambal matag adlaw .
nahutdan siya sa tambal apan way botika nga nangabli .
gawas ini problema sab ang ipalit kay sirado ang mga bangko .
isip public school teacher , ang suweldo ni rosinda adto kuhaon sa land bank .
unya kay sirado man .
mao nga di lang kahadlok mas labaw pa sa gibartolina ang iyang kahimtang ug sa tanan nga biktima sa pagpanghasi sa mnlf .
dugay na nakong nakaila si ruth .
niadtong panahon nga buhi pa si sir danny bernardo ug nag-alagad isip manager sa abs cbn cebu , iya ko nga gipailaila sa grupo nga gitawag og hermanos y hermanas de zamboanga .
kahugpongan kini sa mga taga zamboanga city nga nia na manimuyo sa sugbo .
niadtong panahona nahimamat nako ang magtiayon nga nilo ug linda to nga aktibo sa kalihukan sa maong grupo .
usa sa ilang proyekto mao ang pagpabarug sa nuestra senora del pilar shrine diha sa barangay kalunasan .
mao ni ang patron sa zamboanga city nga mag fiesta karong oktubre 12 .
si sir danny nagsilbi nga die hard nga supporter sa maong grupo sanglit lumad man sab siya nga taga zamboanga city .
ang grupo nila ni ruth nanawagan og mga pag-ampo alang sa dinalian nga kasulbaran sa krisis sa zamboanga city .
ang ilang grupo nga gipangulohan ni elmer bailio nipadayag og kabalaka basin maapektuhan ang liboan ka tinun-an nga taga zamboanga city ug nia magtungha sa sugbo .
kini gumikan sa paghunong sa serbisyo sa mga patigayon pagpadangat og salapi gikan didto padung dinhi .
nanghinaot sila nga sabton sa mga eskwelahan ug mga tagdumala og boarding house ang sitwasyon ning maong mga tinun-an .
busa kitang tanan nga nakasabot sa kapait nga nahiagoman sa mga zamboangeño motabang unta sa hiniusang lakang alang sa dinaliang pagbangon sa zamboanga city human sa krisis .
bisan unsa nga atong matampo ato kanang buhaton .
sa mga local government unit unta , nakasugod namo karon pagplano sa sarang nga inyong matampo .
tabangan nato nga makabarug og sayo ang mga zamboangeño .
supposedly the worst month of the year for stocks , september has pretty much stuck its thumb in the eye of the naysayers .
backyard bbqvideo clips from the backyard bbq with " too tall " tom szymanski .
1974 .
steve jobs est un jeune hippie âgé de 19 ans qui étudie à college reed , à portland , dans l ’ état de l ’ oregon .
il a abandonné ses études , mais suit toujours quelques cours , sous la permission du recteur .
il consomme régulièrement du lsd , est influencé par la culture zen et suit d ’ intenses régimes à base de fruits et de légumes .
il ne le sait pas encore , mais il révolutionnera le monde de l ’ informatique , et en conséquence , notre société tout entière .
ce qu ’ il sait cependant , c ’ est qu ’ il accomplira de grandes choses et sur ce point , il ne s ’ est pas trompé .
ma vision du personnage peut être quelque peu biaisée puisque j ’ adore steve jobs , de son ambition démesurée et de son inaltérable confiance en lui à sa capacité à convaincre même les plus sceptiques d ’ entre nous .
j ’ ai vu plusieurs documentaires sur cet homme et je lis actuellement sa biographie écrite par walter isaacson , un ouvrage fort complet basé sur maintes entrevues réalisées avec steve jobs lui-même , ainsi qu ’ avec les personnes qui ont été proches de lui durant sa vie personnelle et professionnelle .
à la lumière de ces informations , qu ’ en est-il du film jobs réalisé par michael stern et produit par mark hulme et ashton kutcher ?
cette production américaine a reçu des critiques très mitigées et la mienne l ’ est également , car jobs comporte des hauts comme des bas .
d ’ abord , si vous ne connaissez pas steve jobs , ne vous basez pas sur ce film pour vous en faire une opinion favorable ou défavorable .
steve jobs , qui a perdu son combat contre le cancer le 5 octobre 2011 , était une personne à la personnalité très complexe .
on le dépeint comme un homme arrogant , colérique , méprisant , irrespectueux d ’ autrui , très émotif et sujet aux crises de larmes .
il pousse également ses employés à réaliser l ’ impossible dans des délais impensables , mais c ’ est ce qui a fait d ’ apple l ’ entreprise prospère qu ’ elle représente aujourd ’ hui .
on dit souvent que jobs avait une personnalité très nuancée .
cependant , le film jobs présente un côté blanc et un côté noir de l ’ homme , omettant les nuances de gris qui façonnent son caractère .
le fait est que ce film n ’ est pas basé sur la biographie écrite par isaacson , mais plutôt sur des entrevues réalisées avec des proches qui ont côtoyé jobs .
pourquoi l ’ équipe de réalisation ne s ’ est-elle pas basée sur la biographie de jobs ?
parce que dans les quelques jours qui ont suivi la mort de steve jobs , un autre réalisateur , aaron sorkin , s ’ est empressé d ’ acheter les droits d ’ auteur de l ’ ouvrage afin de réaliser un film entièrement basé sur la biographie de jobs .
ainsi , michael stern et son équipe n ’ ont pu s ’ en inspirer .
beaucoup de critiques s ’ entendent pour dire que steve jobs est une icône qui mérite mieux que l ’ image superficielle et insatisfaisante dépeinte de lui dans le film de stern et je suis de cet avis .
certaines scènes sont très infidèles à la réalité et présente jobs comme un personnage plus vil et méchant qu ’ il ne l ’ a vraiment été .
par ailleurs , le film débute à un moment très pertinent de la vie de jobs , mais la narration prend fin en 2001 , alors que jobs présente le premier ipod .
cela laisse les spectateurs sur leur faim , puisque nous savons tous qu ’ au ipod ont succédé le iphone et le ipad , des appareils qui ont révolutionné l ’ industrie de l ’ informatique .
de plus , les années où steve jobs a quitté apple ( 1985 ) et où il a travaillé avec next computer et plus tard avec pixar , révolutionnant par le fait même le monde de l ’ animation , ont entièrement été passées sous silence dans ce film de deux heures .
et pourtant , ces années nous en apprennent beaucoup sur la force de caractère de ce grand visionnaire .
par contre , le film de stern ne comporte pas que du négatif .
en effet , kutcher y livre une performance impressionnante .
non seulement l ’ acteur ressemble-t-il beaucoup à steve jobs dans son jeune temps , mais aussi s ’ est-il imprégné de son rôle , changeant jusqu ’ à sa façon de marcher et de parler .
il fait un jobs très convaincant , séduisant et intelligent .
quant à la direction artistique du film , certaines scènes sont parfois tournées à la manière d ’ un documentaire , mettant en valeur un côté recherché que j ’ ai bien apprécié .
puis , alors que la bande-annonce présente une chanson très actuelle , can ’ t hold us , de macklemore et ryan lewis , la trame sonore du film est plutôt composée des classiques du rock de l ’ époque .
j ’ ai eu du mal à m ’ habituer au début , mais j ’ ai finalement trouvé qu ’ ainsi , on situe bien les spectateurs dans le contexte de l ’ époque .
enfin , mon verdict final sur le film : j ’ ai bien aimé , malgré les imprécisions .
mais attention : je recommande très fortement aux personnes qui ne connaissent pas steve jobs de compléter leurs connaissances à l ’ aide de documentaires ( notamment le documentaire de 45 minutes , disponible sur youtube , intitulé comment steve jobs a changé le monde ) .
en effet , si l 'on n ’ est pas informé sur le sujet , on peut mal interpréter la situation conflictuelle entre microsoft ( bill gate ) et apple .
j ’ attends malgré tout avec impatience le film de snorkin qui portera sur la vie de steve jobs , mais aucune date de sortie n ’ a encore été annoncée .
le réalisateur est d ’ ailleurs avare de commentaires sur le sujet .
cependant , il a laissé entendre qu ’ un temps d ’ attente entre la sortie des deux films s ’ imposait .
j ’ aime bien le clin d ’ œil adressé par le site word and film : tout comme les premières versions du iphone ou du ipad , la seconde génération est toujours meilleure !
ots : futbal , hokej a akčné filmy v hd kvalite .

it ranges from a low of 0 to 5 , thru 20-30 to highs of 40-50 .
for example , if there is an easterly flow of air at 30 mph at 40,000 ft altitude , and a westerly flow of air at 25mph at 20,000 as they are forming , and we are seeing a lot of that this summer .

" mock sun " ( also " sun dogs " ) is a colloquial term for a phenomenon called " parhelion " which occurs fairly commonly in polar atmospheres .
it is a false image of the sun , created by the bending of rays of sunlight within crystals of ice in the atmosphere .
parhelia are usually observed in pairs , one on each side of the sun and at the same elevation .
they tend to be red-coloured on the side nearest the sun .
parhelia are quite close to the sun when the sun is close to the horizon , but move further away as the angle above the horizon increases .

môžete využiť reklamu na stránke tasr , ako i na jej spravodajskom portáli teraz.sk a magazínovom portáli webmagazin.sk.
účinnú reklamu môžete využiť aj v našich mobilných aplikáciách .
využiť možno viacero reklamných prvkov , napríklad : bannerovú , či textovú reklamu .
prostredníctvom portálov teraz.sk , tasr.sk a webmagazin.sk môžete zasiahnuť viac ako 250 000 unikátnych návštevníkov mesačne . ■ k dispozícii sú štandardné reklamné formáty – od bannerov , reklamných odkazov po pr články ( ots ) .
pokiaľ máte záujem o neštandardné formáty , kontaktujte nás . ■ súťaž – zviditeľnenie spoločnosti alebo produktu prostredníctvom súťaže , nasmerovanie priamo na stránku klienta ■ mobilná reklama - možnosť inzerovať v mobilnej verzii spravodajského portálu teraz.sk.
nový typ inzercie , presné zacielenie na užívateľa , okamžitá reakcia užívateľa .
k dispozícii je bannerová plocha . ■ partnerstvo sekcie - sponzoring vybranej sekcie spravodajského portálu teraz.sk.
pre partnerov sekcií je pripravený mediálny balík podľa požiadavky partnera , za zvýhodnených podmienok ( reklamný odkaz , ots – pr správa , reklamný banner , pripadne logo partnera ) . © copyright 2002-2013 by daily news-record - all rights reserveddiocese of bridgeport tazara workers yet to report for duty na waryoba yankami demand to be paid all dues firstmanagement says cash released & ldquo ; only one month ’ s salary has been paid .

the rodent was in a running wheel converted to steer the volvo.related hamsters stateline – state tax revision often comes with big uncertainties in nebraska , despite the competing forecasts on the income tax , the portion of heineman ’ s plan that may be susceptible to the greatest error is the package of sales exemptions he wants to lift .
the trouble a state like nebraska faces is that when it hasn ’ t been taxing a transaction , it often hasn ’ t had a reason to collect data on it .
like heineman ’ s proposal , louisiana governor bobby jindal ’ s plan — which he is still formulating — will call for removing sales tax exemptions to pay for ending the income tax .
he has said the plan will be revenue-neutral .
jindal has good reasons for that : he ’ s pledged not to raise taxes , but a tax cut likely wouldn ’ t fly in the legislature given the state ’ s serious recent budget troubles .
so neutrality may be the only politically viable option .
in minnesota , von mosch says the department of revenue has been working on dayton ’ s tax plan for months .
yet they ’ re continuing to refine the estimates for the tax on clothing .
“ we are still working on that number , ” von mosch says .

children enjoy acting and role play .
concept of risk .
in reality it is easy .
it is the probability of loss , absolute or relative .
the second major job of a financial planner is to understand his client ’ s attitude to risk .
without understanding this he can ’ t develop a financial plan that will & ldquo ; satisfy & rdquo ; his client .
to work out a clients ’ attitude to risk a planner asks a number of questions like , how would you feel if you lost 20 % of your money in one year ?
how about you were not showing a profit but rather a loss of 20 % after 5 years ?
now the sad reality is most people who go to a financial planner or million $ $ scheme , do so out of greed or need .
and whether they realize it or not they will mislead the planner as to the attitude that they have to risk .
so it is really a bit of a waste of time asking these sorts of questions .
as in reality we are all pre-programmed to a point with an attitude to risk that is constant .
4 / .
and the final and by far the smallest group : & ldquo ; ok it ’ s a bum deal , bit of a shame , stupid me should have seen the writing on the wall earlier .
where is the next poker table as despite it all i still like the game . & rdquo ; the biggest mistake an investor can make in investing is not learning to move on .
winning and moving on is best but not moving on is worse that losing and moving on .
it is the moving on that allows you to use the time in front of you .
not moving on is time and life theft .
now if you are investing , which character type do you want to give your money to ?
the management of vortec were the optimist type .
the best managers of money are the last group , losing and moving on is ok so long as they don ’ t habitually make the same dumb decisions that caused the loss .
the worst fund manager is one who does not know when to move on or get the ball rolling so watch out kiddos you could be next .
so now you see the crisis helps the banks and bank execs not the taxpayers of privacy and our company will act accordingly .

in an interview with the independent he said that the bbc had fallen for lies put out by his political opponents on the eve of a general election in addis ababanext month .
" we captured large amounts of guns and tanks .
we did not need to buy arms .
what we needed was food .
so why would we sell food to buy arms ? "
mr meles said .
" we needed food because by 84-85 we had an extensive liberated area under our control .
but it was terribly hit by famine .
the danger was that the population , on whom we depended , would leave the liberated area and go over to the government area in search of food .
so we needed the food to keep our people in our area .
significantly , that was a year after aregawi berhe had left the area .
it was also a year after a photograph was taken showing a christian aid worker , max peberdy , buying grain from the second rebel quoted by the bbc , gebremedhin araya , who claimed he had duped christian aid by selling them sacks full of sand .
" gebremedhin araya was not the head of finance of the tplf , as has been claimed , " mr meles said .
" he was in no leadership position .
he was just a paramedic . "
christian aid yesterday disclosed that mr peberdy had also left the area a year earlier .

and we do not care for the reports you publish as much as before .
we know that we must undertake those reforms primarily for our own people . "
underlining that the reform process would continue in turkey , bagis said , " we are working on a new democratization package .
it will grant more rights to people with different faiths , cultures and ethnic backgrounds . "
reiterating that publication date of the progress report of turkey coincided with the feast of sacrifice in turkey this year , bagis asked the eu commission to change the publication date of the report .
" this date is a religious feast in turkey , and everyone will be on vacation , " bagis said , adding that it would be better for the report to be published a few days before or after the feast of sacrifice .

pinaghahanap naman ng pulisya ang isang alyas rolly na nangungupahan sa katabing kuwarto ng biktima sa nasabing lugar .
sa ulat ng caloocan city police , dakong alas-5 : 45 ng umaga nang matagpuang walang buhay ng ilang residente ang biktima sa loob ng inuupahang kuwarto ni rolly .
halos mabasag ang bungo ng biktima na hinihinalang pinalo ng matigas na bagay kung saan nasa tabi nito ang isang martilyo na may bahid ng dugo .
ayon sa may-ari ng mga paupahang kuwarto na si rocky lada , dalawang oras bago matagpuan ang bangkay ng biktima ay dumaan sa kanila si rolly na may dalang bag at sinabing may pupuntahan lang aniya ito .

a primera vista , fatima aparentaba tener unos 4 o 5 meses .
pero , en realidad , acababa de cumplir su primer año de vida .
estaba entre los 126.000 niños con desnutrición aguda grave tratados en uno de los 425 centros nutricionales establecidos por el ministerio de salud de chad en 2012 como parte de la expansión de la atención en todo el sahel .

des hausses de prix ont eu lieu plus tôt que prévu dans des centres urbains de la région et dans les zones structurellement déficitaires en raison des flux limités de produits en provenance des régions de production excédentaire .
the year on year rise for the commodity in region ’ s markets was 36 percent .

agence canadienne des m & # 233 ; dicaments et des technologies de la sant & # 233 ; we have all experienced poverty or the effects of poverty .
our experience of poverty may have been due to the simple fact of growing up in a large family , or because of loss – a death in our family , or job loss , or owning a small business that failed .
perhaps it is in a vocation of working with the poor and marginalized .
peace and poverty of spirit are both , not just the lack of something , but the possession of something .
peace is not just the lack of conflict .
peace is the possession of justice .
it is the knowledge that we have a right to be here and to be accepted .
poverty of spirit is not just an emptying of self , but possession of knowledge that we are totally dependent on god .
to give cheerfully , but not in proportion to the needs of the poor .
to give proportionately to the needs of the poor , but only when the poor ask .
to give in a manner where the receiver never knew the giver as when a third person carried the money to the home of the poor .
the most noble of all was to anticipate kindness by preventing poverty .
for example , to pay the debts of another , find him or her a job , educate him or her so that the person is able to obtain livelihood without holding out an empty hand in beggary .
of all the ways in which you can help the poor , the eighth , the highest degree of giving , is championed today by a program of the u.s. catholic bishops .
the height of charity seen by jesus christ was to sell everything and “ come follow me . ”
we know that is not possible for most people to do if they are to assure economic safety of their children in future years .
but paul ’ s admonition that love of god is inseparable from love of neighbor can be taken to heart and to pocketbook .
we can all do so by using the cchd envelopes found in our pews this november .

iaa 2013 kapılarını 12 eylül 'de otomobilseverlere açacak.türkler pazarlıkta avrupalılara göre daha zayıfpazarlık geleneğinin öncüsü olarak bilinen türkler otomobil alırken pazarlık sonucu alınan indirimlerde avrupalılara kıyasla çok geride kaldı.lüks otomobil enflasyonu solladırusya 'ya otomotiv sektörü ihracatı arttıağustos ayında rusya 'ya yapılan otomotiv sektörü ihracatı , geçen yılın aynı dönemine göre yüzde 77,3 arttı.motosiklet satışları yüzde 8.4 arttıotomotiv 8 ayda 2005'i solladıocak-ağustos döneminde , yüzde 9,9 artışla 13 milyar 774 milyon dolar ihracat gerçekleştiren otomotiv sektörü , 13 milyar 59 milyon dolarlık 2005 yılı dış satış rakamını geride bıraktı.toyota temmuz 'da maksimum üretime ulaştıtemmuzda 14 bin 814 adet otomobil üreten toyota türkiye , bu yılki en yüksek üretim rakamını gerçekleştirdi.4 yaş ve üzeri ford 'lara , serviste yaşının 4 katı indirimfiat 500 , " en çevre dostu benzinli otomobili " oldubursa sanayinin ilk 3 devi renault , tofaş ve boschbursa 'daki 250 büyük firma araştırması 2012 yılı sonuçları 'na göre toplam ciroda tofaş liderliği geçen yılın 2'ncisi oyak renault 'a kaptırarak 2'nci sıraya geriledi.otomotivde sıcak rekabetfirmalar ağustos kampanyalarında " 2 yıl sıfır faizli kredi " , " nakit alım indirimi " , " 60 aya kadar düşük faizli kredi " , " 414 liradan başlayan taksitler " ve " kur sabitleme " gibi fırsatlar sunuyor.traktörde üretim ve ihracat azaldıtraktör üretimi temmuz ayında bir önceki yılın aynı ayına göre yüzde 5 , ihracatı ise yüzde 15,2 azaldı.tofaş 'ın ikinci çeyrek kârı 109.2 milyon liraotomobil pazarı yılın ilk yarısında büyüdüotomobil pazarı ocak-haziran döneminde yüzde 19'luk artışla 292 bin adete ulaştı.12345678sonraki sayfa dünya onlinedünya grubu hakkındaonline künyedünya gazetesi künyesiabonelikalışverişrssreklami̇letişimdiğer sitelerimizkobiden.comdunyastore.compcworld.com.trcomputerworld.com.trbyte.com.trdunyagida.com.trdunyainsaat.com.trdünya ekonomi tv diocese of duluth - cet engagement a été pris le mercredi 11 septembre 2013 , lors d ’ une rencontre organisée dans le cadre d ’ une sensibilisation " onuci-tour " , organisée par la mission dans cette localité .

côte d & # 039 ; ivoire l ’ onuci offre une formation en droits de l ’ homme aux gardes pénitentiaires les détenus , en tant qu ’ êtres humains , ont des droits et doivent être traités dans le strict respect de leur dignité humaine : cette affirmation du chef du bureau régional des droits de l ’ homme de l ’ opération des nations unies en côte d ’ ivoire à bondoukou donne tout son sens à la formation sur les respects des droits humains et la protection de l ’ enfance de la mission onusienne à l ’ endroit des gardes pénitentiaires de la prison de bouna , localité située à 620 km au nord-est d ’ abidjan .
cette formation est une initiative de la clinique juridique de bondoukou .

c ’ était à l ’ occasion de la finale du tournoi de football mettant en compétition les villages de denan et sahibly .

le convoi de vingt-deux trucks et deux ambulances a été sécurisé par le contingent marocain de l ’ opération des nations unies en côte d ’ ivoire ( onuci ) , de la frontière ivoirienne pékan barrage jusqu ’ au centre de transit de toulepleu , village à l ’ extrême ouest du pays .

sunod nga mibundak ang kusog nga uwan .
dali nga nidagan si jonathan ug nangita og kapasilungan .
sa usa ka sirado nga auto repair shop nakakita og lugar si nathan kauban ang ubang mga tawo nga nagpasilong usab .
hinay nga nilakat ang kagabhion ug ang ubang mga tawo naghinay-hinay na og lakaw .
ang uban nakakita na og kasakyan , samtang ang uban nakahukom nga suongon na lang ang ulan sa kahadlok nga dugay kining motuang .
apan nagpabilin si jonathan sa nahimutangan .
gikan siya sa trabahuan ug di mahimong mabasa iyahang sapatos ug karsones .
usa pa , wala siya ’ y trabaho ugma ug andam siya magpa-abot bisan pa hangtod mabuntagan .
paglabay sa pipila ka gutlo , aduna ’ y traysikol nga namatyan og makina tungod sa gipasilungan ni jonathan .
dali nga nanaog ang bugtong pasahero niini ug nagpasilong tupad ni jonathan human makighinabi sa drayber .
“ nah , ambot .
dugay-dugay pa man daw maayo .
layu-layo pa raba to amoa ” sumbalik sa maong tawo .
dugay nga nagkahinabi ang duruha hangtod nabantayan nila nga upat na lang sila nga nagpabiling nagpasilong .
nipasiplat si randy sa orasan sa tapad nga bakery ug nabantayan niya nga ala-una na sa kaadlawon hapit .
“ mamainit una ta .
lami kaayo ikaon og init nga puto ug sikwate karong bugnaw ang panahon . “ agda ni randy .
ug nagkauyon ang duha nga mangaon og puto .
sa dili matino nga hinungdan , nawala ang kabalaka ni jonathan nga mabasa iyahang karsones ug sapatos .
wala na kini niya igsapayan .
nasayod lamang siya nga ganahan siya makighigala ni randy bisan kung bag-o lamang kini niya nakaila .
nakahurot og duha ka puto si randy samtang usa lamang ang gikaon ni jonathan .
paghuman og kaon , nihinay na ang uwan ug may pipila na lamang ka lusok sa habuhabo .
nagkasinabot ang duha nga mohapit una sa pampublikong parke sa dili pa magbuwag ilahang dalan .
daw sa susama ilahang taras ug huna-huna nga magkasinabot sila sa daghang butang bisan kung bag-o lang sila nagkahigala .
sa mga gusto motuo , mura sila og soulmate .
tungod sa uwan , mingaw na ang maong parke .
ang kamingaw sa maong lugar gipasamot pa gyud sa kangitngit sa palibot tungod kay gipawong man ang tanang suga niini .
namili ang duha og lingkuranan nga dili kaayo basa .
nagpahimutang sila sa ubos sa kahoy nga acacia .
subli nga nagtabi ang duha mahitungod sa tagsa-tagsa nila ka kinabuhi .
daw sa dugay na sila nagkaila ug komportable na kaayo sila sa usa ’ g usa .
natapos ang maong paghimamat sa laing matang sa painit .
sa kabugnaw sa panahon , gisaw-an nila ang kainit sa usa ’ g usa .
wala nila huna-hunaa ang kabalaka nga may makakita kanila .
malipayon sila sa usa ’ g usa ug mao lamang kini ang labaw ’ ng mahinungdanon alang kanila .
sa huna-huna ni jonathan , andam siya mosugal sa maong relasyon .
nakita na niya ang dugay na niyang gipangita .
apan magmalampuson ug motunhay ba kaha ang usa ka relasyon nga nagsugod niining paagiha ?
may sukaranan ba ang panghinaot ug paglaom ni jonathan ?

le mandat comprenait : l 'évaluation de l 'efficacité des activités de dépollution de la zone de mpila à brazzaville ; l 'évaluation des processus de coordination entre les autorités nationales , l 'équipe de l ’ action contre les mines des nations unies ( unmat ) , les partenaires d 'exécution , les bailleurs de fonds et les autres parties prenantes ; cameroon + 5 others la délégation régionale du cicr à yaoundé établie à yaoundé ( cameroun ) depuis 1992 , la délégation régionale du cicr pour l ’ afrique centrale soutient la mise en œuvre du droit international humanitaire en angola , au cameroun , au gabon , en guinée équatoriale , en république du congo et à sao tomé-et-principe .
elle apporte également protection et assistance aux personnes déplacées par la violence , réalise des activités de rétablissement des liens familiaux , visite des détenus et soutient le développement des sociétés nationales de la croix-rouge de la région .
democratic republic of the congo + 11 others rapport du secrétaire général sur les activités du bureau régional des nations unies pour l ’ afrique centrale et les zones où sévit l ’ armée de résistance du seigneur ( s / 2012 / 923 ) registered users can request assistance from our professional editors . biazon sa mga empleyado : ‘ back to mother unit ’ | psn metro , pilipino star ngayon sections , pilipino star ngayon | philstar.com manila , philippines - pinabalik ni customs commissioner ruffy biazon ang mga tauhan ng ahensiya sa kanilang mga mother unit .
ayon kay biazon , ang kanyang kautusan ay bahagi ng ipinatutupad na reporma sa boc . aniya , lahat ng personnel ng boc , anuman ang ranggo , position , designation at kasalukuyang assignment , ay dapat na bumalik sa kanilang mother units .
nilinaw din ng komis ­ yuner na current designations o assignments ng customs personnel ay pinawawalang-bisa niya o ordered revoked .
ito ’ y matapos namang aprubahan ni finance secretary cesar v. purisima .
epektibo ang kautusan noong biyernes kung saan tinatanggal na sa kanilang assignment ang lahat ng supervising customs ope ­ rating officers ( svcoo ) at customs operations officers iii ( coo iii ) .
ngayong araw naman ang ikalawang batch ng boc employee na mari-relieve ay ang lahat ng chief customs operations officers at customs operations officers v ( coo v ) habang ang ibang opisyal at kawani ay matatanggal sa kanilang kasalukuyang designations sa september 17 , 2013 .
lahat umano ng officials at employees na apek ­ tado ng nasabing cpo ay binibigyan ng 10 araw upang magreport sa kanilang permanent unit .
sa september 27 , 2013 , lahat ng kawani ng boc ay dapat na umanong nasa kanilang mga permanent positions .
i am glad the civic center is being used . i have a clear memory of freshman bball tryouts where i stole the ball , dribbled the length of the court , and blew the layup . it 's no wonder i didn 't make the team . we had freshman football practice in the field to the right of it .
we had good teachers . they put up with our nonsense and somehow managed to put a certain amount of information in our heads .
mr. morgan , especially , had a impact on my learning . many of the things he tought us back then , i still use everyday in the running of my business .
by the way , you don 't happen to have a brother names donny , do you ?
i mentioned him in an earlier post . i remember him as an awesome baseball player ( pitcher ) . he had a bazooka for an arm . we played on a combined ( city & base ) allstar team , i believe , in ' 65 . i think he was a year or two older than me , so he would have graduated in ' 67 or ' 68 . just curious .
anyway , i was 13-15 when we lived there and that age and time has a special place in my memory .
so who are you ?
you brave soul !
i 'm sure don knows who you are , but i 'll forget to ask him !
i was an airman at glasgow afb . it was in december of 1966 . i had gone into town on a friday evening . i had been scheduled to take the sat test the next day at the high school . i stayed in a local motel or hotel , and bright and early the next morning , i was up and ready .
i got out of the air force the following june , left glasgow afb , and went to the university of maine . i got my degree , became an english teacher in portland , maine , and i went on to get my master 's . i retired in 1998 , and my wife and i moved to california .
as for school . it was an experience of getting my butt kicked most of the time . it seems as though i fought for three years and never won a battle . the pe teacher ( don 't remember his name ) used to add to the humiliation by giving me swats with the wooden paddle that i would have to go get in the vp office and then get swatted in front of the entire class . that sucked !
i 'm 59 and i still remember those vivid moments !
i was on the wrestling team in the 9th grade but never won . i wasn 't good enough for the football team so i was one of the team managers. don 't know if you read the earlier posts but i , too , lived in one of the trailer parks between the base and galsgow and bused into town---do you remember any othe the ' walker 's ' ? ? ? ?
i seem to recall someone by the name of francis ( ? ? ? ? )
i think that was a friend of my older brothers and sister who had a pet skunk . i think i almost knocked him out one time with a soup ladel .
was that you ? ? ?
did you ever find a picture of the old high school ?
its a reasonably sharp print and shows the old building as it was back in the 50 's and 60 's .
reg clemons.reg clemons posted : 2009-09-09 12 : 20 : 04 im am tickled too learn of your past and how things were and how things are now keep up the typing very interesting terms of use what is america 's broadband agenda ? | christina gagnier as the birthplace of the internet , there are those who continuously clamor for the united states to be " number one " when it comes to broadband .
at a crossroads where we are figuring out the best way to manage the growth of our country 's broadband , a fair question arises : what is america 's broadband agenda today ? great post. it can 't be understated how critical an issue broadband access is to the future .
it needs to be treated as a vital utility in this country ( like gas and electricity ) and not as an accessory for the privileged or as a simple piece of infrastructure ( like , sadly , our nation 's outdated bridges ) .

not too far off , but far enough that we must consider what we can be .
to advance the cause of students we must now turn our eye to the classroom .
i continue to believe that literacy is the key to long-term success .
and so tonight i again ask you to take the necessary steps to ensure that every nevada child can read by grade three .
if we expect children to read by three , we cannot continue to ignore all of the data that tells us all-day kindergarten is a critical foundation for a child ’ s success .
teach for america has helped make a difference in the lives of hundreds of nevada ’ s students .
to all our current jag students and specialists , thank you for setting an example across the state .
i am pleased to have the chancellor both as a member of my cabinet and as an active member of the state economic development board .
with the chancellor ’ s support , we are creating new courses of study at unr and unlv focused specifically on the sectors we are targeting for economic growth .
let me be clear … nevada ’ s employers cannot afford higher taxes , and i will not support them .
the promise of these ideas is real .
the chance to innovate is exciting .
but even as we work to modernize our economy and set a new course toward a brighter economic future , we must address the consequences of the prolonged economic downturn .
ladies and gentlemen , by doing all of these things , we are laying the groundwork for the future of our children and their families .
they are the foundation of my budget and will continue to be the primary focus of my administration .
in this budget , we ’ ve reduced the tax burden on local businesses , we ’ ve addressed increasing caseloads and we ’ ve begun to diversify our economy .
the social service net is stronger .
support for education is increased .
and nevadans will continue to benefit from the over-arching policy of this administration throughout this economic downturn – that is , we cannot cut our way out , we cannot tax our way out , we can only grow our way out .
nevada gave women the right to vote in 1914 , five years before the rest of the nation adopted the 19th amendment in 1919 .
it is my hope that the celebration of women ’ s suffrage and the commemoration of nevada ’ s 150th birthday will provide a joint platform for examining who we are – and who we can be .
nevadans are rightfully proud of their history .
we are also cognizant of the world around us .
and we are ever mindful of those students whose faces inspire us to plan big for a bright future .
the table has been set by economic improvements , and we can now see a light at the end of the tunnel .
but problems persist , and they demand our attention .
i am proud to be your governor , and i am proud to call the state of nevada my home. have jitters , but no doubts .
i ’ m excited and i want important for all to ask , “ who is not at the developed by myoffice it 's homecoming week for bob davie | kob.com edición actualtagbilaran bohol pldt telephone directory - ddc calibration center - descallar ma corazon go to the bottom of the page and click on partner login.once login go to the web content portlet ( firt portlet on top ) there you will see multiple tabs , click on feedsclick on add feeda form will come up , on the id shoose ' autogenerate id ' discussions " that could lead to an agreement in the un security council to " encouraging signs in recent days " and announced that he was sending us ako po ay sampung taon nang hiwalay sa asawa .
nagkaroon po ako ng lover na kaibigan ng mister ko , may asawa rin na lately ay nalaman kong schoolmate ko sa aming lalawigan .
nakakatatlong taon pa lang kami ni melo nang bigla siyang manlamig sa hindi ko malamang dahilan .
marami pa naman siyang utang sa akin .
nagkakilala kami dahil sa madalas na pagkakakitaan sa casino kung saan ako naglalaro ng slot machine .
kahihiwalay pa lang namin ng asawa ko noon .
sa akin siya nangungutang kapag natatalo na siya sa pagsusugal .
at dahil sa nangyayari sa amin ay na-realize ko na ginawa lang niya akong “ sugar mommy ” at past time nung magkagalit sila ng kanyang asawa .
minsan ay inimbitahan niya ako sa birthday ng kanyang panganay at noon ko nakilala ang asawa niya na dati kong schoolmate sa public high school sa aming probinsiya , si melany .
at dahil sa galit ko kay melo na pinasakay lang ako sa kanyang bitag ay pinuntahan ko si melany at ipinagtapat ang lahat-lahat .
ang feeling ko dr. love , may ibang babae nang nagagatasan si melo kaya basta na lang ako iniwan .
kalimutan mo na siya .
tungkol naman sa utang , maaari siguro idaan sa legal kung hindi basta-basta ang halaga para mabawi mo ito sa kanya .
ngayon naging malinaw na sa iyo ang tunay na kalagayan mo sa lover mo , huwag mong hayaan na masira nang tuluyan ang disposisyon mo sa buhay dahil lang sa ires ­ ponsableng lalaki .
naniniwala ako na kung nagawa niya ang panloloko sa kanyang asawa , ano pa kaya sa hindi niya pinakasalan at naging paraan niya lang para matugunan ang bisyo niya sa pagsusugal .
isa pa , sa umpisa pa lang ay mali na ang lahat sa pagitan ninyong dalawa dahil pareho kayong may asawa .

ayon kay sr. supt. franklin mabanag , kabilang sa mga nasibak ay tig-dalawang hepe sa mga lalawigan ng cagayan , isabela at nueva viscaya ang natuklasan ng inspection group mula sa national police headquarters na binabawasan ang bilang ng mga naitalang kaso ng krimen sa kanilang lugar .
bagamat tinanggihan na niyang kilalanin ang mga nasibak , sinabi ni mabanag hindi naging katanggap tanggap ang katuwiran ng kinauukulan na hindi nila isinasama sa ulat ang maliliit na krimen tulad ng mga ninakaw o nadisgrasyang kambing , kalabaw at mga away pamilya .
“ malaki o maliit man na krimen ay dapat isama sa ulat upang malaman ng pulisya ang tunay na sitwasyon sa lugar , ” paliwanag ni mabanag .
inamin ni isabela police director sr. supt. sotero ramos jr. na bahagyang tumaas ang bilang ng krimen sa kanyang kinasasakupan dahilan sa pag-iistrikto ng kanyang mga hepe .
sinabi ni ramos na hindi na nito pinapayagan ang mga pulis na makisawsaw sa pag-areglo sa mga kaso dahilan trabaho na ito ng korte o piskalya .

le ministère angolais de l 'agriculture et du développement m. afonso pedro canga a annoncé ce don lors du lancement officiel du fonds en marge de la 38e conférence de la fao , l 'organe directeur souverain de l 'organisation .
world + 1 other le fonds fiduciaire africain pour la sécurité alimentaire devient réalité la guinée équatoriale est le premier pays à contribuer , à hauteur de 30 millions de dollars , à cette initiative de l ’ afrique à l ’ afrique pour lutter contre la faim 22 février 2013 , malabo / rome - la guinée équatoriale a fait don aujourd 'hui de 30 millions de dollars à un nouveau fonds de solidarité qui vise à mobiliser les ressources financières de l 'afrique pour renforcer la sécurité alimentaire de la région .
world + 2 others l ’ angola contribuera au fonds de solidarité pour la sécurité alimentaire en afrique le président angolais l ’ a annoncé lors de son entretien avec m. graziano da silva 30 janvier 2013 , luanda - la république d 'angola contribuera au fonds de solidarité pour la sécurité alimentaire en afrique , destiné à stimuler les efforts visant à l 'éradication de la faim sur le continent , a annoncé aujourd 'hui le président angolais , m. josé eduardo dos santos .
" l 'angola ne peut demeurer étranger à la lutte contre la faim " , a déclaré le président lors de son entretien à luanda avec m. josé graziano da silva , directeur général de la fao .
" angola cannot be absent from the fight against hunger , " said president dos santos during a meeting in luanda with the director-general of the un food and agriculture organization , josé graziano da silva .
it is simply too easy to place all the blame on the growing secularization of our culture , the moral relativism of our time and the widespread indifference to religion infecting our society .
these are certainly challenges to handing on the faith to the young .
but , the reason for our not having greater success in this essential work of the church is more profound .
the challenges today are great in forming young people to be true disciples of jesus .
but , these challenges are not insurmountable .
by not limiting our catechesis to those preparing for the sacraments and by extending our formation in the faith to include parents as well as children , adults as well as the young , we can reverse the tragic trends of the last two generations .
catechesis is a family affair !

frontenac • coming off a seven-run loss to st. joseph ’ s the day before , the nerinx hall softball team was in need of a pick-me-up , as the markers turned right back around to face visitation on the road tuesday.thanks to its offense , and specifically senior center fielder korey krodinger , nerinx came away with a 6-4 win . “ this was very nice to get the win , ” krodinger said .
“ i think it was much needed for the team . ” nerinx ( 3-1 ) jumped ahead in the top of the third inning with three runs.after bree schneider worked an eight-pitch walk , krodinger , paige eickhoff and amber tepen all delivered run-scoring doubles.each of the doubles was hit by a batter that viz pitcher anna mckee had struck out in fanning the side in the first inning . “ i really think we brought our intensity and we kept each other going , ” krodinger said .
“ we didn ’ t get down on ourselves and , even though this was a really good pitcher , we kept our eye on the ball . ” visitation ( 5-3 , no. 8 in the stlhighschoolsports.com small-schools rankings ) cut into the nerinx lead with one swing of the bat in the bottom of the fifth.emma mitchell launched a line-drive , two-run home run into left-center to cut the lead to 3-2 . “ you have to give her credit , she beat us on that one , we had first base open , ” nerinx coach joe dorlac said .
“ we chose to pitch to her and she hit it out . ” oddly enough , the home run seemed to enliven the nerinx offense.after the markers got out of the inning , nerinx took a 4-2 lead in the sixth on a mia john run-scoring single and pushed it to 6-2 on an rbi double by krodinger and an eickhoff rbi hit.krodinger had the most prolific day of any nerinx hitter .
she went 2-for-4 with two doubles , two rbis and two runs scored . “ i thought we played a good game and we did all the little things right , ” dorlac said .
“ we executed , got our bunts down and threw to the right base .
we kept away from ( giving up ) the walks and stayed out of the big inning . ” while the bottom of the seventh for viz may not have been a big inning exactly , it was a fairly scary one for nerinx.the vivettes scored two runs on rbi hits by mckee and catcher sarah gieseke .
it was on gieseke ’ s hit that the game ended , though.kayleigh stahlschmidt , who had just rapped a ground-rule double , got caught in a rundown between third and home trying to score on the back end of gieseke ’ s hit.heads-up play from the nerinx defense led to stahlschmidt being tagged out at home to end the game . “ we just dug ourselves some holes that were hard to climb out of today , ” visitation coach donny griffin said.tepen earned the win , as she pitched five solid innings .
eickhoff pitched the final two innings to earn the save.mckee suffered the complete-game loss for the vivettes .
alaskans trafficked walrus tuskstwo alaskans have pleaded guilty to illegally trading the tusks of about 100 walruses with eskimo hunters wolves ' kill ' woman 's teacher map of chignik lake alaskawolves are suspected of killing candice berner , 32 , in an isolated village while she was out jogging exxon hit with $ 6.75bn spill billa federal judge has ordered exxon to pay for the 1989 exxon valdez oil spill an importer / agent submits the declaration form and all supporting documents to the customs office / house at the port of entry .
it is also required that all fittings and accessories of the vehicle as well as passengers and accompanying luggage are declared to customs at the time of entry .
in case where the importer is unable to deposit a guarantee either in a form of a cash deposit or a bank guarantee , he / she may request the embassy to issue a letter to customs for granting approval of the importer ’ s self-guarantee .
in case where motor vehicles or motorcycles are temporarily imported into thailand for a short visit via the border points and to be re-exported at the conclusion of the visit , but the importer fails to do so within the time-limit as indicated in the bond and security paper , provided he / she does not intend to violate the regulations , a 100-baht fine per day , but not exceeding1,000 baht in total , shall be charged from the due date of the contract .
in case where boats / vessels are temporarily brought into thailand and to be re-exported at the conclusion of the visit , but the importer fails to do so within the time-limit as indicated in the bond and security paper , provided he / she does not intend to violate the regulations , a 500-baht fine per day , but not exceeding 5,000 baht in total , shall be charged from the due date of the contract .

2013 ) - des membres actifs et & # 224 ; la retraite de l 'arm & # 233 ; e canadienne se sont rassembl & # 233 ; s aujourd 'hui & # 224 ; la base des forces canadiennes ( bfc ) shilo pour une c & # 233 ; r & # 233 ; monie c & # 233 ; l & # 233 ; brant le 20e anniversaire de la bataille de la poche de medak .
la bataille de la poche de medak , qui a eu lieu en septembre 1993 , est un moment important dans l 'histoire militaire canadienne .
des casques bleus canadiens et fran & # 231 ; ais ont d & # 233 ; fendu leur position contre les forces croates , permettant d 'arr & # 234 ; ter l 'escalade de la violence dans la r & # 233 ; gion .
le groupement tactique canadien d & # 233 ; ploy & # 233 ; en croatie & # 233 ; tait structur & # 233 ; autour du 2e bataillon , princess patricia 's canadian light infantry , qui est actuellement bas & # 233 ; & # 224 ; la bfc shilo , et comprenait de nombreux r & # 233 ; servistes d 'autres unit & # 233 ; s . & # 171 ; le canada est fier de reconna & # 238 ; tre le d & # 233 ; vouement dont ont fait preuve le 2e bataillon , princess patricia 's canadian light infantry et les r & # 233 ; servistes des autres unit & # 233 ; s pendant la bataille de la poche de medak & # 187 ; , affirme l 'honorable rob nicholson , ministre de la d & # 233 ; fense nationale . & # 171 ; il est appropri & # 233 ; de prendre le temps de reconna & # 238 ; tre ces soldats et leur contribution pour ramener la stabilit & # 233 ; dans les balkans .
