retrieved 28 june 2011 . & # 160 ; in 2007 , soderbergh and tony gilroy contributed an audio commentary to the dvd re-release of the third man by the criterion collection .
ron vawter ( sex , lies , and videotape and king of the hill ) jeroen krabbe ( kafka , king of the hill and ocean 's twelve ) soderbergh claims to not be a fan of possessory credits , and prefers not to have his name front and center at the start of a film .
" the fact that i 'm not an identifiable brand is very freeing , " says soderbergh , " because people get tired of brands and they switch brands .
i 've never had a desire to be out in front of anything , which is why i don 't take a possessory credit . " [ 50 ] soderbergh lives in new york city .
he is an atheist . [ 53 ] steven soderbergh : " i can see the end of my career " by henry barnes , guardian , july 14 , 2009 the gibnut is a belizean rodent -- something like a beaver without the big tail .

early indications suggest the plane came in too short and hit the seawall at the airport add a favorite ( file a bookmark ) to tzipi livni news timeline * time by locationromânia post 1989 & # 8211 ; catherine durandin şi zoe petre | cadran politic home vitrina cu cărți românia post 1989 & # 8211 ; catherine durandin şi zoe petre posted by cezar dobre on apr 5th , 2011 / / comments off prima parte a volumului intitulat „ o eliberare dificilă ” ne arată că în primele momente după căderea regimurilor comuniste în europa de est , numeroşi analişti au impus termenul „ tranziţie ” ca şi cum punctul de plecare şi cel de sosire ar fi fost perfect cunoscute .
aceste borne simbolice erau întunecate în punctul de plecare apăsate de crimele comunismului , dar luminoase în perspectiva unei sosiri presupuse într-o lume liberă şi prosperă .
doamna catherine durandin impresionează pentru faptul că , pe lângă o cunoaştere aprofundată a realităţilor istorice ale poporului nostru , a dat dovadă de o mare atenţie şi sensibilitate atunci când a pus problema procesului de integrare în nato şi uniunea europeană .
dacă procesul integrării a pus mai puţine probleme şi datorită maşinii de putere americane care a funcţionat sprijinită de propriul „ think-tank ” , procesul de integrare în ue este mai complex şi aceasta datorită faptului că românia este o ţară europeană şi se poate irita numai la faptul că trebuie să demonstreze acest lucru în faţa comisiei europene .
în capitolele următoare ale cărţii , doamna zoe petre , o excepţională cunoscătoare a lumii antice , dar și a istoriei poporului român , remarca cu privire la distrugerea simbolurilor puterii comuniste în decembrie 1989 că lozinca „ jos comunismul ” este greu de crezut că a fost o provocare a kgb-ului – care , logic , nu putea adopta un astfel de slogan .
dacă nu a fost prima , cel puţin a fost printre primii analişti care a prezentat cu adevărat o realitate dureroasă pentru noi românii , mai ales pentru o anumită categorie de români , vizavi de evenimentele din decembrie 1989 când șefii securității au decis pe tăcute să adopte pe cât posibil politica struţului şi să lase în seama armatei şi eventual a gărzilor patriotice sarcina de a se „ sacrifica pentru salvarea regimului ceaușist ” .
un profesor de valoarea doamnei zoe petre nu putea să nu pună adevărul istoric în faţa legendei armatei devotate poporului , de asemenea a făcut o distincţie clară între instituţia „ odioasă a securităţii ” şi activitatea cadrelor acesteia , în timpul revoluţiei din decembrie , şi ceea ce este cel mai dureros pentru unii care au participat la conducerea țării în anii ‘ 90 este faptul că atât ion iliescu , cât şi cei din anturajul lui ştiau prea bine că „ teroriştii ” sunt o ficţiune criminală si un „ spectacol regizat ” .
evenimentele care au urmat : martie 1990 , târgu mureş , când regimul lui ion iliescu îşi asuma deschis tezele naţional-comunismului , şi piaţa universităţii , iunie 1991 , au dus la netezirea drumului cdr care în final l-a propulsat pe preşedintele emil constantinescu care a adus prima alternanţă democratică la putere după 60 de ani .
indiferent de dificultăţile deseori insurmontabile ale legiferării , preşedintele emil constantinescu a fost primul şef de stat român care a condamnat comunismul , a cerut iertare în numele statului pe care îl reprezenta atunci tuturor victimelor represiunii anticomuniste cerând parlamentului româniei să adopte măsurile reparatorii necesare care decurgeau din această condamnare .
administraţia constantinescu a fost cea care a pus bazele integrării europene şi euroatlantice a româniei , iar politica de bună vecinătate a fost exprimată în discursul domniei sale în 2 decembrie 1996 la reuniunea la vârf a osce de la lisabona şi s-a situat pe parcursul întregului său mandat într-o logică a complementarităţii faţă de politicile de aderare la uniunea europeană şi integrare euroatlantică .
din nefericire , sublinia doamna zoe petre , refuzând să accepte faptul ca victoria din 1996 fusese decisivă , dar parţială , şi nu un triumf absolut , nucleul dur al partizanilor cdr nerăbdător şi radical , s-a desprins repede de realităţile unei puteri care era obligată să negocieze fiecare pas spre reformă , mai mult „ trădarea iubită ” de unii politicieni din cadrul convenţiei democratice , care au dus în secret tratative cu psd – ne referim aici concret la pnl – , au dat lovitura de graţie cdr-ului .
cu toate acestea , procesul de democratizare a devenit astfel ireversibil şi înfrângerea partidelor din fosta convenţie democratică nu a mai putut să schimbe radical victoriile dobândite în cei patru ani de guvernare democratică a româniei .
în perfect acord cu doamna catherine durandin , care este fără niciun dubiu istoricul francez cel mai informat cu privire la românia pe care o cunoaşte foarte bine şi o iubeşte cu inteligenţă şi pasiune , doamna zoe petre , cu un discernământ critic , deseori amar , nu numai că refuză să inventeze „ o idilă ” despre revoluţie , cum sunt multe cărţi apărute pe piaţă , ci scoate tema excepţiei româneşti din categoria fatalităţilor istorice obiective şi o înscrie în istoria concretă a postcomunismului .

115 شاعر از 66 کشور جهان برای مردم هزاره شعر آفریده اند ارزگان خاص : فرمانده ی ضد طالب هدف حمله ی طالبان ، قاچاقچیان مواد مخدر و حکومت کرزی سکوت فرهنگیان ، سیاستمداران ، مدافعین حقوق بشر و مبشرین وحدت و همبستگی مردم افغانستان دربرابر پیام عید فطر گلب الدین حکمتیار چه معنی دارد گلبدین حکمتیار ، هزاره ها را مستقیم به نسل کشی و کوچ اجباری تهدید کرد پیام اشغالگر افغان ملا عمر در سالگرد کشتار شمالی ؛ ریشخندی به ده ها هزار قربانی هزاره ، اوزبیک و تاجیک زندگی یکی از گروه های قومی که بیشترین آزار و اذیت را تجربه کرده است کمپین نام گذاری جاده ها و چهار راهی ها به نام قربانیان جنگ های افغانستان اعتراض هزاره های استرالیایی به نسل کشی در شهر کویته حملات منظم کوچی طالبان به مردم در بهسود و دایمیرداد پاره ای از جنایات اوغان ها به روایت بانویی کهنسال از دایکندی خیزش ضد استبدادی واصلاح طلبانۀ دانشجویان دانشگاه کابل یا نقطۀ عطفی درتاریخ نهضت عدالتخواهی افغانستان فاجعۀ هفتم جوزای سال 1386 شهرشبرغان را چگونه می توان فراموش کرد ؟ چند نقشه تاریخی از زمانی که کشوری بنام افغانستان وجود خارجی نداشت یادبود قربانیان هفتم جوزای 1386 در شبرغان ، کشته شده به فرمان جمعه خان همدرد سلیمان خیل به افکار عمومی : کوچی ها مسلح نیستند ؛ سلیمان خیل بصورت محرمانه به سفارت آمریکا : بیشتر از نیم طالبان کوچی هستند ده ها کشته و زخمی در قندهار ؛ تروریزم و قبیله گرایی همچنان در جنگ با غیر نظامیان دیکتاتور گواتمالایی محکوم به نسل کشی ؛ دیکتاتورهای افغان چه زمانی محاکمه می شوند ؟ واژه كليدهاى يك گروهآموزش ، مکاتب و دانشگاهآيساف ، ناتو و نيروهای بين المللیاستخبارات ، جاسوس و جاسوسیاعتراض ، راهپیمایی و تظاهراتافغانستان در المپیک 2012 لندنافغانستان و کشورهای منطقه و جهانانتخابات در افغانستانبهداشت و سلامتتبعیض ، in the first place , how did abortion get into this article ? the woman was complaining of a procedure she has had several times in the past and yet : somewhere along the lines somebody in here > > > is dreaming of an abortion .
i 've had one done , two years ago and i can still remember how painful it was .
my dr wanted me to go have one again this year and i said " only if you go first . "
he was not amused .
nothing , nothing ticks me off more than a woman who goes right to the rape excuse for sympathy .
if the doctors were unprofessional and did not take care of the woman 's needs or listen to her excuses , fine .
that is unprofessional and malpractice .
now what confuses me is that in a professional doctor setting she " endured " the pain for an hour .
exercise your right to say " stop this is uncomfortable " that is what i did when i needed to get an area cleaned out and it started to become uncomfortable .
no fuss no muss .
my god i had a tumor / growth removed from my armpit which hurt like a son of a , but i don 't have pstd about it .
i also got my testicles cupped by a woman when i was 8 years old .
sure it was for a physical , but i was alone with a female doctor then .
i remember it , but it doesn 't put me in a fetal position .
my neighbor had a transvaginal ultrasound and said it was " one of the most uncomfortable experiences " he 'd ever had .
he 'd ever had ?
sorry , but a man can 't under go a transvaginal ultrasound . do you understand what this article is about ?
are you making fun of transgendered people ?
of course they can have the procedure too . or are you against equality for trann ! es ?

it & # 8217 ; s a good way to build your clip portfolio : in order to get a job in print or online journalism you need a strong clip portfolio , and writing for a community paper is a terrific way to do that .
as i said earlier , community papers typically use a lot of articles from freelancers , so if you & # 8217 ; re eager to work it & # 8217 ; s possible to rack up a lot of clips in a relatively short period of time .
next , interview a few people to collect quotes that reflect the public ’ s perception of the event or story .
don & # 8217 ; t be intimidated by the idea of interviewing important or newsworthy people !
an interview can be as formal or informal as you want to make it , so relax and have fun with it .
find a few people with strong opinions and write down the responses for accuracy .
also let the interviewee know that you will be quoting him or her .

coup de théâtre ou réalité ?
des commentaires sont allés dans tous les sens .
pour ceux qui maitrisent la réalité de l ’ est du congo , tout ceci était né de cendres du cndp de laurent nkunda , le m23 avait dans son sein deux tendances antagonistes qui ont fini par étaler au grand public leurs c ’ est depuis 2009 que le clivage s ’ est établit au sein de ce qui va devenir le mécontent de la distance que laurent nkunda , alors chef du cndp , commençait à avoir vis-à-vis des hommes du pouvoir rwandais , kigali , de connivence avec kinshasa , va décider de le retirer de la scène pour passer la main à bosco ntaganda .
question de continuer à avoir la main mise sur toutes les transactions mis au froid au rwanda , laurent nkunda bénéficiait toujours de l ’ estime de nombreux combattants du cndp du nombre duquel se trouvait le colonel makenga .
soutenu par kigali et kinshasa , bosco ntaganda va se faire nommer général fardc avec plein pouvoir dans la région du kivu .
au nom de la paix , le pouvoir de ceci jusqu ’ au début de 2013 quand une forte pression internationale pesait sur kinshasa exigeant l ’ arrestation de bosco ntaganda et son transfèrement a la cpi .
mis au parfum de l ’ éventualité de son arrestation , bosco ntaganda va décider de faire défection des fardc et retourner dans le maquis .
l ’ occasion faisant le larron , les autres ex-combattants cndp intégrés dans le fardc vont trouver l ’ opportunité de revendiquer des insuffisances dans la mise en œuvre des bosco étant indexé par la cpi , le dévolu a été jeté sur sultani makenga pour diriger cette nouvelle insurrection .
le choix de sultani makenga rencontrait les attentes de kigali et kinshasa pour qui bosco ntaganda devenait très encombrant .
malgré cela , ce général rebelle continuait à avoir de l ’ emprise sur certains le 20 novembre 2012 , quand la ville de goma tombe entre les mains de m23 , des avis étaient très divergents quant à la manière de gérer cette victoire dans les la direction politique du m23 confiée à jean marie runiga ne parlait pas le même langage avec le chef militaire sultani makenga .
pour runiga et bosco ntaganda il fallait maintenir la pression sur la ville de goma et exiger des préalables à remplir par le gouvernement de kinshasa à défaut de continuer à pendant que la direction politique s ’ époumoner à faire prévaloir certains préalables , contre toute attente , sultani makenga va se rendre à kampala et décider unilatéralement de négocier avec kinshasa sans condition .
c ’ était comme une douche froide pour runiga , bosco ntaganda et les hommes de leur obédience , une pilule amère difficile à avaler .
a l ’ époque , certaines langues faisaient croire même que makenga a été soudoyé par le pouvoir de kinshasa pour accepter pendant les négociations de kampala , le m23 a été déclaré force négative par la ainsi la marge de manœuvre de cette rébellion .
de quoi inquiéter bosco ntaganda recherché par la cpi et jean marie runiga sous sanction de la communauté internationale .
la scission devenait donc impérieuse .
ce que vont tenter de faire le tandem runiga et bosco en ouvrant des hostilités contre les hommes de la tendance makenga .
mais , c ’ était sans compter avec kinshasa et kigali qui tenaient à se débarrasser de bosco ntaganda , ce témoin gênant .
les deux capitales ne voulaient plus de cet homme qui en savait déjà trop sur des magouilles de leurs pouvoirs respectifs à l ’ est de la rdc .
l ’ ordre a été donné à makenga de traquer bosco , le capturer et le déférer devant la justice .
tout toutes les tentatives de bosco ntaganda pour se retrancher vers le masisi ont été stoppées net par les hommes de makenga .
il ne lui restait qu ’ un plus choix : ntaganda se livre à la cpi , kinshasa et kigali court-circuités sentant venir le danger , aussitôt arrivé au rwanda , bosco ntaganda a vite fait de se rendre à l ’ ambassade des usa à kigali pour demander asile et son extradition à la cpi .
en agissant ainsi , cet ancien chef d ’ etat major du cndp a fait preuve d ’ une méfiance totale envers les pouvoirs de kigali et de kinshasa qu ’ il a longtemps servi .
l ’ homme redoutait même le pire pour sa vie .
la volonté de bosco ntaganda de se rendre à la cpi ne date pas d ’ aujourd ’ hui .
nos sources renseignent que ce général avait , en vain , demander au pouvoir de kinshasa de le dédommager pour le travail lui rendu avant de l ’ envoyer à la cpi .
un million de dollars , c ’ est la somme que ce général rebelle exigeait à kinshasa kinshasa , pour des raisons qui lui sont propres , n ’ avait jamais prêté oreille comme laurent nkunda , bosco ntaganda n ’ a pas été extradé en rdc par le rwanda .
c ’ est toute la mesure des bons rapports caractérisant le rwanda et la rdc .
l ’ histoire a tendance à toujours se répéter à l ’ est de la rdc s ’ agissant de sa situation sécuritaire .
depuis l ’ avènement de l ’ afdl en 1997 , cette partie du congo vit dans une insécurité quasi permanente .
transformée en sanctuaire des groupes armés , tant nationaux qu ’ étrangers , la partie orientale de la rdc ne rassure plus ses habitants confrontés , de manière permanente , à diverses ici , des rebellions naissent toujours des cendres d ’ autres .
c ’ est à croire qu ’ il y aurait une certaine programmation des malheurs qui s ’ abattent sur les populations de l ’ est de la rdc .
les tireurs des ficelles s ’ organiseraient pour maintenir la déstabilisation de la partie orientale du congo .
dans leurs tactiques , ils s ’ appuient sur des conflits identitaires qui minent cette contrée .
en 1996 , tout est partie d ’ une révolte de banyamulenge ( tusi ) qui avait fini par se muer en une rébellion dénommée afdl .
en 1998 , une brouille entre le pouvoir kabila père et ses mentors tutsi de l ’ afdl a donné naissance à la quand il fallait former le gouvernement de transition en 2004 , le rdc / goma est allé à kinshasa laissant derrière lui une troupe de réserve chapeauté par jules mutebusi et laurent nkunda .
c ’ est ce noyau laissé par le rcd qui a tout ceci porte à croire que la question de la survie tutsi en rdc préoccuperait plusieurs décideurs du monde au point qu ’ ils en feraient l ’ l ’ une des clés pour résoudre la question sécuritaire en rdc .
sinon , comment comprendre cette succession d ’ insurrection tutsi bénéficiant du soutien de certains milieux les clivages entre les différentes communautés linguistiques présentes dans la partie orientale du congo ainsi que la problématique d ’ exploitation des richesses naturelles de l ’ est du congo , sont d ’ autres raisons à la base de qu ’ adviendra-t-il après cette rébellion du m23 ?
plusieurs congolais ne in sawyer ’ s archives , scholars are also likely to find voluminous research notes .
“ one of the hallmarks of what [ robert j. sawyer ] does , ” she said , “ is to take on a topic and then do all the science reading and research behind that particular topic as he is preparing his novel or series . ”
for example , his most recent novel , red planet blues , discusses fossilization and paleontology on the planet mars .
to grisé , another distinctive quality of sawyer ’ s writing is his strong interest in ideas of interdisciplinarity .
“ what he is interested in is the way that science connects with ideas of humanity , religion , and philosophy , so that you get a richness , ” she said .
the combination of insecurity and drought is making it hard to get humanitarian aid to the area .

check that the foliage isn ’ t wilting or damaged in any way as this may suggest it has root problems caused by drying out or poor watering regimes.award-winning video by katie eldredge and hannah read on the bee die presseagentur der slowakischen republik ist eine öffentlich-rechtliche , nationale und unabhängige informationsanstalt , die die berichterstattung im öffentlichen interesse anbietet .
sie wurde gemäß dem gesetz nr. 308 / 2008 über die presseagentur der slowakischen republik gegründet .
tasr wird nicht vom staat subventioniert , sie lebt vom verkauf ihrer produkte sowie des agenturservices .
aus diesem grund wurde mit dem staat ein vertrag über aufträge im öffentlichen interesse unterzeichnet , die im gesetz genau präzisiert werden .
tasr wird von einem generaldirektor geleitet , der / die gleichzeitig satzungsmäßiges organ der gesellschaft ist .
gegenwärtig bekleidet das amt des tasr-generaldirektors phdr .
jaroslav rezník .
der generaldirektor wird von einem 5-köpfigen verwaltungsrat bestimmt .
der verwaltungsrat wiederum wird vom slowakischen parlament gewählt .
er besteht aus fachleuten aus diversen bereichen - medien , wirtschaft , aus einem juristen , it-spezialisten und einem mitarbeitervertreter .
tasr ist ein vorreiter auf dem slowakischen agenturmarkt .
sie ist mitglied in der european alliance of news agencies ( eana ) .
jährlich stellt die tasr ihren abnehmern über 250 000 nachrichten aus dem inland , ausland , wirtschaft , sport und kultur zur verfügung : dazu gibt es ein breites angebot an fotos , videos sowie tonaufnahmen .
unter dem hot-line service versteht man nachrichten , die direkt aufs handy heruntergeladen werden .
darüber hinaus werden bulletins in slowakischer und englischer sprache ( automobilismus , bauwesen , banken etc . ) , nachforschungen , medienbeobachtung sowie die dienste eines einzigartigen fotoarchivs angeboten .

ibc 2013 : eutelsat and samsung announce a partnership to promote ultra hd the middle east or mideast is a region that encompasses western asia and all of or part of northern africa , depending on the context .
the term is considered to be eurocentric and used as a synonym for near east , in opposition to far east .
the corresponding adjective is middle-eastern and the derived noun is middle-easterner .
" middle east - articles by region " - council on foreign relations : " a resource for nonpartisan research and analysis " الملك : الأردن والصين يرتبطان بعلاقات راسخة وقويةمجلس الوزراء يعين الطاهر رئيسا لهيئة تنظيم قطاع الكهرباءالامم المتحدة توافق على انضمام سوريا لمعاهدة حظر الاسلحة الكيميائية7 إصابات في حادث تصادم على طريق اربد-عمانانخفاض على درجات الحرارة اليوم وطقس معتدل حتى الثلاثاءالملك : الأردن والصين يرتبطان بعلاقات راسخة وقويةمجلس الوزراء يعين الطاهر رئيسا لهيئة تنظيم قطاع الكهرباءالامم المتحدة توافق على انضمام سوريا لمعاهدة حظر الاسلحة الكيميائية7 إصابات في حادث تصادم على طريق اربد-عمانانخفاض على درجات الحرارة اليوم وطقس معتدل حتى الثلاثاء وزير الشؤون السياسية والبرلمانية يلتقي الامانة العامة لحزب " تواد " ( مصور ) geomorphology is the study of landforms and in the antarctic , these studies have mainly been concerned with the effects of the ice sheet on the underlying rock , as well as the study of glacial deposits , and the formation of patterned ground .
are there vast deposits of precious metals and ores beneath the antarctic ice sheet ?
are there huge basins of gas and oil under the weddell and ross seas ?

source : bbctasr spustila nový web pre žiakov a študentov - novinky - tasr.sk foto : tasrbratislava 23. novembra 2012 ( tasr ) - tlačová agentúra slovenskej republiky ( tasr ) dnes spustila nový portál pre žiakov a študentov www.skolskyservis.sk.
tasr si ním chce posilniť svoju pozíciu u mladej generácie a rozšíriť aj svoju hlavnú úlohu – službu verejnosti .
portál bude denne ponúkať správy z produkcie študentov a pedagógov rozčlenené podľa základných druhov škôl – základné školy , stredné školy , vysoké školy , univerzity . stránka tým získa na prehľadnosti a vďaka ľahšej orientácii môžu so servisom komfortne pracovať žiaci aj učitelia .
prispievatelia do tohto unikátneho projektu verejnoprávnej agentúry vznikom portálu získajú väčší priestor na zverejnenie svojich článkov .
tiež si získajú aj nových čitateľov , pretože ich správy si bude môcť prečítať každý návštevník stránky .
portál bude uverejňovať aj najdôležitejšie správy z diania v slovenskom školstve z produkcie tasr , doplnené o zaujímavosti zo sveta vedy a techniky , histórie a umenia .
čitatelia si nájdu aj tipy na voľnočasové aktivity a kultúrne vyžitie . „ spustením nového webu pre školský servis plníme aj jeden z hlavných cieľov projektu tasr do každej školy , ktorý tasr prevádzkuje už od februára 2009 , “ uviedol generálny riaditeľ agentúry jaroslav rezník .
zároveň dodal , že „ to , že žiaci s našim servisom nielen pracujú , ale doň i prispievajú , formuje ich vzťah k tvorivému mysleniu a prebúdza to ich záujem o aktuálne dianie a ich snahu formovať veci okolo seba . “ od februára 2009 v školskom servise , kde prispievajú žiaci , študenti a pedagógovia , tasr vydala vyše 40 000 správ .
kompletné servisy tasr sú prístupné v 2899 základných a stredných školách a na 41 vysokých školách .

( for example , the complex numbers c are an extension of the reals r , and the reals r are an extension of the rationals q. )
classifying the possible extensions of a given number field is a difficult and partially open problem .
abelian extensions — that is , extensions l of k such that the galois group [ note 12 ] gal ( l / k ) of l over k is an abelian group — are relatively well understood .
their classification was the object of the programme of class field theory , which was initiated in the late 19th century ( partly by kronecker and eisenstein ) and carried out largely in 1900 — 1950 .
the central problem of diophantine geometry is to determine when a diophantine equation has solutions , and if it does , how many .
the approach taken is to think of the solutions of an equation as a geometric object. us a solution failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : x = a / c , failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : y = b / c the rephrasing of questions on equations in terms of points on curves turns out to be felicitous .
the finiteness or not of the number of rational or integer points on an algebraic curve — that is , rational or integer solutions to an equation failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : f ( x , y ) = 0 , where failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : f is a polynomial in two variables — turns out to depend crucially on the genus of the curve .
the genus can be defined as follows : [ note 13 ] allow the variables in failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : f ( x , y ) = 0 if failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle | x-a / q | < \ frac is an algebraic number .
if failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : x let failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : a be a set of integers .

( robson 2001 , pp . & # 160 ; 199-200 ) method : if we count by threes and there is a remainder 2 , put down 140 .
if we count by fives and there is a remainder 3 , put down 63 .
if we count by sevens and there is a remainder 2 , put down 30 .
add them to obtain 233 and subtract 210 to get the answer .
if we count by threes and there is a remainder 1 , put down 70 .
if we count by fives and there is a remainder 1 , put down 21 .
if we count by sevens and there is a remainder 1 , put down 15 .
when [ a number ] exceeds 106 , the result is obtained by subtracting 105 . ^ perfect and especially amicable numbers are of little or no interest nowadays .
the same was not true in medieval times – whether in the west or the arab-speaking world – due in part to the importance given to them by the neopythagorean ( and hence mystical ) nicomachus ( ca .
100 ce ) , who wrote a primitive but influential " introduction to arithmetic " .
see van der waerden 1961 , ch .

elisabeth hasselbeck ducked a series of questions about her move from " the view " to " fox and friends " in an interview with tv guide published on wednesday .
hasselbeck left the abc show in july , after announcing that she was becoming a co-host on the fox news morning show .
rumors had abounded about the reasons for her departure : was she let go because she was unpopular with viewers ?
was the show trying to de-emphasize the political fights she was constantly a part of ?
was she pushed or did she jump ?
hasselbeck has mostly maintained her silence , and she refused to be drawn in by tv guide 's stephen battaglio : elisabeth hasselbeck : i really have no comment .
there 's a lot of misinformation out there so there will be a ton of reasons why or why not , or did she or didn 't she , and that 's all rear view mirror .
i 'm thrilled to be a part of fox news .

now parents will know whether or not their children are being taught to read , write and do math and whether or not their children will be equipped to work in the new economy we are creating .
our teachers , administrators , superintendents and schools can now be measured and held accountable by parents .
a college education has helped me achieve my dreams .
and i have an abiding belief that an opportunity for a college education should be available to all virginians .
and so , my fellow virginians , at the start of the new millenium , we begin anew .
this is the dawn of a dynamic new age , with the opportunity to set out on new paths , in new ways .
change is everywhere around us , but change is not our enemy ; it is our ally as we build on our strengths .
the commonwealth has accomplished much and has much of which to be proud .
but i assure you now , virginia 's best years lie ahead .

if i buy advertising , will you accept my press releases or articles for publication ?
our rates are based on receipt of electronic files .
you may e-mail us your completed ad as a high-resolution ’ pdf ’ or ’ jpg ’ file .
you may also provide the file on a cd ad design assistance is available at $ 50 per hour , at a minimum of one our deadline for reserving space is the third day of the month preceding publication .
the deadline for final proof approval or submission of electronic files is the eighth day of the month preceding publication .
prepayment of the first ad insertion is due the third day of the month preceding publication , unless other arrangements are made .
subsequent insertions will be invoiced and due on the last day of the month of publication .
the best times accepts mastercard and visa. third day of the month .
if cancelled , the cost would be adjusted accordingly .
for example , if you had a 12-time agreement for a quarter-page you would be invoiced for the difference between the three-time and 12 time yes .
you may change your ad each month .
we must receive notification of a pending ad change by the fifth of the month .
we am i restricted in what i can advertise in the best times ?
yes , businesses may have an ad flier or other insert included in the best we can also arrange the printing of fliers for inserting .
for printing and " at your service " is an option for advertisers who don 't find display ads and classified ads to be quite the right fit .
the " at your the cost of an at your service business card ad is an affordable $ 200 per we 've made it easy on you by eliminating the need for a contract .
to become an " at your service " advertiser , click on business card ad oas supports and certifies destruction of arms and ammunition in dominica it ’ s the fifth-straight season the eagles have started 2-0 , and through two games , bc seems to be clicking in all areas of the game .

kinalakihan ko nang laging nagbibigay at nagpapaubaya sa nakababata kong step ­ sister , kapatid ko sa ina .
dahil ang pangaral ni nanay , bilang nakakatandang kapatid ay pa ­ ngalagaan ko ang kapatid ko .
kaya lamang sa lahat ng hatian si marian .
kapag may nagustuhan siya sa mga damit ko ay basta na lang niyang kinukuha at kung mapuri siya rito ay hindi na niya ibabalik sa akin .
maganda siya kumpara sa akin , pero nagtataka siya kung bakit mas marami akong kaibigan at admirer .
dito nagsimula ang problema , dr. love .
dahil crush niya ang nanliligaw sa akin at gusto niyang arburin , siya na raw ang bahala kung paano makukuha ang atensiyon ni miguel .
kamukat-mukat dr. love , nabuntis si marian ­ at ang ama ay si miguel .
kapwa sila hindi pa tapos .
at dahil sa banta ng aking stepfather na hindi makakakuha ng board exam ­ si miguel ay napilitan siyang pakasalan ­ si marian .
nagpunta ako sa us nang maaprubahan ang aplikasyon kong makapagtrabaho roon , naging us citizen na ako .
umuwi lang ako nang mamatay na si nanay .
nalaman ko na naging miserable ang buhay ni marian at nag ­ ka ­ hiwalay na sila ni miguel .
hinanap ko si miguel para pakiusapan na balikan niya ang kapatid ko .
pero galit siya at ako ang sinisisi niya kung bakit nagkan ­ daloko-loko ang buhay niya .
hindi raw buntis si marian nang kanyang pakasalan .
hindi ito nasabi sa akin ng aking ina .
sa ngayon po , sinisisi ko ang aking sarili sa masyado kong pagbibigay kay marian noon .
sa tingin n ’ yo po ba ay may magagawa pa ako ?
walang mali sa ginawa mo , kaya huwag mong sisihin ang sarili mo sa kung anuman ang sinapit ng kapatid mo .
siya ang nagdesisyon sa anumang kinalalagyan niya .
at tungkol naman kay miguel , wala kang dapat ipaliwanag sa kanya .
ang anumang namagitan sa kanila ng kapatid mo ay sinang-ayunan din niya .
kung minsan kailangan sapitin ang hindi dapat para matutunan ang mahalagang lek ­ ­ siyon sa buhay .
ipagdasal mo na lang na pareho nilang maisip ang mali at maitama ito .
riederer told police he had been involved in a confrontation with two people and was stabbed .

40293012345 ginawang asawa , pinagpapalimos … dalaga kinidnap ng ka-textmate | police metro , pang masa | philstar.com manila , philippines - naging kalbaryo ang buhay ng isang 21-anyos na dala ­ ga sa pakikipag-eyeball sa kanyang ka-textmate matapos siyang kidnapin nito at ginawang asawa ng halos tatlong buwan sa sampaloc , maynila .
ang biktima na natagpuang nanglilimahid ang katawan at nanghihingi ng pagkain sa mga residente ay itinago sa panga ­ lang “ isang ” , residente ng caliraya , quezon .
ang suspek ay nakila ­ lang si milbert roxas , 41 , ng sampaloc , maynila ay dinakip ng mga pulis at kinasuhan ng kidnapping .
batay sa imbestigas ­ yon , halos tatlong buwan na nawala ang bik ­ tima matapos itong makipagkita kay roxas na kanyang ka-textmate at nabola ito sa mga ipinapadalang message sa cell phone kaya ’ t nang magkita ay hindi na ito pinakawalan at ginawang asawa .
bagama ’ t nais na ng biktima na makatakas sa suspek ay hindi nito magawa dahil nasira ang kanyang cell phone kaya ’ t hindi niya makontak ng mga kaanak .
maging ang cell phone ng suspek ay pinaba ­ baya ­ ran sa biktima ng p3,000 dahil ito umano ang nakawala .
pinagbabantaan pa umano ng suspek na pa ­ ­ pa ­ ­ tayin ang da ­ laga kung iiwan siya nito hang ­ gang sa tumagal silang magkasa ­ ma ng walang pera at ma ­ malimos na lamang .
kamakalawa nang mamataan ang biktima at suspek ng mga residente ng san antonio st. , san andres , malate , maynila na nanghihingi ng makakain bandang alas-12 : 00 ng tanghali , kaya ’ t ini-report kay chairman renato mendoza ng barangay 723 , zone 79 .
pinagdudahan ng mga tagaroon ang presensiya ng dalawa kaya ’ t ipinahuli sa barangay bago dinala sa himpilan ng pulisya .
nang beripikahin , lumitaw na ang dalaga ay matagal nang naka-blotter ikinatuwa naman ng mga magulang ng dalaga ang kanilang pagki ­ kita kahit naglilimahid o madu ­ ngis ang hitsura at damit ng anak , na tulala na rindahil sa gutom. country is lao people 's democratic republic .
in lao , sathalanalat pasathipatai pasason lao. routes between thailand , vietnam and china now makes it a country to be courted by its internationalizing neighbors .

40 ans après , le chili a bien changé .
a tel point qu 'il est difficile d 'imaginer ce qu 'étaient les rêves de salvador allende un demi siècle plus tard .
lui-même ne reconnaîtrait pas son pays .
après le socialisme en démocratie , le chili a connu la dérégulation économique en dictature .
enseignant à science po et chercheur à l 'institut universitaire européen de florence révoltes arabes - la configuration absolument inédite qui prévaut au sein des sociétés arabes depuis 2010 interdit de manière catégorique de privilégier une grille de lecture religieuse pour expliquer les logiques de contestation .
la dynamique est incontestablement " verticale " et non " horizontale " .
littérature - dans l 'article huffpost maghreb sur la rentrée littéraire , monsieur jean fontaine a déclaré : " aujourd 'hui , la littérature tunisienne , ça n 'intéresse plus personne ( ... ) .
la maison d 'édition cérès , par exemple , ne veut plus publier de littérature parce que la politique , ça rapporte plus ! "
raccourci un peu rapide !
pourquoi faut-il que , chaque fois qu 'un auteur se voit refuser une publication , il se croit obligé de régler cela sur la place publique ?
rentrée - la dernière année scolaire et universitaire a vu défiler bien des surprises .
égrenons donc le souvenir de ces événements qui ont été , pour certains , pénibles et pleins d 'émotion , joyeux , mais teintés d 'une touche de tristesse pour d 'autres .
dans une tribune publiée ( et désormais retirée ) sur votre page facebook , écrite dans un français très approximatif ( les fans de sonia toumia apprécieront ) , vous vous en prenez à om zied , coupable du crime de lèse-majesté qui consiste à contester la présence de votre chef de parti ( et accessoirement géniteur ) lors de la commémoration du quarantième jour du martyr mohamed brahmi .
a la lecture de ce billet , deux sentiments se sont emparés de moi : l 'indignation et la gratitude .
éducation - l 'éducation doit se présenter comme l 'une des principales composantes de la tunisie post-révolutionnaire qui se doit de cibler la formation de cadres capables de contribuer à l 'émergence et au développement global de la nation .
littérature - nombre de jeunes auteurs algériens d 'expression arabophone s 'imaginent progressistes , subversifs , mais leurs écrits demeurent pudiques , conformistes , loin de remettre en cause les différents codes sociaux et politiques qui régissent la société dans laquelle ils vivent .
intervention en syrie - ces derniers temps , on me demande comment je peux être en faveur d 'une intervention militaire contre le régime assad alors qu 'il y a 42 ans , je militais activement contre la guerre du vietnam .
la réponse est simple : en 1971 , je m 'exprimais avec ma conscience , tout comme je le fais actuellement , en 2013 .
crise politique - cette longue séquence de concertations révèle en fait une crise de confiance forte entre les différents protagonistes , où les non-dits l 'emportent sur les déclarations publiques - voire même sur les contenus des différentes propositions .
mais elle révèle aussi que , sous couvert d 'intérêt national scandé par tous , chacun cherche midi à sa porte .
mohamed brahmi - c 'était une journée ensoleillée , comme l 'a été celle de son enterrement au carré des martyrs au cimetière du jallez , aux côtés de chokri bélaïd , dieu ait leur âme .
c 'était le jour de notre première rencontre , un matin de novembre 2011 , alors que l 'anc n 'avait pas encore commencé à siéger et qu 'une dizaine de nouveaux élus avaient été réunis pour un documentaire .
ben jaâfar - la tunisie , si elle ne l 'avait pas encore fait , vient de graver de son empreinte les discours politiques qui feront date , et c 'est à notre tout-puissant et bien-vaillant président de l 'assemblée nationale constituante que reviennent les lauriers de cette reconnaissance .
transition - depuis les élections d 'octobre 2011 et encore davantage aujourd 'hui , la société tunisienne tend à se cliver en deux pôles quasi antagoniques où l 'ancrage aux territoires , aux identités , aux intérêts catégoriels et personnels prennent de l 'ampleur et se déploient parfois au détriment de l 'intérêt national et de la culture démocratique .
reconstruction d 'un pays brisé : des élections envers et contre tout les printemps arabes sont-ils le nouveau visage des guerres de religion ?

it is possible … i may not know the name of that lawyer but i know the principal of that law firm .
sikota : to your knowledge , mr ngwira never travelled to nigeria ?
sikota : your lawyer did not travel to lusaka or to zambia in order to formalise ?
sikota : you say mr ngwira relinquished his shares in the company ?
sikota : did you ever see this letter which was allegedly signed by mr ngwira relinquishing his shares ?
sikota : did you ever see the document in the memorandum of articles where there is mr ngwira 's signature ?
sikota : we shouldn 't get confused by the way you put it that there were two sets ?
sikota : i put it to you … that mr ngwira disowned the signature ?
sikota : now , the money you say was remitted to iexora to singapore , you said that belongs to sarb energy ltd ?
sikota : so you can confirm that all of the directors of sarb energy knew that there was going to be a remittance of 500,000 to iexora ?
they all knew ?
ekpene : all the directors were aware that his excellency had requested … ekpene : i am not sure all of them were aware of the technical details .
sikota : so , in the board meeting that you say you had , you mentioned about the remittance of $ 500,000 to singapore , you did tell them that , in fact , we are not going to get a feasibility study from iexora ?
sikota : did you tell them you were not going to get a feasibility study ?
ekpene : this feasibility study never came up to the board .
the only thing i told the board was that his excellency had requested this money , please allow me to send this money … i did not get into the details of the transfer .
that is not up to the board .
sikota : you are falling on the sword on behalf of your other colleagues ?
sikota : the only one who knew of the illegal transaction was yourself ?
if i had naira and i wanted to buy dollars , then you go through the whole process .
sikota : all you have to say is that ' get it to sakwiba sikota in lusaka ' ?
ekpene : if you are transferring money and you have the cash in the account then … ekpene : what i recall is that he asked whether i had any proof ?
ekpene : i remember it the way i had just put it … if you are saying what i am saying is not correct , then you can go and collect that proof .
i have no stake in this case .
ekpene : the stress that i am getting on this contract is not worth it .
i had no intention that things would get to here .
i thought his excellency was going to win the election .
court : we have a very specific charge against his excellency , the charge being that he abused his office and the details of which all of us know .
can we stick to what we are here for , abuse of authority of office , the allegation specifically … against the former president ?
sikota : how many signatures did you have on the sarb energy account ?
sikota : what was the source of the money that you had in the sarb energy account ?
ekpene : we had a credit line from the bank , and based on that credit line , we can take an overdraft on it .
the credit line was for the government-to-government oil contract .
it was on the basis of that credit line that we paid this $ 2.5 million deposit .
in order to pay the money that his excellency requested i had to apply for an overdraft .
sikota : when you applied for the overdraft from your bank , what did you say you needed this overdraft for ?
ekpene : we told the bank that the overdraft was for pre-contract expenses .
sikota : in other words you didn 't lie to the bank that , in fact , you were paying 500,000 to iexora for them to do you a feasibility study , correct ?
sikota : it is for that reason that even in your application for the remittance of $ 500,000 to iexora , again you stated the real reason it was for a feasibility study , correct ?
sikota : even when you made the application for the foreign exchange to be remitted again you stated the true reason ?
sikota : the feasibility study was for a project you wanted to undertake ?
sikota : you can 't mention a feasibility study if you have no intention to undertake the project ?
ekpene : if it was viable and you are able you can undertake it .
sikota : have you ever applied to the nnpc for a crude oil term contract ?
sikota : … there are other conditions one needs to meet to qualify ?
sikota : so in short , there was a deliberate reason for you to want the feasibility study to be done ?
ekpene : i didn 't have the official mandate … maj kachingwe was the person with the official mandate .
ekpene : maj kachingwe was mandated and accredited .
he was a diplomat .
sikota : what is the name of the official whom you saw ?
sikota : let us move to the claim that you were at state house , giving a report to his excellency and you say mr henry banda came .
who was in the room when you claim mr henry banda came to the room ?
sikota : and you claim that you left the room with him to go to another room ?
sikota : so you came out of the room where you were having a meeting , went across to some … ?
ekpene : this is the entrance , the bmw car is there and we went this way .
sikota : how long do you say you were with henry banda ?
ekpene : i was under the impression that he was a government official .
ekpene : he gave me two numbers , one in zambia and in south africa and he told me the south african number works all over the world .
sikota : so you no longer had need for the paper ?
sikota : you didn 't write them on a piece of paper ?
sikota : did you at any time write the numbers on a piece of paper ?
ekpene : the numbers in my handwriting i wrote them for the investigators .
sikota : the question is whether you were introduced to them ?
ekpene : i don 't know but the dpp was there and the law enforcement officers .
sikota : let us get back to state house or that you say you met mr henry banda .
did he give you anything himself on that day , a card or anything for us to see that you were in contact with him ?
sikota : do you have any physical evidence of mr henry banda telling you the coordinates of a bank account ?
sikota : did you meet any of the officials who signed the iexora contract ?
ekpene : the meeting took place .
we met twice .
we met later in the evening at the chinese restaurant .
we met his excellency and his excellency was very happy .
prof mvunga : how many times have you met mr henry banda ?
prof mvunga : you went to good schools , you are very intelligent ?
prof mvunga : one of the reasons for coming here was to clear the name of sarb energy ?
prof mvunga : i will show you and i want you to react ?
court : you want to show him what ?
you want to go there ?
prof mvunga : i am showing the notice of motion .
is that facility still available ?
ekpene : this is what i want to clarify and put on record .
the republic of zambia didn 't pay the deposit .
we paid on behalf of the republic of zambia .
the republic of zambia has never paid one cent to the nigerian government , to nnpc or to sarb energy … prof mvunga : it is non-existent .
no one can derive any benefit ?
prof mvunga : so you had the authority to execute that contract ?
that contract id8 .
prof mvunga : id9 , your honour , i am sorry .
the contract is id8 .
so you had the power to execute that contract ?
ekpene : maj kachingwe was on the ground to execute it when he gave me the power of attorney … i had the power to execute it .
prof mvunga : you and maj kachingwe know each other very well ?
ekpene : i know him as an official of the zambian government .
prof mvunga : was maj kachingwe introduced to the nigerian oil company … ?
prof mvunga : so the nigerian oil company knew maj kachingwe ?
prof mvunga : you were quite sure that the nigerian oil company knew maj kachingwe as the special envoy ?
prof mvunga : and in relation to the contract , the zambian high commissioner had nothing to do with it ?
ekpene : it was the zambian high commissioner who pointed him to the nnpc .
prof mvunga : what was the involvement of the high commissioner ?
prof mvunga : that was the only role , otherwise everything was between you and maj kachingwe ?
prof mvunga : that was the only role played by the zambian high commissioner ?
prof mvunga : the role of the high commissioner was merely to identify maj kachingwe ?
prof mvunga : the details of the agreement … were left to you and maj kachingwe ?
prof mvunga : so by march 23rd you had the power of attorney to execute the power of attorney without maj kachingwe ?
prof mvunga : you contacted maj kachingwe when the offer letter was ready … ?
prof mvunga : you asked him to come over to nigeria ?
prof mvunga : did you see the contents of this offer letter before ?
prof mvunga : did maj kachingwe show you the offer letter ?
prof mvunga : why is the offer letter addressed to the republic of zambia ?
ekpene : the republic of zambia is the beneficiary country of the offer .
prof mvunga : why wasn 't it addressed to you , the agent ?
ekpene : we are mixing up the sequence .
the offer letter was based on the letter his excellency wrote to the nigerian president .
ekpene : for every country .
it is not peculiar to zambia .
ekpene : because his excellency applied for a contract … the offer letter is there .
prof mvunga : i noted that you are saying the date is 11th april , 2011 .
when did the nnpc sign ?
ekpene : i put in mine .
i can speak for mine .
prof mvunga : the uplifting of oil commenced after president banda ceased to be president of zambia ?
ekpene : based on my experience , if you want to do business in a country it is always good to have a lawyer .
a lawyer will help you well in setting you up .
a lawyer will help you to do the introductions .
nchito : sir , it was suggested to you that , in fact , mr ngwira actually had some shares ?
nchito : it was suggested to you that mr ngwira was playing whatever role he was playing as a nominee for maj kachingwe , remember that ?
nchito : i just want to be clear in terms of the time .
when did he actually leave ?
ekpene : it would be after i came and made a presentation and it became obvious that it was going to be a government-to-government contract .
nchito : it is not even at the time when the contract was being considered at nnpc ?
nchito : at the time the contract was being considered at nnpc , maj kachingwe wasn 't part ?
nchito : it was suggested to you in cross-examination that somehow you gave whatever money you gave to his excellency as a donation of your own volition as a staunch supporter of his excellency 's party , and you gave that 500,000 ?
lungu : the essence of re-examination as my colleague has alluded is to clarify , not to introduce new evidence .
nchito : it was also put to you sir , has any benefit accrued to his excellency and you gave the answer yes and no .
remember that ?
can you tell the court what the yes side is ?
nchito : we are arguing about the basics of re-examination ...
he said yes and no .
ekpene : his excellency requested an advance payment .
so he benefitted .
that is the yes side .
nchito : the $ 260,000 that you said you gave to his excellency the president , remember that ?
nchito : you kept mentioning that maj kachingwe insisted .
why did maj kachingwe insist ?
zulu : that didn 't arise as to why maj kachingwe insisted .
nchito : and my question is why did maj kachingwe insist .
nchito : i was going to rephrase my question as simply this ... what do you mean maj kachingwe insisted ?
prof mvunga : that is not a rephrased question .
we are back to the same issue ...

what doubt is there ?

it would lead to his excellency giving us the oil contract to manage .
ekpene : ... i sat with henry banda once he told me that he had a consulting background because his excellency did give us an order .
it was now left to me and henry to work out the details .
i told him if you are a consultant , you can do a feasibility study and if you do a feasibility study , i can pay for it and gave him the project title .

ireen kunda : i said that in reference to maj kachingwe ...
ekpene : i sincerely wish he had won the election .
ekpene breaks down after a long pause .
prosecutor : we recall the matter of the people versus rupiah bwezani banda .
we apologise , the dpp has just walked out for ...
sikota : i thought this was the opportunity mr macqueen zaza was waiting for .
ekpene : i was saying that i had no hatred about his excellency .
i sincerely wished he had won the election because if he had won the election , i wouldn 't be sitting here and the president wouldn 't be sitting there .
i hold him in the highest esteem .
he believed in me .
ekpene : it was our money .
we paid it on behalf of the republic of zambia .
ekpene : i told the board that his excellency did make a request for an advance payment and the board approved .
usually , once the board approves the expenditure , i handle the technical details and the disbursement of the expenditure .
prof mvunga : may i ask through the court how many more witnesses we are expecting ?
nchito : what i can confirm is it is not more that four .
konga : we went for a state visit .
officers from the ministry accompanied me .
i did not have letterheads from the ministry , so when i was requested , i had to ask the office to send a soft copy of the letterhead which my officers used to write to the minister of petroleum .
it was sent by email .
that was the fastest way .
nchito : i don 't know whether you can see it on the scan ?

so that was the first time that i met mr akpan in nigeria .
nchito : and what did you do in relation to the oil deal that you were asked to follow up by his excellency ?
nchito : mr akpan ekpene , you met him in nigeria the second time when you were on a private visit ?
nchito : what authority if any did you give him to follow up ?
konga : yes we signed a document with mr akpan for him to act on behalf of the government of zambia because he was seeing people unofficially .
people will know that yes he can follow up , that he is representing zambia .
how do they believe him ?
so we had to sign a document .
i have forgotten the name of that document he was given for him to be a government agent to follow up .
konga : unless it is a forged signature , i think it is my signature .
nchito : i am simply interested in some confirmation , if you are able .

konga : i will recollect it is one of the documents that was presented to me .

the one who is sitting opposite me .

the low beams have stopped working .

i find that the rubber mount for the fuel pump has disintegrated so i make a nice new one out of a piece of bicycle innertube .

caesar is a wonderful ( south african ) drummer who has a couple of wood craft shops ( he makes the crafts , beautiful wood sculptures & appliances ) and he is gone , opening a new shop in san pedro .
and , he is going to play new years at a high-toned place on the north end of san pedro .
of course i 'm envious , but i 've got a festival to play , so i cut and run for hillview and get there about 2pm .
the festival is scheduled to start at 3pm and so i set up my speakers , pa amplifier , mikes , and a couple of little guitar amps .
ray tells me that the marimba players a ) have been delayed and b ) he has to go get the marimba in his pickup .
i use this opportunity to take a nap ! ! .
before the marimba arrives , i play a couple of tunes just to " open the show " and then we wait for the marimba .
when it arrives , i am astounded .
i have seen marimbas before , little ones , big concert grand ones , but this is humongous ! !
eight feet long , instead of pipes on the bottom , it has cubical wooden resonators at the bass end .
it is played by four players .
two , on the right , play " the right hand " .
two on the left play " the left hand " -- the " stride " part in barrelhouse piano. here , but it is not as fancy as the one these guys had .
theirs has " alma belicena " in big letters on the front , and they are the " alma belicina marimba band . "
( i think that means " our belizeans " ) the bass bars are about 16 " long , and of course , there are two rows -- " black keys & white keys " -- altho these are all the same rich mahogany color . ■ uvedenie video servisu ako prvá tlačová agentúra na slovensku ■ denne do 20 video správ zo všetkých regiónov slovenska i od spolupracovníkov zo zahraničia ■ moderný video press systém umožňuje triedenie videospráv podľa kľúčových slov a anotácií ■ možnosť vlastného playera a priameho vkladania na stránku do textového obsahu ■ možnosť individuálneho vyhotovenia videozáznamu z tlačových besied , brífingov a pod .

big r west home for burns , or and fallon and winnemucca , nv pcs.production.1.20130822.1311 ( pewsuwvmwapp02 ) trecut şi prezent în politica externa românească | cadran politic home idei contemporane trecut şi prezent în politica externa românească posted by florin constantiniu on mar 25th , 2003 / / comments off istoria românilor alatura exemple de uluitor curaj si de totala neîncredere în fortele proprii istoria românilor alatura exemple de uluitor curaj si de totala neîncredere în fortele proprii .
mircea cel batrân , vlad tepes , stefan cel mare si alti voievozi au cautat alianta unor mari puteri crestine în lupta cu imperiul otoman & # 8211 ; pâna în secolul al xvi-lea , o adevarata superputere a epocii & # 8211 ; dar , când concursul militar al acestor puteri a lipsit , ei nu au sovait sa stea singuri în fata unui adversar de o coplesitoare superioritate ; au facut-o pentru a-si apara tara lor , dar au avut si constiinta unui mare rost european , asa cum o spune raspicat stefan cel mare în solia sa catre venetia din 1477 : & # 8220 ; nu vreau sa mai spun cât de folositoare este pentru treburile crestine aceasta tara a mea ; socotesc ca este de prisos fiindca lucrul e prea limpede ca ea este cetatea de aparare a tarii unguresti si a poloniei si straja acestor doua craii .
afara de aceasta , fiindca turcul s-a împiedicat de mine , multi crestini au ramas în liniste de patru ani & # 8221 ; .
când soarta armelor nu le-a fost favorabila , ei nu s-au descurajat , asa cum reiese si din inscriptia pusa de acelasi stefan la biserica din razboieni , ridicata în 1496 , acolo unde fusese înfrânt cu douazeci de ani înainte de sultanul mehmed al ii-lea : & # 8220 ; s-a ridicat prea puternicul mahmet , împarat turcesc , cu toate puterile sale rasaritene ; si înca si basarab voievod , numit laiota , a venit cu el , cu toata tara basarabeasca ( tara româneasca , numita astfel dupa dinastia basarabilor & # 8211 ; n.n. ) .
si au venit sa prade si sa ia tara moldovei ; si au ajuns pâna aici , la locul numit valea alba .
iar noi , stefan voievod si cu fiul nostru alexandru , am iesit înaintea lor si am facut mare razboi cu ei , în luna iulie 26 ; si cu voia lui dumnezeu , au fost înfrânti crestinii de pagâni .
si au cazut aici multime mare de osteni ai moldovei .
tot atunci si tatarii au lovit tara moldovei din ceia parte & # 8221 ; .
relatarea atât e obiectiva a unui esec & # 8211 ; sa recunoastem & # 8211 ; este cu totul rara la oamenii politici .
în alte împrejurari se constata o adevarata spaima când este evocata posibilitatea unei confruntari cu poarta otomana .
astfel , în 1658 , când domnul tarii românesti , mihnea al iii-lea ( era grec ! ) , le propune boierilor sa se ridice împotriva imperiului otoman , acestia vadesc o totala lipsa de încredere în victorie : & # 8220 ; doamne , bun lucru ar fi acesta !
iar noi ne temem ca nu vom putea plini desavârsit , ci numai vom zadarî sarpele si ne va înghiti cu totul .
caci noi sântem o tara mica si far de oameni , neputincioasa si far de ajutor de nici o parte .
iar turcii sunt puternici , mari si biruiesc toata lumea , de la rasarit la apus & # 8221 ; .
nimic din curajul lui stefan cel mare !
aceeasi gândire politica , exprimata în termeni similari de unul dintre cei mai vârstnici oameni politici români , în 1914 , theodor rosetti , cumnatul lui cuza voda , care , în consiliul de coroana de la sinaia , convocat pentru a fixa atitudinea româniei în razboiul ce tocmai izbucnise , a spus : & # 8220 ; suntem o tara mica , un biet popor , iesit abia de ieri , de alaltaieri , din greutati si din robie .
nu cred ca sta în putinta noastra sa facem politica mare .
acum cei mari s-au încaierat , noi nu avem ce cauta în luptele lor .
sa stam deci linistiti la o parte , sa ne vedem de nevoile si de necazurile noastre si sa ne caznim sa pastram ceea ce cu atâta truda am agonisit & # 8221 ; .
cine urmareste politica externa a româniei în perioada post-decembrista , constata ca ea este dominata de felul de a gândi al boierilor munteni de la 1658 sau & # 8211 ; pâna la un punct & # 8211 ; al lui theodor rosetti , la 1914 .
întocmai ca si dupa primul razboi mondial , când garantiile de securitate au fost cautate cu precadere în exterior ( franta si anglia , mica întelegere , întelegerea balcanica , alianta româno-polona ) , si astazi , se crede ca garantiile de securitate vin din includerea româniei în nato .
doua observatii sunt aici de facut : 1 ) .
nato din perioada post-comunista , nu mai este nato din perioada razboiului rece ; disparitia amenintarii sovietice a lasat teren liber de manifestare a divergentelor si tensiunilor dintre aliati .
încordarea dintre sua si & # 8220 ; vechea europa & # 8221 ; ( franta , germania ) este o dovada graitoare ; 2 ) .
cine ameninta românia în momentul de fata ?
cu bulgaria si ungaria nu mai avem nici un litigiu teritorial ; ucrainei , tratatul din 1997 i-a dat teritorii românesti , la care probabil , nici nu visa ; rusia nu mai este vecina cu românia .
atunci ? & # 8220 ; noile amenintari & # 8221 ; ?
terorismul ?
în realitate , prin urmarea orbeasca a sua , românia se expune loviturilor teroriste .
retorica propagandei americane vrea sa acrediteze ideea ca , în prezent , are loc o confruntare între lumea civilizata si terorism .
nu este adevarat .
terorismul islamic este o componenta a conflictului din orientul mijlociu , iar ostilitatea sa fata de sua , o consecinta a pozitiei adoptate de sua în acest conflict , pozitie perceputa de fundamentalistii islamici ca antiaraba si antiislamica .
în conditiile unei confruntari asimetrice , partea slaba recurge la mijloace neconventionale de lupta , în speta acte teroriste .
din dorinta de a fi admisi în nato , am sacrificat ucrainei teritorii românesti la care kievul nu avea nici un drept .
atunci , în 1997 , sua s-au opus intrarii româniei în nato .
dupa 11 septembrie 2001 , interesat sa transforme nato într-un simplu instrument al politicii externe a sua si sa-si extinda controlul asupra unui numar cât mai mare de tari , washingtonul si-a aruncat privirile si asupra româniei .
guvernantii de la bucuresti , nesiguri de ei , apasati de banuiala de neo- sau criptocomunism , aveau nevoie de o legitimare din partea serifului mondial , sua .
au alergat în întâmpinarea dorintelor lui cu un servilism de prost gust , care a compromis tara noastra .
în jelania sa , theodor rosetti spunea ca românia nu trebuie sa se amestece în certurile dintre cei mari .
guvernantii nostri , tematori ca si theodor rosetti , n-au mers cu logica fricii pâna la capat : mai simplu spus , & # 8220 ; sa stea în banca lor & # 8221 ; .
nu , în dorinta de a fi pe placul washingtonului si a primului lor vasal , marea britanie , au criticat pozitia rationala a frantei .
ei nu înteleg ca , pentru o tara ca românia , coordonatele securitatii sunt un sistem multipolar sanatos si o institutie care sa impuna respectul legalitatii internationale .
activitatea politica si diplomatica a tarii noastre în ultimul timp pare a voi sa ilustreze afirmatia lui emil cioran : & # 8220 ; a fi român înseamna a fi o fiinta cu multa apa în sânge & # 8221 ; .

are we going to be satisfied with a mediocre tax system that won 't create the jobs of the future for our sons and daughters ?
or , are we willing to consider reforming the tax code so that we have a modern , simpler and fairer tax code ?

i believe you are , too .

grâce à une alliance avec la presse canadienne , marketwired est le seul distributeur de communiqués qui profite , pour la transmission de vos communiqués , de l ’ accès exclusif au même réseau que la presse canadienne utilise pour envoyer ses nouvelles directement aux systèmes éditoriaux de plus de 600 journaux , stations de radio et de télévision et sites internet à travers le canada.la livraison garantie de marketwired permet aux médias canadiens d ’ avoir accès facilement à vos nouvelles dans un format qui leur est familier , augmentant ainsi les chances que votre message soit vu par le plus grand nombre possible de journalistes.plus de contrôle pour vous assurer la tranquillité d ’ espritla série complète de solutions de distribution vous offre la flexibilité de choisir un service complet ou une option de libre service . vous pouvez vous fier aux services des représentants de marketwired pour transmettre vos communiqués ou profiter à moindre coût du service complètement automatisé de pr direct.pr direct vous fournit un accès 24 / 7 à votre propre compte internet sécurisé , vous donnant la possibilité de préparer votre communiqué , de l ’ envoyer directement de votre ordinateur au réseau de la presse canadienne et de rejoindre les médias en quelques minutes . envoyez une photo avec votre communiqué .
la presse canadienne fournit un service de distribution de photos aux médias et un service d ’ affectation photo avec des photographes qui se spécialisent dans la photo de presse , augmentant vos chances d ’ intéresser les médias .

nouvelles sur commande est le seul service en temps réel qui vous permet de surveiller le fil de la presse canadienne et d ’ être alerté instantanément des nouvelles avant qu ’ elles deviennent des manchettes .

jednou z veľmi aktívnych škôl , pre ktoré sa produkt tasr do každej školy stal neodmysliteľnou súčasťou výučby je súkromné gymnázium na dneperskej ulici v košiciach .
jaroslav rezník bol jediným kandidátom na tento post a agentúru viedol doteraz , od 5. apríla 2007 .

the theatre troupe natyakendra staged its popular comedy dui je chhilo ek chakor at the national theatre hall .
it is an adaptation from carlo goldoni ’ s ’ the servant of two masters ’ .
adapted and directed by tarik anam khan , the play addresses the social anomalies through the comic stories of ordinary people .
nagarik natyangan staged pushi biral o ekjon prokrito manush at the national theatre hall , dhaka padatik staged paicho chorer kissa at the experimental theatre hall and nagarik natyangon ensemble staged jugolbondi at the studio theatre hall .
all of these productions satirise the human psychology and socio-political issues . comment nagarik natyangan staged pushi biral o ekjon prokrito manush at the national theatre hall , dhaka padatik staged paicho chorer kissa at the experimental theatre hall and nagarik natyangon ensemble staged jugolbondi at the studio theatre hall .
all of these productions satirise the human psychology and socio-political issues .

a veteran of syrian cinema and one of the most accomplished arab graduates of moscow 's vgik film school , mohamad malas resurrects the ghosts of the chilling legacy of his country 's thirty-year-old dictatorship as vividly as the clamouring in the streets .
he films ghalia onstage and begins to fall in love with both her and her dead muse .
fouad tells ghalia that he wants to make a film about zeina and that he wants her to act the role .
she soon travels to see her parents , but is compelled to return to damascus to help fouad tell zeina ’ s story .
many of fouad ’ s housemates are artists and intellectuals , and malas ( and his young co-writer samer mohamed ismail ) makes umm sami ’ s house a classic microcosm of syria ’ s social and cultural diversity .
there is a palestinian boxer pummelling the heavy bag hanging in his room and a journalist , named hussein , who ’ s lined his entire garret – immediately over the rooms of his chaste lover nawara – with newsprint .
a room suddenly became available at umm sami ’ s , fouad explains to ghalia , because one of his flatmates had to leave .
she ’ s alawi ( a sect of islam , members of which dominate syria ’ s baath party ) , he confides with a whisper , and the police didn ’ t want her associating with umm sami ’ s rabble .
filming under a shroud of secrecy and danger to his crew in damascus was & ldquo ; very difficult and complicated , & rdquo ; he said .
mohamad malas was born in quneitra , syria in 1945 .
he embarked on a career in film after working as a teacher and receiving a scholarship to the gerasimov institute of cinematography .
wikileaks sniffs out spy salesmen journey through northern ethiopia : part two in fact , i was hesitant to enter the compound and see the castles i heard so much about .
i was afraid that as some people say i might be disappointed .
i am one of those people who love to read about ethiopian history and believe that our ancestors were a people of knowledge and wisdom .
i understand many of my generations will call this belief as a fairy-tale .
however , i love to hold and protect my conviction that ethiopia has been a pioneer and has a history that is significant and unique from the rest of the world .
since one of the spots that testify about ethiopians history is the fasil castle , i did not want to take the chance of knowing that it is not as big as it was in my mind .
when i saw the castle for the first time , it was hard to believe my own eyes .
i have seen the castle on tv and pictures several times .
however , the first sight of it was exhilarating that closed my doubt about the incredible beauty of the castle .
many writings suggest the castle of fasil in its time was described as greater even than the house of solomon .
it was said to be lavishly decorated with all manner of finery .
gold-leaf adorned the ceilings , as did gemstones of the finest quality .
ivory and fine woodworking covered the inner walls , as did majestic paintings of flora .
in the intervening years , however , all of this finery has vanished , moved elsewhere , looted or destroyed by the ravages of time .
iyasu ’ s palace , like much of fasil ghinb , is now no more than a reflection of its former glory .
still , the inside of the remaining is amazingly lavish , almost hard to believe that it is 400 years old .
the floors , the roofs and the walls are creatively decorated .
the doors and the window tells their own story about the amazing atse fasil and the rest of the royals who lived there at the time. are usually representatives ) , a parliament consisting of a house of " the opposition " the leader of the opposition is a de facto five year term .

following the inside thefts of airport trolleys last year the authorities have beefed up the security at the airport .
however there are foreigners and thais who still ply their trade by trying to take what is not theres so watch out and keep your bags safe .
make sure all your valuables are in a safe place and do not leave cameras , passports , valuables etc in your main bags even in the left luggage-- you risk losing them and theres no comeback .
with the world crises & internal headaches biting into thailands economy there has been an upsurge bank robberies in bangkok and even at suvannabhumbi airport so you are warned to beware .
it is up to you to stay safe but we publish items for the unwary traveller as the airport security can still not get their act together although the govt have taken steps to evict around 400 taxis which is a good sign as at september 2009 .
my dept secretary informed on this .
her cousin was detained in bangkok for stealing a box of cigarettes in a duty-free shop in bangkok international airport .
he had paid for chocolates and a carton of cigarettes .
the cashier put a packet of smokes into his bag and he thought it was a free pack .
he was arrested for shop-lifting and the thai police extortion price was rm30,000 for his release .
he spent two nights in jail and paid rm50 for an air-cond cell , 200-300 baht for each visitor , and rm11,000 for his final release .
now would you belive this scam ? ? ? as it was on tv nation channel 13th august ?

the driver has doctored the aircondition in the car to make the passenger 9 / .

" chino " kuylen and his dad raise rottweilers .
chino is my butane deliveryman and i told him that i needed a dog " with feet as big as snowshoes . "
i don 't think he 's ever seen a pair of snowshoes , but he knew what i was talking about .
charlotte won 't let me get a rottweiler , but chino told me that he sometimes had mixes .
he came to me in february and said he had a new litter that was mostly labrador retriever ; mother lab , father was half rottweiler .
we negotiated a price ( he wanted to give me one , and i wanted to pay ) and then i didn 't hear anything for a long time .
finally , he asked me if i wanted male or female , i said " female " and he said that he would bring one over the next day .
next day , he showed up with a little black male puppy that looked like it was about to die !
i paid him ( a deal is a deal ) and we rushed the dog down to doctor sheila , our feisty vet on the other end of town .
she said he had tick fever , was covered with fleas and full of worms , so she wormed him , " fleed him " and gave us antibiotics to give him for a fortnight .
that night , he was very lonesome , very listless , but the next day he was feeling frisky and has been irrepressibly energetic ever since .
news : i took brutus down to the bay today , and he was afraid of the water .
who ever heard of a labrador retriever that was afraid of the water ?
i will put on a bathing suit and take him in with me , i guess .
it worked for my kids. water , but he loves to play with other dogs , and he is he is getting a lot bigger so he can hold his own with ( july 2003 ) brutus has grown up and you can see him here , cold in arkansas , and learning to be a lake swimmer .

sam keenan was creating first use of the ball in the centre of the ground , allowing dan ellis , drew haebich and the pearce medallist nick doyle to run and clear the ball down to our forward line with ease .

quick thinking rennie people managed to put a star picket in the post and raise the post back up to vertical , and thankfully only 10 minutes or so was lost .
tungamah then banged on four quick goals up to 3 / 4 time and got the game back in control .
waaia came at tungamah again in the last quarter and were a chance of stealing the game .
it was a nerve racking last quarter , an exhilarating contest that will go down as one of the great grand finals in pdfl history .
the tungamah boys were cramping up , as drew haebich was subbed off for youngster tom irvine , backing up after his 3rds premiership win .
dimmy payne laid a terrific tackle in the tungamah forward line , his first tackle for the year , and kicked a nice goal .

brushy haebich kicked a goal in the last , taking his tally to two goals for the game .

deles | psn opinyon , pilipino star ngayon sections , pilipino star ngayon | philstar.com hindi maaring magkaroon ng tunay na kapayapaan sa mindanao kapag hindi isinali sa usapan si mnlf chairman nur misuari .
si adviser on the peace process teresita deles ay tila nakalimutan ang recent history tungkol sa gulo sa mindanao .
noong 1996 , mga dalawang taon bago magtapos ang kanyang panguluhan , inapura ni president fidel v. ramos na magkaroon ng peace settlement kay nur misuari ng mnlf .
sa pagmamadali ni fvr , tila nakaligtaan niyang isali sa usapin si hashim salamat ng milf .
bagamat maraming supporters si misuari sa gitnang silangan , hindi naman matawaran ang bilang ng mga prominente at mayayamang mga kaibigan si hashim salamat roon .
kaya nagpatuloy ang daloy ng mga cash donation kay hashim salamat “ in the name of muslim brotherhood and in the propagation of islam ” in mindanao .
kaya lumago ang puwersa ng milf at nagpatuloy ang rebellion doon .
ngayon naman , history is clearly repeating itself and deles seems to be unaware of it .
si misuari naman ngayon ang naiitsapwera , at dahil marami pa rin namang tao sa gitnang silangan ang naniniwala kay misuari , tuloy-tuloy pa rin ang daloy ng mga cash donation sa kanya also “ in the name of muslim brotherhood and the propagation of islam ” in mindanao .
ambassador ako noong 1996 sa uae , kaya ako ang umaktong mediator between misuari at ang executive secretary ni fvr noon na si ruben torres na nagpangita sa dubai .
inaamin ko hilaw na hilaw ang naging peace settlement ni fvr kay misuari dahil hindi naisama si hashim salamat .
kaya sana aminin din ni deles na hilaw na hilaw ang nailuto niyang peace settlement with the milf dahil hindi isinama ang mnlf .
hinarap ni deles ang mga leader ng milf kay p-noy pero ni minsan hindi niya ginawa ito sa mga leader ng mnlf .
so expect from time to time the explanations to be given by senators and congressmen on how their pdaf are being spent wisely , effectively and efficiently reaching all the way to the benefit of their constituents .
the common line for their explanation would be that it is the implementing agencies ( ias ) which has the accountability on their accreditation of the non-governmental organization ( ngos ) .
if the ngos turned out to be like the once established and organized by napoles , the legislators would say : our signatures and our staff were forged in the documents .
we will have it investigated .
if napoles or his man friday , benhur luy and his cohorts are being pictured with the senators and the congressmen in an affair , they will say there are not properly invited and came out that they have gate crashed .
and so and so forth .
in other words , they are not connected to napoles in one way or the other .
take note of the events .
after napoles has been linked to the pork barrel scam and names and names of legislators are being implicated , napoles tried to do a houdini act and sought for forgiveness to the senators and congressmen in having their names implicated .
then came out the arrest warrant for her as filed by luy , it has nothing to do with the pork barrel scam .
it is the senate which probed the allegation .
senators investigating the senators .
whew .
then came the p100 m bounty from the president .
napoles surrendered to the president .
the president ’ s men led by dilg sec .
mar roxas and edwin lacierda , arranged everything to make napoles secure in her surrender untkl she was brought to the makati city jail .
not a few say there was a special treatment .
then came out the story about napoles to become a state witness .
state witness of what ?
she surrendered because of another crime , not the pork barrel scandal .
come on , the script is not being read well by the players in the conspiracy plot .

" helensburgh advertiser 12 : 26 13-sep-13 is one of the ancient games played in afghanistan .
the name of this game is perhaps on the basis of popular beliefs and legends , one could say this game was played for the first time in the oxus basin .
our people had earlier domisticated the horse and used to law inscribed on bull 's hide in gold and hung it on the gates of bactria .
according to subject-matter is the horse , one should say that two types of horses are more wellknown in afghanistan : one is the " qataghani " type which is smaller in size but strong and sturdy , the other raised in the steppes of faryab and balkh is larger.both types are used the horseman snatches the careas of a calf as they have already learned the tricks .
the hungry for part of the day and rides it daily a fairly long distance .

the people in the oxus basin had domisticated the horse in order to defend their homeeland against the fighting on horseback was discontinued , the horse come to be used as a means of transport in the first place and a vehidle to play bozkashi in the second. bozkashi because usually a hand to hand fightfollowed a cavalary campaign .
a horseman had to be strong and adept enough to beat his opponents on the ground as well .
now wrestling is considered as an ancient game like bozkashi and it is done in sunny days of spring .

for instance , one cannot hold one 's opponents by the leg latter displayed their mettle as adept horsemen and wrestlers .

uk pm to promise eu referendumdavid cameron is to promise an in / out referendum on the eu if the conservatives win the next election woods looks like his old self with win at doral map of doral floridatiger woods earned his 76th career pga tour title with a two-shot victory at doral tiger owner of all majorswoods becomes the first golfer to hold all 4 major titles at the same time .

the extreme dryness of the air causes any heat that is radiated back into the atmosphere to be lost instead of being absorbed by the water vapor in the atmosphere .
the source of this energy is the sun , and because its heating effect is greater at the equator than at the poles , it creates a circulation in the atmosphere .
hot moist air rises over the equator and flows at a high level towards the poles , where it cools and sinks .
the equator is therefore a region of low pressure , and the poles are regions of high pressure .
the atmosphere is not a closed system .
it interacts with the land , the ocean , and the ice ; and the ice in turn interacts with the ocean.winds create currents in the ocean .
the annual cycle of freezing and melting of the sea ice around antarctica creates a vertical circulation in the ocean .
