now your favourite km group newspaper is available in an will place it on our photo sales website so that you can purchase a you searched for " ohler " did you mean ole ? your search returned no results yet not everyone in alaska is happily singing “ kumbaya . ”
gop governor sean parnell and the republicans who hold the majority in the alaska house complain that the senate ’ s working group has obstructed vital legislation .
for the last two years , parnell ’ s top priority has been an oil tax cut intended to reverse declining oil production on the north slope , but the senate has resisted the cut .
with 19 of alaska ’ s 20 senate seats on the ballot this year , parnell and conservative activists see an opportunity to elect a new senate majority made up of republicans who are less interested in cooperating with democrats .
to critics , though , what ’ s off the table is the problem — with nothing bigger than governor parnell ’ s oil tax plan .
one of the key changes in 2007 was to make the oil production tax more progressive . when the value of a barrel of oil rises , the tax rate rises too .
with high oil prices over the last two years , that structure has produced a bonanza for the state ’ s bottom line .
alaska has socked away billions of additional dollars in its reserves , which were already the largest in the country .
standard and poor ’ s upgraded its credit rating to aaa in january , the highest level .
senator linda menard is a conservative republican who was one of the few members of the working group to endorse parnell 's oil tax cut .
but her membership in the group has helped prompt a challenge from the right in one of the hottest primaries in the state .
“ it ’ s partially why i ’ m running , ” mike dunleavy , menard ’ s opponent , told the anchorage daily news in july . “ i don ’ t believe the coalition represents the constituents .
i think it represents itself . ”
the " war on terror " toppled the taliban regime , but it has not removed religious fundamentalism , which is the main cause of misery for afghan women .
in fact , by bringing the warlords back to power , the us has replaced one misogynist fundamentalist regime with another .
a raumati couple have completed a year-long project sculpting hairy maclary and his friends .
politics being what it is , the next leader of her majesty 's opposition may not be chosen on the basis of a clear-sighted , altruistic assessment of which contender would be best for the party , and the nation .
congratulations to the council for overcoming the obstacles to build and open a new aquatic centre .
the project had its complications .
facebook is still the best social media platform to date and will still continue to dominate and play an important part of the everyday experience for most people who are connected in the next couple of years .
but , facebook is not as engrossing and wholesome as it used to .
it is now littered with rantings of broken-heartedness , for flaunting , for rumor-mongering and hoaxsters .
for sending spam and virus and all sorts of unwanted feeds .
it can be annoying too when you 're scrambling to beat a deadline then your friends all of a sudden shoots a message in the guise of " care for a break ? " only to waste your time .
of course , we can 't expect everyone to behave on facebook like we want them to or impose our own standards to its users .
it 's a community .
and in a community , you get to see and interact with all sorts of people who can be a source of annoyance or disgust .
that being the case , what 's the point to using facebook as a campaign tool in the face of its bad and senseless side ?

her bir iş insanı ortala 18 görüşme yapacak .
program kapsamında toplam 20 bin görüşme yapılacak .
yabancı heyetler 58 ile gidecek.i̇stanbul yatırım başkenti ! yaklaşık 15 milyonluk nüfusuyla dünyada 100 ’ ün üzerindeki ülke nüfusunu geride bırakan ve son 20 yılda 172 milyarlık bütçe ile yönetilen i̇stanbul , bu bütçenin 67.4 milyar tl ’ sini yatırımlara harcadı.ras al khamiah emirliği yatırımcılara fırsatlar sunuyorbirleşik arap emirliği ’ nin yedi emirliğinden birisi olan ras al khamiah , vergi avantajlarından bürokrasi azlığına kadar yatırımcılara sunduğu önemli fırsatlarla dikkat çekiyor.yalova 'ya 4 osb ve 2 büyük liman geliyorsanayi kenti mi , turizm kenti mi olması gerektiği yönündeki tartışmalara son noktayı koyan yalova ; çiçekçilik , eğitim , turizm ve limancılık alanında büyümeyi planlıyor.pazarlamada ‘ duyu ’ çağımümkün olduğu kadar çok tüketiciye ulaşmak için her dönemde farklı stratejiler geliştiren iş dünyası , son zamanlarda duyuların gücüne inanmaya başladı .
markalar şimdi de müşterilerini görme , işitme , koku ve dokunma duyuları ile etkilemeye çalışıyor.ekonomik ve sosyal alanda beş yıllık yeni yol haritası10 .
kalkınma planı 'nda hedeflerin fazla iddialı olmaması dikkat çekiyor .
yıllık ortalama yüzde 5.5 büyümenin öngörüldüğü plan dönemi sonunda işsizliğin 2 puan düşmesi , enflasyonun da yüzde 4.5'e inmesi öngörülüyorfinansçı ve hazır giyimci hong kong yolundaçin 'e açılma yolunun hong kong 'dan geçtiğini vurguyayan waipa ve hong kong yatırım ajansı başkanı simon galpin , " pek çok finansçı ve hazır giyimci bölgede ofis , mağaza açmak için görüşüyor " dedi.tencere-tava bandosu sokaklara taştıtürkiye 'nin gsyh ’ sı 1,3 trilyon dolara ulaşacakonuncu kalkınma planı 'na göre , 2018 yılında gsyh 1,3 trilyon dolara ulaşacak .

return to the home page.noua conducere de la beijing- o reală schimbare în politica chineză ? | cadran politic home politică externă noua conducere de la beijing- o reală schimbare în politica chineză ?
sfârsitul de saptamâna care a trecut a marcat un nou & # 8220 ; început & # 8221 ; pentru aparatul politic de conducere al chinei .
sâmbata , 15 martie jiang zemin , 76 , s-a retras în umbra politica pentru a face loc lui hu jintao , 60 , deja sef al partidului comunist chinez si mostenitor declarat al decedatului deng xiaoping ca presedinte al republicii jiang zemin a fost reales de catre delegatii congresului national al poporului ca sef al comisiei guvernamentale în sarcina careia se afla conducerea armatei de 2,5 milioane de soldati a chinei .
jiang conduce si o comisie similara din cadrul partidului si nu a dat semne ca ar intentiona sa renunte la nici una dintre aceste functii .
dealtfel , asteptarile larg exprimate înclina catre o mentinere a unei largi influente din partea acestuia în politica statului , a carui guvern va trebui sa faca fata implicarii din ce în ce mai profunde a chinei în afacerile internationale , precum si cresterii instabilitatii ca urmare a reformelor economice , pe plan intern .
zhu ronji , prim-ministru si principal factor de raspundere în politica economica a predat portofoliul lui wen jiabao , lasând în urma reputatia unui reformator iritabil , recunoscut pentru adresarea directa , sensul umorului si maiestria în administrarea sarcinilor economice , care a jucat un rol determinant în recuperarea economiei chineze dupa criza asiatica .
numirea noului cabinet chinez , care a urmat instalarii lui hu , constituie un crescendo în primul transfer ordonat de putere din cei 54 de ani de comunism în china .
noului cabinet îi revine sarcina de a continua politica de liberalizare economica a chinei , dar si de a mentine un control politic strâns al partidului comunist .
o prezentare succinta a figurilor proeminente ale actualei puteri chineze îl are în frunte pe hu jintao , presedinte , ales cu o covârsitoare majoritate de 2937 voturi pentru si 4 împotriva , wen jiabao , prim ministru si numarul unu ca responsabilitate în administrarea economiei , ales de asemenea cu 2906 voturi pentru , 3 împotriva si 16 abtineri .
enumerarea continua cu li zhaoxing , fostul ambasador al chinei în statele unite si ambasador al chinei la onu ca ministru de externe , cao gangchuan general militar implicat în programul spatial al chinei ca ministru al apararii , jin renquing ca ministru de finante si zhou yongkang ca ministru al securitatii publice .
zeng qinghong , cel mai apropiat colaborator al lui jiang a fost numit vicepresedinte .
el ar putea constitui un rival al lui hu , având reputatia ca fiind cel mai bine conectat tânar lider al partidului si un expert al jocurilor politice .
putine schimbari reale sunt asteptate de la noua conducere chineza .
reforma politica a constituit un subiect tabu de la evenimentele petrecute în piata tiananmen în 1989 , dar noua generatie care vine la putere este fara îndoiala mult mai expusa curentelor de opinie internationale decât predecesorii sai .
de aceea se asteapta din partea acestora mai multa toleranta la critica si o presa mai libera , în special daca aceasta este vazuta ca ajutând la eradicarea coruptiei înfloritoare ce afecteaza imaginea partidului .
în chestiunea taiwan-ului , considerat în continuare ca o provincie renegata a chinei , nu se asteapta o pozitie schimbata din partea noii conduceri .
analistii estimeaza ca aceasta va fi la fel de suspicioasa în privinta presedintelui taiwanului , chen shui-bian si chiar mai precauta în asumarea unor riscuri care ar putea duce la pierderea initiativei diplomatice .
pe plan intern , provocarea majora o constituie preluarea conducerii unei societati de 1,3 miliarde de oameni , aflata într-o stare crescânda de nemultumire datorata luptei continue cu somajul , saracia rurala si celorlalte constrângeri atrase de reforma economica si competitia indusa prin aderarea la organizatia mondiala a comertului .
datorita necesitatii mentinerii stabilitatii pe plan intern , dar si climatului international în care se situeaza china la moment , opinia expertilor internationali înclina spre a pronostica probabilitatea unor schimbari majore în politica dusa de noul guvern ca fiind foarte redusa .
7 and organ at age 12 .

provisions for the amendment of the statutes or articles of incorporation .
nonprofits can have members but many do not .
the nonprofit may also be a trust or association of members .
the organization may be controlled by its members who elect the board of directors , board of governors or board of trustees .
nonprofits may have a delegate structure to allow for the representation of groups or corporations as members .
alternatively , it may be a non-membership organization and the board of directors may elect its own successors .
charities are not permitted to engage in political activity ; doing so may result in the revocation of charitable status .
the following laws or constitutional articles of the republic of india are relevant to the ngos : stichting van openbaar nut ( dutch , abbreviated son ) or fondation d ’ utilités publique ( french , abbreviated fup ) . ^ " what is the not for profit sector ? " , charity people .

sun.star publishing , inc.pulis gisulong sa babaye mireklamo | sun.star midangop sa buhatan sa sta .
ana police station ang usa ka pulis human siya gikomprontase sa usa ka dalaga , alas 6 : 00 sa buntag kagahapon , sabado , sud sa camp mericido , catitipan , buhangin , siyudad sa davao .
ang pulis naila nga si naroy ( bansagon gitago ) , 37 , minyo , taga kidapawan city , ug nadestino sa camp .
mericido sa camp catitipan .
subay sa taho sa sta .
ana police , gibutyag ni police officer 2 jason d. ladroma , duty desk officer nga kalit miabot sa opisina ni naroy ang babaye nga si mae ( bansagon gitago ) , 21 , estudyante , kinsa kasamtangang nag-abang sa saint anne dormitory sa dalang ramon magsaysay ave .
nasayran nga didto pa lamang daan sa camp catitipan , gisinggitan na sa babaye ang pulis gamit ang mga dautang pulong .
gihatud sa pulis ang babaye sa giabangan niyang dormitoryo aron pakalmahon apan nagdumili siya sa paghilom .
pag-abot sa ramon magsaysay , migawas ang babaye sa sakyanan ug iyang gikuha ang mga importanteng dokumento sa pulis nga nagkatag sa likod sa iyang sakyanan ug gisulod sa basurahan .
wa pa matagbaw ang babaye , iyang gipatiran ang pultahan sa sakyanan sa pulis .
dugang nasayran gikan kang ladroma nga gipa-eskuwela sa pulis ang babaye , apan wala kini miangkon kaniya kung naa ba sila 'y relasyon .
ang mobile patrol sa sta .
ana police , miadto sa dapit aron hangyuon ang babaye sa pagtubag sa mga pasangil sa pulis ngadto kaniya , apan pakyas kini nga miuban sa mga pulis .

tungod lamang sa politikanhong ambisyon sa pipila nga bisa ’ g ang kadaghanan dili uyon , nadamay na hinuon ang mga inosente , gawas pa ana mao ang dagan sa komersyo .
kinsa ba ang maka sapi sa pang gubat kun dili ang pipila lang , nga ba gayud nga dili tagaan ang kalinaw og higayon nga magpatigbabaw sa mindanao ?
subo usab huna hunaon nga tungod niini , mamahimo na pud ning usa ka hinungdan nganong gapanghusgahon ang ubang pundok o tribo gumikan lang kay ang binuhatan sa pipila , gaka apil na ang kintaibuk-an panlantaw sa tanan .
taas na kaayo ang kasaysayan sa tinubdan nganong nagka gubot ang isla sa mindanao , ug hinaut lang nga masulbad ug matagaan na kini ug sakto nga dalan aron dili na mahitabo ang pagpanghasi .
apan usa lang ang akong maingon bahin niining tanan , bisa ’ g mag baylo pa ta og managlahing panggobyerno , kung ang atong mga kaugalingon dili disiplinahon ug ipatigbabaw ang garbo ingon man kahakog sa gahum , dili gihapon mawala ang isyu sa korapsyon ug pagpang limbong nga maoy hinungdan ngano ang usa ka nasud dili molambo .

" i thought i was going to go to law school , but my dad talked me out of it , " she says , laughing .
" we let the professionals do the money management , " she says .
" i do distinguish myself as a portfolio manager , not as a wealth manager , " says rosenau .
" people come to me to manage money for them . "
" you have to understand the reasons for the rally and work through the noise -- from the fed , from the pundits on cnbc , and so on , " she says .
" a healthy correction is inevitable , but i am optimistic for the longer-term growth of the equity markets . "
" it was suggested to me that i should try to start my own practice in the private bank , " she says .
" i didn 't have any clients " -- meaning no dedicated clients for whom she was the lead advisor -- " so that made me nervous . " the hood of a jeep in korea .
he retired in for a 2011 article about his 50 years as a priest .

he explained that he sent upnd mazabuka central member of parliament garry nkombo to represent him and the party at sakeni 's funeral .
there is a strong rejection of how tra ­ ian băsescu is doing politics .
emil boc ’ s replacement would have worked , if the new prime minister had been a radical change and if he had been a leader who knows what he must do and how .
not the case here .
traian băsescu himself made sure to set the length of the leash from the very beginning .
a number of unprovoked errors followed , and the mru project shrank before it had a chance to grow .
apparently traian băsescu still plans to rely on this project , although not even the democrats had welcomed it .
this has dispelled the myth of the president ’ s invincibility and of traian bă ­ sescu as the saviour .
no one is wai ­ ting for a solution from the president any longer .
it is the second băsescu government dismissed by parliament , which proves that democracy cannot be fooled forever , as much of a player as the president may be .
three years have passed since traian băsescu ignored a parliamentary majority and imposed two minority governments backed by the political migrants who have “ defected ” once again today .
beyond the price paid by romania , which is hard to quantify , the other price is quite clear : the president has become an irrelevant politician , and pd-l – on the verge of dismantling and disappearing as a party .
the democratic union of ethnic hun ­ garians in romania ( udmr ) made a huge mistake , not so much by betraying the johannis project , but by promoting a reverse apartheid , i.e. struggling for the isolation and encla ­ visation of the hungarian minority so as to be able to control it .
i said it back in 2007 : an ethnic party is a mistake and the hungarian problem ( and that of the other minorities ) must be taken over by the romanian parties .
the recent issue of the târgu mureş univer ­ sity is the best example of political stupidity , a manoeuvre that damages the hungarians as well as everyone else .

5 جولای , 10 : 49 , بوسيله ‌ ى .این عمل شنیع با بقدرت از رسیدن احمد شاه ابدالی درافغانستان کنونی رواج یافت . چون او خودش نیز بچه بیرش نادر افشار بود ازترویج این فرهنگ لذت می برد . امیر عبدالرحمن بنیانگذار نقشهء فعلی افغانستان در جوانی مفعول بود . او نیز بنوبهء خود فرهنگ لواطت وبچه بازی را درقندهار وقطغن ودیگر شهرهای افغانستان تشویق میکرد .

mayroon akong masugid na manliligaw na matiyagang nanunuyo sa akin sa nakalipas na limang buwan .
mayroon akong boyfriend kaya hindi ko siya masagot .
mahal ko rin naman ang boyfriend ko kahit kung minsan ay may hindi magandang ugali .
nagbago ang pagtingin ko sa manliligaw ko nang masaksihan ko ang isang hindi inaasahang pangyayari .
minsan ay nakasakay ako sa jeepney nang may nakita akong batang nabundol ng isa pang jeep pero hindi hinintuan .
pinagtinginan lang ng tao ang kawawang bata .
kasunod nito , kitang-kita ko na may la ­ laking naglalakad na sumugod sa naaksidenteng bata na kahit duguan ay kinarga niya at isinakay ng taxi .
ang manliligaw ko pala ang lalaking yaon .
mula noon ay hinangaan ko na siya .
may dalawang linggo na nang mangyari yaon pero hindi ko pa rin siya sinasagot .
pero sa katunayan , ramdam kong napamahal siya sa akin sa nakita kong pagkabayani niya .
pag-aralan mo rin ang damdamin mo at baka paghanga lang ang nararamdaman mo sa ngayon .
get to know the guy more at kapag tiyak mo na , na mahal mo siya talaga ay saka mo siya tanggapin .
pero bago iyan , makipag-break ka muna sa kasalukuyang boyfriend mo .

the report by the media does not focus on the arrests and allegations against the suspects , but bragging about the commitment of the government to fight corruption and the opinion of the public who are ’ pleased ’ by the arrest .
in fact , the public media never had an advisor who could show them a direction that the government can only brag when the suspects are found guilty of the charges by the court .
the other reaction is that , the arrest will jeopardize the credit of the agency in the eyes of the public and discourages the already little culture of paying tax properly .
in the last couple of years minister fanta and erca were appreciated by the government itself and its media outlets for the high amount of tax money they have collected .
in 2009 / 10 , for example , the country collected 35 billion birr , the highest tax money collected in history .
the media couldn ’ t have enough of melaku at the time , appreciating his effort and achievement in making tax the top agenda in the country .
the point here is that , for the last few years , tax payers seem to show an improvement and respect for the system and understand the seriousness of the law if they don ’ t pay tax or try to play around the system .
indeed , this fear might be intended to taxpayers with no official status and relatively low capital , since few of the top rich of the country seems to have joined melaku fanta in prison .
all in all , the point is that , arresting him and his deputy right away ( gebrewahid was arrested from his office , and melaku was arrested at the airport when he returned from business trip in a local flight ) might temper this new found passion to pay taxes on time , since revealing all of this means the system itself is rigged at the highest level .

on the following kickoff , the husker ’ s kenny bellreturned the kickoff 63 yards to the southern miss 37 .

kellogg put together a drive , moving the balldownfield that was only knocked off the tracks with a fumble by freshman rbterrell newby .

at the end of thethird quarter with armstrong driving the huskers to inside the 15 yard line , nuled 49-13 .
on the second play of the fourth quarter , armstrong ’ s twoyard hand off to imani cross for the touchdown rounded out the scoring for thegame and gave the huskers a 56-13 lead .
the opening game of a football season is not supposed to bea heart-stopper for teams like nebraska.after all , the huskers haven ’ t lost a season opener since they dropped aseason opener at home in 1985 when they lost 17-13 to florida state .
but no one told that to wyoming .
the cowboys were clearly not intimidated by arecord crowd of over 91,000 or the searing heat , and took the huskers to thefinal play of the game before bowing to nu by a final score of 37-34 .

permanent diaconatecalled to servehave you ever had a sense that you might be called to serve god through the blessings you have received ?
maybe you have sensed a call to assist our priests in the daily work of parish ministry .
maybe you have become acutely aware of the many injustices facing god 's people in the world , and you feel a call to try to make a difference .
all christians are called to serve , but perhaps you have felt a desire to move closer to god and his church in order to serve others in a new and purposeful way .
is god calling you to be a permanent deacon ?

tout manquement de votre part au respect de ces conditions d 'utilisation peut entraîner la résiliation de votre compte et des privilèges dont vous en retirez .
1.1 .
si vous choisissez d 'utiliser l 'un ou l 'autre des sites internet de médias transcontinental , vous reconnaissez avoir lu et compris les présentes conditions d 'utilisation et acceptez par le fait même de les respecter ainsi que toutes éventuelles modifications pouvant leur être apportées .
ces conditions d 'utilisation constituent un contrat entre vous et médias transcontinental .
1.2 . les présentes conditions d 'utilisation peuvent faire l 'objet de modifications , ajouts ou suppressions à tout moment .
tout tel changement sera affiché sur cette page ; de plus , si nous apportons des changements importants aux conditions d 'utilisation actuelles , lesdits changements seront affichés au moins trente ( 30 ) jours préalablement à leur entrée en vigueur et nos utilisateurs nous ayant communiqué leur adresse courriel en seront avisés directement par courrier électronique .
vous êtes prié de consulter les présentes conditions d 'utilisation de façon périodique afin de prendre connaissance d 'éventuels changements qui pourraient leur être apportés .
1.3 .
si vous n 'acceptez pas d 'être lié par ces conditions d 'utilisation , vous ne pouvez pas utiliser les sites internet de médias transcontinental .
de plus , si vous jugez inacceptables certaines des éventuelles modifications apportées aux présentes conditions d 'utilisation , vous pouvez en tout temps résilier votre compte .
2.1 .
médias transcontinental exploite ses sites internet à partir de ses bureaux situés au canada .
médias transcontinental ne fait aucune représentation à l 'effet que tous les éléments de ses sites internet peuvent être utilisés en d 'autres lieux .
ceux qui choisissent d 'utiliser les sites internet de médias transcontinental le font de leur propre initiative et il leur appartient de se conformer à toutes les lois qui leur sont applicables .
2.2 .
en utilisant les sites internet de médias transcontinental , vous reconnaissez et acceptez que les présentes conditions d 'utilisation sont régies par les lois applicables dans la province de québec et que tout litige découlant de , ou lié à l 'utilisation des services et sites internet de médias transcontinental sera soumis à la compétence des tribunaux du district de montréal , province de québec .
3.1 .
à tout moment , médias transcontinental peut modifier , suspendre ou mettre fin à tout élément de ses sites internet , incluant la disponibilité de toute fonction , base de données ou contenu .
médias transcontinental peut également imposer des limites sur certains éléments ou restreindre l 'accès à certaines sections de ses sites internet sans avis préalable et sans engager sa responsabilité .
4.1 .
tous les éléments des sites internet de médias transcontinental vous sont offerts pour usage personnel à des fins non commerciales .
il est interdit d 'utiliser les éléments des sites internet de médias transcontinental à des fins commerciales ou publicitaires sans le consentement écrit de médias transcontinental .
5.1 .
lors de votre inscription , vous devez notamment choisir un mot de passe et un nom d 'utilisateur .
vous ne pouvez ( i ) choisir ou utiliser un mot de passe d 'une personne avec l 'intention de vous faire passer pour telle personne ; ( ii ) utiliser un mot de passe dans lequel une autre personne a des droits , sans l 'autorisation d 'une telle personne ; ou ( iii ) utiliser un mot de passe ou un nom d 'utilisateur que médias transcontinental , à sa seule discrétion , juge offensant .
5.2 .
vous êtes responsable du maintien de la confidentialité de votre mot de passe et de votre nom d 'utilisateur .
vous devez aviser médias transcontinental le plus rapidement possible par courriel de toute utilisation ou utilisation présumée de votre compte , ou de tout bris ou bris présumé de sécurité .
5.3 .
vous êtes responsable de toute utilisation des comptes que vous détenez relativement aux sites internet de médias transcontinental .
médias transcontinental ne peut être tenue responsable d 'un usage non autorisé de votre compte ni de toute perte ou dommage résultant notamment du non respect des mesures de sécurité énoncées à la présente section .
5.4 .
vous êtes responsables de la mise à jour de vos renseignements personnels , pour éviter que toute communication ou correspondance soient envoyées à la mauvaise personne .
6.1 .
médias transcontinental se réserve le droit d 'exiger des frais pour l 'accès futur à ses sites internet , ou toute section de ceux-ci .
si médias transcontinental vient à exiger des nouveaux frais pour l 'accès à toute section de ses sites internet , médias transcontinental vous en avisera à l 'avance et vous donnera l 'opportunité de fermer votre compte avant que lesdits frais ne vous soient imposés .
7.1 .
les communications effectuées sur les forums de discussions et les babillards électroniques sont publiques et non privées .
ainsi , vous êtes tenu de respecter les règles énoncées ci-après : 7.1.1 .
utilisez un langage respectueux .
un langage grossier ou offensant ne sera en aucun temps toléré .
de plus , nul ne doit tenir ou soumettre un contenu diffamatoire , obscène , injurieux , pornographique , abusif ou autrement illégal .
7.1.2 .
soyez courtois .
nul ne doit proférer des menaces ou inciter quiconque à la violence ou la haine .
il est également interdit de perturber délibérément toute discussion par des messages répétitifs , des messages sans fondement ou du pourriel ( « spamming » ) .
7.1.3 .
discutez mais n 'attaquez pas .
dans un regroupement aux opinions multiples , les gens ne sont souvent pas d 'accord .
médias transcontinental encourage des discussions vives ainsi que des débats dans ses forums de discussions ; par ailleurs , les attaques personnelles sont une violation des présentes conditions d 'utilisation .
7.1.4 .
nul ne doit utiliser les babillards électroniques pour promouvoir ou offrir en vente tout bien ou service dans un but commercial , mener ou envoyer toute étude , concours , système pyramidal ou chaîne de lettres , pourriel ( « spamming » ) , ni pour faire du piratage ( « hacking » ) , de la sollicitation ou tout autre acte à des fins illégales .
il vous est également interdit de poser des actes qui puissent porter atteinte aux droits d 'autrui ainsi qu 'à leur jouissance des forums de discussions ou les babillards électroniques .
7.1.5 .
il vous est interdit de soumettre ou transmettre sur nos sites , tout virus , bugs , vers , chevaux de troie , ou tout autre code ou fichier néfaste .
7.2 .
vous reconnaissez que vous avez tous les droits nécessaires , notamment les droits de propriété intellectuelle , sur tout matériel que vous transmettez en tant qu 'utilisateur à médias transcontinental .
7.3 .
vous reconnaissez et acceptez que vous demeurez titulaire des droits d 'auteur sur tout matériel que vous soumettez en tant qu 'utilisateur à médias transcontinental ( par exemple , lettre à l 'éditeur , commentaires , etc . ) .
par ailleurs , vous reconnaissez et acceptez que par le seul acte de soumettre votre matériel à médias transcontinental , vous accordez à celle-ci une licence non exclusive , sans compensation aucune à votre égard , d 'utiliser , d 'éditer , de modifier , de supprimer , de reproduire , de publier , de diffuser et de donner des sous licences ; à cet effet , vous renoncez à tout droit moral que vous pourriez faire valoir relativement à l 'intégrité de votre œuvre .
7.4 .
vous reconnaissez et acceptez que vous êtes personnellement responsable du contenu des messages que vous communiquez sur les forums de discussions ou les babillards électroniques des sites internet de médias transcontinental , ainsi que des conséquences de ces messages .
7.5 .
médias transcontinental se réserve le droit , à son entière discrétion , de ne pas publier ou de retirer tout matériel transmis par un utilisateur pour l 'un ou l 'autre de ses sites internet .
par ailleurs , ceci demeure une faculté et non une obligation .
7.6 .
médias transcontinental ne fait aucune déclaration concernant le contrôle du matériel disponible sur ses sites internet .
médias transcontinental n 'est pas , et ne peut être tenue responsable de l 'exactitude , de la légalité , de la conformité aux règles de propriété intellectuelle ou aux présentes conditions d 'utilisation de tout matériel fourni par ses utilisateurs .
8.1 .
les sites de médias transcontinental contiennent des liens vers des sites internet gérés par des tiers .
l 'activation de ces liens peut vous faire quitter les sites appartenant à médias transcontinental .
sachez que médias transcontinental n 'exerce aucun contrôle sur les sites internet des tiers .
ces sites sont entièrement gérés par des tiers et médias transcontinental ne peut être en mesure de faire quelque déclaration que ce soit quant à la qualité ou au contenu global de ceux-ci ni quant à la qualité des produits offerts ou à la sécurité transactionnelle des sites en question .
le fait que ces sites de tierces parties soient répertoriés sur les sites internet de médias transcontinental ne doit en aucun cas être interprété comme un endossement de la part de médias transcontinental et n 'engage d 'aucune façon la responsabilité de cette dernière .
médias transcontinental ne peut en aucun cas être tenue responsable d 'éventuels dommages occasionnés par l 'utilisation de ces sites .
toutes plaintes concernant les sites de tierces parties doivent être dirigées aux administrateurs desdits sites .
9.1 . les marques de commerce et logos utilisés ou affichés sur les sites internet de médias transcontinental sont des marques de commerce et logos enregistrés ou non par médias transcontinental ou des tiers .
rien sur les sites internet de médias transcontinental ne peut être interprété de façon à permettre , directement ou indirectement , l 'utilisation de tels marques de commerce ou logos sans la permission préalable écrite de leur propriétaire .
sans limiter la généralité de ce qui précède , il est interdit de reproduire les marques de commerce et les logos affichés sur les sites internet de médias transcontinental à des fins commerciales , publicitaires ou pour augmenter le volume de visiteurs sur votre site .
9.2 .
tous les éléments des sites internet de médias transcontinental ( incluant , sans limitation , les textes , articles , photographies , images , illustrations , extraits audio et vidéo , logiciels , etc . ) sont protégés par droits d 'auteur et appartiennent à médias transcontinental ou au tiers agissant à titre de fournisseur de contenu .
à moins d 'exceptions clairement énoncées , aucun élément des sites internet de médias transcontinental ne doit être interprété comme vous accordant un droit quelconque en regard de la propriété intellectuelle de médias transcontinental ou d 'un tiers agissant à titre de fournisseur de contenu .
9.3 .
sous réserve de ce qui est prévu à l 'article 9.4 des présentes , vous ne pouvez copier , reproduire , modifier , publier , diffuser , distribuer , participer au transfert ou à la vente de , créer de nouvelles œuvres à partir de , traduire , télécharger , concéder sous licence ou d 'aucune manière exploiter , tout élément offert sur les sites internet de médias transcontinental ( incluant tout logiciel ) , en tout ou en partie .
10.1 .
les marques de commerce et logos utilisés ou affichés sur les sites internet de médias transcontinental sont des marques de commerce et logos enregistrés ou non par médias transcontinental ou des tiers .
rien sur les sites internet de médias transcontinental ne peut être interprété de façon à permettre , directement ou indirectement , l 'utilisation de tels marques de commerce ou logos sans la permission préalable écrite de leur propriétaire .
sans limiter la généralité de ce qui précède , il est interdit de reproduire les marques de commerce et les logos affichés sur les sites internet de médias transcontinental à des fins commerciales , publicitaires ou pour augmenter le volume de visiteurs sur votre site .
10.2 .
tous les éléments des sites internet de médias transcontinental ( incluant , sans limitation , les textes , articles , photographies , images , illustrations , extraits audio et vidéo , logiciels , etc . ) sont protégés par droits d 'auteur et appartiennent à médias transcontinental ou au tiers agissant à titre de fournisseur de contenu .
à moins d 'exceptions clairement énoncées , aucun élément des sites internet de médias transcontinental ne doit être interprété comme vous accordant un droit quelconque en regard de la propriété intellectuelle de médias transcontinental ou d 'un tiers agissant à titre de fournisseur de contenu .
10.3 .
sous réserve de ce qui est prévu à l 'article 9.4 des présentes , vous ne pouvez copier , reproduire , modifier , publier , diffuser , distribuer , participer au transfert ou à la vente de , créer de nouvelles œuvres à partir de , traduire , télécharger , concéder sous licence ou d 'aucune manière exploiter , tout élément offert sur les sites internet de médias transcontinental ( incluant tout logiciel ) , en tout ou en partie .
10.4 .
vous pouvez télécharger ou copier pour utilisation personnelle à des fins non commerciales seulement , les éléments des sites internet de médias transcontinental , en autant que vous conserviez tous les avis de propriété intellectuelle qu 'ils contiennent .
le fait de copier ou de mémoriser tout élément à des fins autres qu 'une utilisation personnelle est absolument défendu sans la permission écrite préalable de médias transcontinental ou du détenteur des droits d 'auteur identifié dans l 'avis de propriété intellectuelle .
10.5 .
le contenu fourni par l 'utilisateur est soumis à la licence et aux droits énumérés au paragraphe 7 ci-dessus .
11.1 .
par les présentes vous vous engagez à défendre et à tenir indemne médias transcontinental , ses administrateurs , officiers , dirigeants , actionnaires , employés , entreprises affiliées , représentants et fournisseurs de contenu ( collectivement , « médias transcontinental » ) de toute condamnation monétaire en capital , intérêt , frais judiciaires et extrajudiciaires et de tout autre dommage , incluant mais sans limitation , tous les frais légaux raisonnables encourus par médias transcontinental se rapportant à toute réclamation , poursuite , action ou mise en demeure ( « réclamation » ) découlant du non respect , par vous ou tout autre utilisateur de votre compte , des présentes conditions d 'utilisation .
médias transcontinental se réserve le droit de participer à la défense de toute telle réclamation et d 'être représentée par un avocat de son choix .
12.1 .
vous pouvez résilier votre compte en tout temps en accédant à la section « votre profil » du site internet .
12.2 .
médias transcontinental se réserve le droit , à son entière discrétion et à tout moment , de résilier ou suspendre votre compte en totalité ou en partie de ses sites internet pour toute raison , incluant , sans limitation , le non-respect de ses modalités d 'utilisation .
13.1 .
pour toute information sur la politique de collecte et la protection d 'informations personnelles par médias transcontinental , veuillez consulter notre politique de confidentialité à l 'adresse principale suivante : http : / / tctranscontinental.com / privacy-policy 13.2 .
de plus , lorsque vous acceptez de participer à un concours ou une à offre présentée par un tiers ou que vous consentez à recevoir de l 'information directement de tiers , vous acceptez expressément les politiques de confidentialité de ce tiers . nous vous recommandons de prendre connaissance des termes de la politique de confidentialité dudit tiers avant toute divulgation d 'information de nature privée à votre sujet . médias transcontinental ne peut être tenue responsable de réclamation , perte , action , dommage , poursuite ou recours associés de quelque façon que ce soit pour l 'utilisation de vos informations privées par ce tiers .
13.3 .
les renseignements personnels recueillis par l 'intermédiaire de sites internet peuvent être enregistrés et traités au canada ou à l 'étranger et être soumis aux lois applicables dans d 'autres juridictions .
les modalités d 'utilisation sont présumées redevables . si l 'une des dispositions des présentes modalités d 'utilisation est déclarée invalide ou inapplicable pour quelque motif que ce soit , le caractère invalide de cette disposition n 'a aucune incidence sur la validité et l 'applicabilité des autres dispositions des présentes modalités d 'utilisation .
en utilisant les sites internet , incluant toute commande ou achat sur un site internet de médias transcontinental , vous reconnaissez et acceptez que les présentes modalités d 'utilisation soient régies par les lois applicables dans la province de québec , et par les lois fédérales applicables du canada . par les présentes , vous soumettez irrévocablement à la compétence exclusive des tribunaux de la province de québec , dans la ville de montréal en ce qui concerne tous les différends découlant des présentes modalités d ’ utilisation , de votre usage de l 'un des sites internet .
dans l 'éventualité où vous auriez une réclamation pour violation de droits d 'auteur relativement à du matériel inclus dans les sites internet de médias transcontinental , ou pour toute autre correspondance , nous vous prions de nous en aviser à l 'adresse suivante : haga clic aquí para leer el documento de obispo etienne en español una declaración pastoral a los fieles de wyoming sobre matrimonio y familia una enseñanza sobre la dignidad y santidad del matrimonio de vaticano ii más instrucciones sobre la naturaleza y la belleza de la familia y el matrimonio terms of use health hazard alert : certain le canotier de l 'isle cheese may contain listeria monocytogenes the following le canotier de l 'isle cheese is affected by this alert : cfia by filling out the online feedback form at http : / / www.inspection.gc.ca / contactus .

new york expanded its film tax credit to include live television shows , dubbed the “ jimmy fallon tax credit , ” to attract the new host of nbc ’ s “ the tonight show ” to relocate from california to the big apple .
maryland tripled the value of its film tax credit after it lured hbo ’ s “ veep ” and netflix ’ s “ house of cards ” to the state .
worried that colorado was giving too many tax breaks to big oil and gas companies , lawmakers there overhauled the state 's " enterprise zone " program .
the new law caps the amount of income tax credits that can go to large corporations " who certainly don ’ t need the tax credit , " said house majority leader dickey lee hullinghorst , a democrat .
part of the money saved by changing the tax credit program will be used as seed money for emerging bioscience industries .

yatırım danışmanlığı hizmeti , aracı kurumlar , portföy yönetim şirketleri , mevduat kabul etmeyen bankalar ile müşteri arasında imzalanacak yatırım danışmanlığı sözleşmesi çerçevesinde sunulmaktadır .
burada yer alan yorum ve tavsiyeler , yorum ve tavsiyede bulunanların kişisel görüşlerine dayanmaktadır .
bu görüşler mali durumunuz ile risk getiri tercihlerinize uygun olmayabilir .
bu nedenle , sadece burada yer alan bilgilere dayanılarak yatırım kararı verilmesi beklentilerinize uygun sonuçlar doğurmayabilir.bist isim ve logosu " koruma marka belgesi " altında korunmakta olup izinsiz kullanılamaz , iktibas edilemez , değiştirilemez .
bist ismi altında açıklanan tüm bilgilerin telif hakları tamamen bist 'ye ait olup , tekrar yayınlanamaz .
tüm finansal veriler matriks aracılığıyla sağlanmaktadır .
veriler 15 dakika gecikmelidir . “ the way out of labyrinth ” | cadran politic andré gide wrote his essay on theseus in 1946 , towards the end of his life , in a france marred by human and economic losses , torn between the euphoria of victory and the humiliation of collaborationism .
he was trying to convey a message of recovery starting from the individual to the city and from city to mankind .
at a first reading , in the ’ 70s , i saw theseus as a guideline for human development : „ you must first under ­ sta ­ nd who you are “ & # 8230 ; „ be a man .
prove yourself able to show to your fellows what man can be and what he can aim to be “ & # 8230 ; „ there are great deeds to be done in the world .
make yourself ! “ & # 8230 ; „ always think that to loiter is to be ­ tray “ & # 8230 ; „ it is not enough to be and then to have been ; you must leave some ­ thing behind , act so that nothing ends with you . “ why didn ’ t we have a new national project prepared for romania as an eu and nato member , able to cope with the challenges of the knowledge-based society and the globalising world ?
in my opinion , this happened because in 1999-2000 , when people accepted to pay the price of change , a small , but vocal part of the intellectual elite , which mistook ideals for illusions , did not understand it and voiced its disa ­ ppointment .
to find our way out of the labyrinth we need to create a new balance between knowledge and power , able to reconfigure a framework in which individuals can not only be , but also become .
it is only by turning our centuries-long survival strategy into a self-improvement strategy , that we can take „ the romanian sense of being “ beyond the „ romanian sense of self-hatred , “ to a „ romanian sense of self-respect . “ « previous „ românia încearcă să îşi consolideze rolul în regiune , dar metodele prin care operează nasc suspiciuni “ & # 8211 ; interviu cu ambasadorul dmitry rogozin , şeful misiunii rusiei la nato şi reprezentant special al preşedinţiei federaţiei ruse la negocierile privind strategia de apărare antirachetă © 2011 cadran politic · rss · designed by theme junkie · powered by wordpress iowa news headlines - newsbystate.com man found dead wed sep 11 , 2013 08 : 13 am edt city ’ s attorney nixed audit wed sep 11 , 2013 06 : 13 am edt midamerican energy issues scam warning wed sep 11 , 2013 8 : 13 pm edt far out !

registered users can request assistance from our professional editors . les ministres du tourisme mettent l 'accent sur la compétitivité du secteur touristique canadien whitehorse , yukon-- ( marketwired - 13 sept .
2013 ) - les ministres f & # 233 ; d & # 233 ; ral , provinciaux et territoriaux responsables du tourisme , souhaitant profiter de l 'essor que conna & # 238 ; t l 'industrie touristique canadienne , se sont r & # 233 ; unis cette semaine afin d 'aborder divers dossiers , notamment l 'acc & # 232 ; s des visiteurs , le marketing et le d & # 233 ; veloppement des attractions touristiques .
cette r & # 233 ; union du conseil canadien des ministres du tourisme & # 233 ; tait copr & # 233 ; sid & # 233 ; e par le ministre d ' & # 201 ; tat ( petite entreprise et tourisme ) ( agriculture ) , l 'honorable maxime bernier , et par le ministre du tourisme et de la culture du yukon , l 'honorable mike nixon . & # 171 ; l 'industrie touristique canadienne est l 'une des plus comp & # 233 ; titives au monde et nous voulons poursuivre sur cette lanc & # 233 ; e , a affirm & # 233 ; le ministre d ' & # 201 ; tat bernier .
ensemble , nous accompagnons l 'industrie afin qu 'elle profite de nouveaux d & # 233 ; bouch & # 233 ; s dans certains march & # 233 ; s touristiques cl & # 233 ; s , contribuant ainsi & # 224 ; cr & # 233 ; er des emplois et & # 224 ; stimuler la croissance au canada . & # 187 ; & # 171 ; je suis tr & # 232 ; s heureux d 'avoir accueilli mes coll & # 232 ; gues responsables du tourisme cette semaine , ici & # 224 ; whitehorse , a ajout & # 233 ; le ministre nixon .
le secteur touristique du yukon se porte tr & # 232 ; s bien et poursuivra certainement sa croissance gr & # 226 ; ce aux ententes que nous avons conclues lors de notre r & # 233 ; cente mission touristique en europe .
nous savons que la vigueur de ce secteur au yukon contribue & # 224 ; faire du canada une destination touristique internationale encore plus attrayante . & # 187 ; les ministres ont discut & # 233 ; des effets des march & # 233 ; s internationaux en expansion sur le secteur touristique canadien et explor & # 233 ; des mani & # 232 ; res de tirer profit des possibilit & # 233 ; s offertes par l 'industrie touristique mondiale .
en outre , les ministres ont pris connaissance des renseignements les plus r & # 233 ; cents sur les initiatives qui am & # 233 ; liorent l 'acc & # 232 ; s des voyageurs internationaux au canada , notamment en ce qui a trait aux visas , au transport a & # 233 ; rien et & # 224 ; l 'initiative canado-am & # 233 ; ricaine par-del & # 224 ; la fronti & # 232 ; re .
compte tenu de la concurrence mondiale et de la multiplication des choix qui s 'offrent aux consommateurs , les ministres ont reconnu l 'importance de d & # 233 ; velopper les attractions touristiques et de les promouvoir , et ont & # 233 ; chang & # 233 ; leurs points de vue sur d 'autres fa & # 231 ; ons de stimuler la comp & # 233 ; titivit & # 233 ; du secteur touristique canadien .
les ministres ont & # 233 ; galement reconnu l 'importance du tourisme autochtone et explor & # 233 ; des mani & # 232 ; res d ' & # 233 ; changer de l 'information sur les pratiques exemplaires visant & # 224 ; favoriser davantage le d & # 233 ; veloppement de ce secteur .
les ministres canadiens du tourisme poursuivront leur collaboration dans le but d 'accro & # 238 ; tre le nombre de visiteurs internationaux au canada .
ils pr & # 233 ; voient se r & # 233 ; unir de nouveau & # 224 ; l ' & # 206 ; le-du-prince- & # 201 ; douard l 'an prochain .
le tourisme favorise l 'entrepreneuriat et cr & # 233 ; e de l 'emploi dans les r & # 233 ; gions urbaines et rurales , ainsi que dans le nord .
il y a plus de 609 500 emplois dans le secteur touristique , dans des collectivit & # 233 ; s de toutes les r & # 233 ; gions du pays .
cette industrie repr & # 233 ; sente environ 2 % du produit int & # 233 ; rieur brut du canada .

muchos inmigrantes han tenido que dejar sus casas y sus países para poder proveer con las necesidades más básicas para sus familias .
la desesperación de su situación no corresponde con la espera excesiva de tiempo ( a veces más de 15 años ) para poder procesar una solicitud de visa .
creemos que los que ya están aquí , por el bien de la unidad familiar y por humanidad , deben recibir una consideración especial que pueda incluir una opción para la ciudadanía .
apoyamos las medidas que ayudan a proteger la seguridad de nuestra frontera , siempre y cuando se respeten los derechos humanos y la vida humana .
necesitamos un sistema que sea humano para los trabajadores y justo para los empleadores .
mientras que los católicos estén en desacuerdo con los límites de la justicia sobre el enfoque específico de reformar el sistema migratorio , debemos estar de acuerdo como pueblo de fe para vivir el mandamiento que se nos da en las escrituras de & ldquo ; acoger al extranjero & rdquo ; y defender la dignidad humana que dios nos ha dado .
les pedimos a todos los residentes de iowa que recuerden su historia como inmigrantes conforme vayamos trabajando juntos por una solución justa y compasiva a este problema .
animamos a los miembros de la comunidad católica a contactar a sus representantes del congreso en este mes , especialmente a la cámara de representantes para que apoyen la legislación para una reforma migratoria coherente con los principios de justicia .
una manera fácil de hacerlo es visitar la página www.justiceforimmigrants.org y enviar un mensaje a su representante en el congreso para animarle a apoyar el proceso .

all rights reserved . suporta sa mga sundalo , residente ng zambo tiniyak ni pnoy | psn balita ngayon , pilipino star ngayon sections , pilipino star ngayon | philstar.com manila , philippines – seguridad ng mga residente ng zamboanga city ang pangunahing inaalaala ni pangulong benigno aquino iii sa harap ng tumitinding tensyon sa pagitan ng mga tropa ng pamahalaan at mga tauhan ng paksyon ni nur misuari sa moro national liberation front ( mnlf ) .
sa pagbisita ni aquino sa siyudad ngayong biyernes , personal niyang tiningnan ang kalagayan ng mga apektadong residente na nakatigil sa mga evacuation center at mga sundalong patuloy ang pagharap sa mga tauhan ni misuari .
" siguraduhin na walang unncessary loss of lives ... the preservation of life is paramount , " pahayag ni aquino na siniguro rin ang buong suporta sa mga sundalo . " kadamay ninyo ako hanggang sa matapos natin ang sitwasyong ito , " dagdag niya .
lumipad patungong zamboanga city si aquino kaninang umaga at binista ang mga lumikas na residente dahil sa kaguluhang dinala ng mga rebelde mula nitong lunes .
sinabi ni aquino na hindi magdadalawang-isip ang gobyerno na gumamit ng puwersa upang masugpo ang mga miyembro rebeldeng mnlf .
may ilang dosenang residente rin ang hawak ng mga rebelde bilang mga bihag at ginagawang pananggalang sa mga sundalo .
nagpatupad na rin ang lokal na pamahalaan ng forced evacuation sa mga apektadong barangay ng rio hondo , santa barbara , santa catalina , talon-talon , at mampang .
sinabi naman ni rev. absalom cerveza , tagapagsalita ni misuari , na nais nilang makipaglaban sa gobyerno upang makuha nila ang kanilang kalayaan .
" yung impression na nagpunta sila roon para sa isang peace caravan , hindi totoo ' yun .
this is a war for independence ! " ani cerveza .

seeteraz.sk priniesol novú spravodajskú aplikáciu pre androidy - novinky - tasr.sk spravodajský portál teraz.sk sprístupnil novú androidovú aplikáciu mobilné telefóny a tablety .
aplikácia s najaktuálnejšími správami a fotogalériami je bezplatne dostupná v google play na adrese http : / / play.google.com / store / apps / details ? id = com.abaffydesign.teraz . „ chceli sme pripraviť jednoduchú a prehľadnú spravodajskú aplikáciu , aby si naše správy mali ľudia kedykoľvek pri sebe .
podľa reakcií užívateľov usudzujeme , že sa nám to aj podarilo , “ povedal generálny riaditeľ tasr jaroslav rezník .
správy z portálu www.teraz.sk sú v aplikácií triedené podľa najnovších , najčítanejších , najdôležitejších a podľa sekcií .
čítať sa dajú ako v knihe , jedným potiahnutím prsta .
v aplikácií teraz.sk sa dá tiež nastaviť veľkosť písma a všetky správy sa dajú jedným kliknutím zdieľať na sociálnych sieťach , alebo posielať e-mailom .
aplikácia je zatiaľ dostupná len pre telefóny a tablety s operačným systémom android , o niekoľko dní by sa mala v apple store objaviť aj bezplatná aplikácia pre iphone a ipad .
spravodajský portál teraz.sk počas troch mesiacov prevádzky zaznamenal viac ako 850 000 návštev , z nich bolo 450 000 unikátnych návštevníkov , ktorí si pozerali viac ako 3,5 milióna stránok .
najviac ľudí prišlo na portál teraz.sk v máji - takmer štvrť milióna unikátnych návštevníkov si prezrelo viac ako 1,5 milióna stránok .
spravodajský portál teraz.sk prevádzkuje tlačová agentúra slovenskej republiky ( tasr ) .
portál ponúka bezplatne výber najdôležitejších a najzaujímavejších správ zo spravodajského servisu tasr , vrátane videí a fotogalérií .
teraz.sk je zároveň rozšírením služieb verejnosti , ktoré tasr poskytuje .
horticulturist ron smith ~ ~ ~ code blue : injuries in the oil patch we are thankful for our energy resources , our tourism , our agriculture , our natural treasures , our businesses , and our greatest strength – our citizens .
before i get farther along , i ’ d like to recognize some of our remarkable citizens today .
so where do we go ?
the federal government has recently committed to flexibility but is still trying to put together the many needed rules .
i suggest we work now and over the next year preparing .
we should continue to seek answers and we should look at the set of conditions we would need to accept an exchange and an expansion package .
let ’ s decide what we want and make the pitch to the federal government .
in other words , let us try within the law that is upon us to find the best deal , the best fit for wyoming .
to do nothing puts the full brunt of the aca upon us – everything is dictated by the federal government – without an opportunity to tailor the law to our needs .
director forslund is prepared to offer options .
this body has the opportunity to develop what it would like to see as we make our request .
perhaps the federal government will not agree to our terms .
we ’ ve subsidized out-of-state drivers long enough for the privilege of driving on our roads .
it is a conservative principle to pay as you go rather than using savings to pay for an ongoing expense .
it is a conservative principle to pay as we go rather than create a debt for others to fix .
that is what congress has been doing creating a debt for our kids and grandkids to pay .
not properly maintaining and funding our highways today is the same concept , we are creating a debt for those who come after us to pay .
we need a long-term funding source for roads .
our state ’ s future literally depends on it because today ’ s students are tomorrow ’ s citizens , workers , and leaders .
parents and teachers do not care about who is to blame – they care about results .
if we want accountability , we have to be accountable .
we want our paper ’ s headlines to speak of results , of innovation in education rather than name calling and blame or that our schools are getting an “ f ” grade .
it is up to us to do the work to get the headlines we seek – the headline that wyoming is progressing toward excellence in education .

the app ( available both for android and iphone ) was a collaboration between mr langham and infranix technologies in india .

speaking at the inauguration ceremony of the project which was held in halic congress center , erdogan said , " today , we witness a milestone in terms of health facilities in turkey .
it was my dream to initiate the city hospitals project 11 years ago .
we use to get up at dawn and get in the queue in okmeydani hospital to get a number .
then , i went home and got my deceased mother not to let her wait in the queue for hours .
our people will no longer face these problems . "
the total investment made for this unique project amounts to 15.285 billion turkish liras .

v apríli 2013 portál teraz.sk podľa aimmonitora navštívilo 270.090 reálnych užívateľov . „ sme radi , že aj čísla aimmonitora , do ktorého sme vstúpili koncom marca , potvrdili , že o rýchle , verejnoprávne a nebulvárne spravodajstvo je medzi ľuďmi obrovský záujem , “ povedal generálny riaditeľ tasr jaroslav rezník .
zároveň zdôraznil , že v máji má jeden z najmladších spravodajských portálov na slovensku ambíciu prekonať 300-tisícovú hranicu reálnych užívateľov . „ verejne auditovaná návštevnosť nášho portálu teraz.sk ukázala , že za 13 mesiacov sme vybudovali silný spravodajský web , “ zdôraznil rezník a dodal , že v návštevnosti nie sú započítané čísla z mobilných aplikácií teraz.sk , ktoré má stiahnutých viac ako 35.000 užívateľov .
v apríli rástli aj ďalšie projekty tasr – portál webmagazin.sk a školský servis.sk.
webmagazín podľa štatistík aimmonitora zaznamenal 69.322 návštevníkov a školský servis 36.795 návštevníkov .
we can 't pay usd 500 toll now - truckers na correspondent david in an exclusive interview with the guardian in dar s salaam , tatoa ’ s spokesperson elias lukumay maintained that the truckers need more time if they are to pay the new levy and their proposed period is three to six months .
according to a letter from rra commissioner general ben kagarama to his tanzanian counterpart , rwanda decided to increase the fee from usd152 to usd500 as of september 1 to ’ allow fair competition ’ in the cross-border transport industry .
but owing to complaints raised by tanzanian transporters the rra decided to postpone the charge to september 10. ippmedia.com © 1998-2013 .

românia – china : de la o agendă de bune intenţii la rezultate concrete ?
la început de miez de vară , agenda premierului româniei , victor ponta , a inclus un turneu asiatic , în cursul căruia a avut numeroase întâlniri bilaterale printre care cele mai semnificative fiind cele cu omologul său chinez & # 8211 ; li keqiang , cu şeful guvernului din hong kong & # 8211 ; leung chun-ying şi chiar cu noul preşedinte al chinei , xi jinping .
ecuaţia puterii a fost întotdeauna una foarte complicată în românia .
s-ar putea spune , pe bună dreptate , că am început cu stângul .
teroarea comunistă a dus , conform principiului acţiunii şi reacţiunii din fizică , la o destindere a resorturilor democratice care a produs jdemii de mişcări politice şi haos .
pe de altă parte , după 45 de ani de educaţie privind socialismul multilateral ...
usl îşi vede visul cu ochii .
ceilalţi luptă pentru a căpăta statutul de partide stabilitatea politico-socială .
o sintagmă care a devenit o obsesie naţională .
în condiţiile în care marea majoritate a românilor se consideră jignită de presupunerea că nu s-ar pricepe la politică , iar o altă parte rosteşte cu emfază , sentenţios , „ nu mă pricep , nu mă interesează ” , stabilitatea politico-socială străbate ca un coşmar somnul care a cuprins civismul românesc ....
usl , teatrul disensiunilor .
despre cei obligaţi să susţină unitatea puterii am avut impresia că lucrările comisiei parlamentare pentru modificarea constituţiei vor fi un fel de simpozion ştiinţific pe detalii tehnice , ştiţi dumneavoastră , ceva în genul echipei de instalatori care vin şi fac să nu-ţi mai curgă robinetul .
nu înţelegi prea bine ce meşteresc acolo , dar în final e ok , îţi convine .
mă bucur că nu e aşa , că m-am înşelat .
s-a încheiat , previzibil , și congresul pd-l , care a consfințit despărțirea de traian băsescu .
ca un copil , acesta s-a ofticat și și-a luat jucăriile certându-i pe cei care n-au mai vrut să se joace cu el .
dintr-o dată , pd-l nu mai era un partid democrat , ci tributar fesenismului .
cât l-a servit cu credință fusese bun .
până la urmă , este și asta o formă de recunoaștere a eșecului ...
ne pasă de ţara noastră , chiar mai mult decât credem .
ne interesează ce imagine are românia , oriunde ne-am afla .
nu suntem indiferenţi la criticile adresate nouă , românilor , şi urmărim cu mare interes performanţele liderilor aleşi pentru a conduce destinele plaiurilor mioritice .
tema regionalizării administrative domină de ceva vreme agenda publică în materie de reformă administrativă .
din punct de vedere politic pare un moment propice , atât timp cât udmr nu este la guvernare şi riscul confundării regionalizării cu regionalismul , este limitat .
populaţia româniei este concentrată în proporţie de 44,8 % în mediul rural .
însă , dacă avem în vedere că 13 oraşe au mai puţin de 5.000 de locuitori , 60 de oraşe au până în 10.000 de locuitori , multe oraşe şi municipii au în componenţă sate , iar multe nu îndeplinesc condiţiile minimale impuse de legislație pentru statutul de oraş sau municipiu , ...
acum câţiva ani am hotărât să „ joc politic ” , iar cei care mă cunosc ştiu că nu glumesc cu astfel de vorbe !
m-am implicat în campania electorala din noiembrie 2008 , sprijinind candidaturile lui marian popescu şi marian mocanu pe posturile alocate celor din diaspora !
mă bucur să constat că cel care ne-a stat alături atunci , philip cordery , secretarul general al partidului socialiştilor ...

azad kashmir & # 8217 ; s financial matters , i.e. , budget and tax affairs , are dealt with by the azad jammu and kashmir council , rather than by pakistan & # 8217 ; s central board of revenue .
the azad jammu and kashmir council is a supreme body consisting of 11 members , six from the government of azad jammu and kashmir and five from the government of pakistan .
its chairman / chief executive is the president of pakistan .
other members of the council are the president and the prime minister of azad kashmir and a few other ajk ministers .
sardar mohammad abdul qayyum khan , former pm and president of azad kashmir baba-e-poonch khansahib col khan muhammad khan , mla for tehsil bagh and sudhonoti , 1934 – 1946 sardar sikandar hayat khan , former pm and president of azad kashmir lord nazir ahmed , member of the uk house of lords should we do that ?
do we have $ 2 billion dollars ?

the forty-year old man has left behind his wife , six children , three sisters and a brother , all dependent on him .
salahuddin was living in peshawar and had come to islamabad to see off some relatives at the airport .
they were going to the airport when the islamabad police constable , saeed stopped them near the sector g-9 bus terminal .
constable saeed tried to take him to the margalla police station in a taxi and somehow a scuffle took place , which resulted in salahuddin being allegedly pushed out of the moving vehicle by the police officials .

artinternational i̇stanbul 16 eylülde başlayacak15 : 02 - kuzey irakta seçim gerilimi14 : 58 - bankacılık sektörü son derece sağlam14 : 23 - yeni yatırım fırsatı : hayvan hastanesi14 : 09 - darphanede grev sona erdiuse of chemical weapons should not go unpunished12 eylül 2013 perşembe 10 : 12speaking at a press conference on september 11 , foreign ministry spokesperson levent gumrukcu said that turkey would welcome russia 's proposal that would put syria 's chemical weapons under the control of international community , but such a move would not remove the responsibility of the syrian regime for its prior use of chemical weapons .
" turkey welcomes this offer , but the key issue here is how sure and hopeful we can be about this issue , considering assad regime 's actions in syria so far . "
gumrukcu said , adding , " we know that the assad regime used chemical weapons before august 21 , 2013 as well and those responsible should be punished .
this new process should not remove the obligation of accountability . "

it runs the world najaktuálnejšie fotografie z dôležitých udalostí na slovensku i v zahraničí ■ fotoservis tasr ponúka denne najaktuálnejšie fotoreportáže zo všetkých dôležitých udalostí na slovensku i v zahraničí , ktoré sú zaznamenané špičkovými profesionálnymi fotografmi . ■ archív tasr obsahuje do milióna obrazových záznamov , ktoré sa priebežne digitalizujú .
súčasťou fotoarchívu sú snímky pochádzajúce z prvej polovice minulého storočia .
archívny záber z finále pohára víťazov pohárov , keď slovan zdolal slávnu barcelonu .
foto : tasr ■ elektronický archív uchováva fotografie od roku 1997 .
v aktuálnej trojdňovej ponuke servisu je približne 550 fotografií , z ktorých je približne 200 z produkcie tasr a zvyšok z produkcie zahraničných agentúr .
tasr vydáva online celú fotoprodukciu agentúry ap . ■ fotoservis tasr ponúka nové technologické prostredie , po prvýkrát v histórii slovenského agentúrneho servisu prináša prepojenie fotografií priamo s textovou správou .
okrem toho automaticky zobrazuje ponuku podobných fotografií a súvisiacich textov .
významnou novinkou je štruktúrovanie fotoservisu podľa kategórií a subkategórií .

özellikle uzak destinasyonları tercih eden tatilciler avrupa ’ dan önce afrika turlarını doldurdu.tekstil diyarı denizli ' 4 koldan ' turizme sarıldıtekstil ve mermerin yanına turizmi de katmak isteyen denizli , pamukkale , laodikya antik kenti , karahayıt ve bozdağ kayak merkezi ile 4 koldan bu sektördeki iddiasını artırmak istiyor.turizmde yeni pazar : bakımdenizi , kumu , güneşi , misafirperver insanları , kaplıcaları ve dinamik hizmet gücüyle türkiye , son yıllarda talebin arttığı " uzun süreli bakım turizmi " nde de söz sahibi olmaya hazırlanıyor.turist önce antalya , sonra i̇stanbul deditürkiye 'ye bu yıl gelen 10 yabancıdan 6 'sı i̇stanbul veya antalya 'dan giriş yaptı.antalya turist sayısını artırdıantalya 'ya ocak-ağustos döneminde gelen turist sayısı 7 milyon 893 bine ulaştı.her şey dahil tartışmaya açıldı1990'lı yılların ilk yarısında turizme kazandırılan " her şey dahil " sisteminin artık tartışılması ve bu sistemden vazgeçilmesi gerektiği ileri sürüldü.i̇zmir 'e " avrupa 'nın en iyi kruvaziyer destinasyonu " ödülüi̇zmir , dünya seyahat ödülleri 'nde üst üste üçüncü kez " avrupa 'nın en iyi kruvaziyer destinasyonu ödülünü " üst üste üçüncü kez aldı . ' adalar salaş olduğu için ucuz ... ' " yunan adaları ege sahillerinden çok ucuz " söylemi bu yaz gündeme oturdu .
her geçen gün bir ünlü isim sosyal medyada hesap kıyaslaması yapıyor ... turizmciler ise elmalar ve armutların karıştırıldığını düşünüyor.mersin , turist sayısını kurvaziyer desteksiz 600 bin kişiye çıkaracakmısır ve suriye 'de yaşanan olaylar nedeniyle kurvaziyer güzergahından geçici olarak çıkarılan mersin yine de bu yıl turist sayısını 534 binden 600 bine çıkarma hedefinde.i̇stanbul turizm kenti yarışında birincii̇stanbul turizm açısından avrupa 'nın 1. dünyanın 2. kenti seçildi.turzim sektörü , 88 ülkenin bütçesini geride bıraktıturizmde yıllık 26 milyar dolarlık ciroya ulaşan türkiye , aralarında gürcistan , i̇zlanda , kırgızistan ve kosova 'nın da bulunduğu 88 ülkenin bütçesini geride bıraktı.otel-avm kardeşliği işletmeleri sevindirecekgeçen yıl ilk kez dubai ’ de denenen otel-avm işbirliği giderek tüm ortadoğu ’ yu sarıyor .
otel-avm kardeşliğinin örnekleri türkiye ’ de de görülmeye başlandı.turizmin ekonomiye katkısı artacakdünya seyahat ve turizm konseyinin raporuna göre , türkiye 'de gelecek on yılda , seyahat ve turizm sektörünün gsyi̇h ve istihdama katkısı , turizm geliri ve yatırım boyutlarında yükselişte olacak.12345678sonraki sayfa may 1 , 2013 did you know that the puerto rico bacardi distillery is the largest rum distillery in the world ?

bush tea to become mcdonalds menu item in usvi and puerto rico new york ( reuters ) - afghanistan is at risk of reverting to control by warlords and the united states of suffering a defeat in the " war on terrorism " unless washington strengthens the kabul government , a nongovernmental report said on wednesday .
" such a reversion would have disastrous consequences for afghanistan and would be a profound setback for the u.s. war on terrorism , " said the report , " afghanistan : are we losing the peace ? "
one of the lead authors , frank wisner , a former u.s. ambassador to india , said u.s. credibility was on the line and if washington " did not get it right in afghanistan it will be a lot harder to convince others to work with us to get it right in iraq . "

cotidianul , march 16th , 2011 . © 2011 cadran politic · rss · designed by theme junkie · powered by wordpress kuna : : arts & culture 40293012345ots : čo nové v mobilnom biznise ?
to prezradí konferencia mmmmxiii - ots - tasr.sk bratislava 12. septembra ( tasr-ots ) - telefóny , tablety , rôzne zariadenia , ktoré na svoju komunikáciu využívajú sieť mobilných operátorov , sú dnes už takou bežnou súčasťou nášho života , že by sme si len veľmi ťažko vedeli predstaviť žiť bez nich .
dávno neslúžia len na telefonovanie či posielanie správ , ale sú našimi každodennými univerzálnymi asistentmi a náhradou mnohých iných vecí ( hodinky , budíky , diáre , knihy , kalkulačky , herné konzoly , navigácia .... ) .
hľadáme s nimi pamiatky , obchody so zľavami , priateľov , dobrú zábavu v podnikoch , v ktorých to " práve žije " , dokážu nahradiť peňaženky , vďaka umelej inteligencii poradiť pri výbere , či rozhodovaní sa , ako ďalej .
dnes príjmy v mobilnom biznise nekončia len na účtoch telekomunikačných operátorov , ale stále väčší podiel si z koláča rastúcich príjmov v tomto odvetví ukrajujú rôzne malé , či stredne veľké firmy , ktoré sa zamerali na poskytovanie mobilných služieb.o tom , aké sú trendy v mobilnom biznise a ako možno na mobilných službách zarobiť , prídu porozprávať odborníci na 4. ročník konferencie o mobilnom marketingu mmmmxiii , ktorá sa uskutoční vo štvrtok 19 .
9. v hoteli lindner v oc central v bratislave .
medzi vystupujúcimi bude tomi ahonen , svetovo najuznávanejšia autorita v tomto odvetví , pavol magic z firmy sygic , lídra vo svete mobilných navigácií , nedeljko miloševič a ivan karamatič z chorvátskej firmy infobip , ktorá ukázala svetu , že na rozosielanie sms nemusíte byť zákazníkom mobilného operátora .
príde jozef metke z firmy msolutions , ktorá ako jedna z prvých na slovensku začala radiť iným , ako rozbehnúť svoj mobilný biznis a dnes navrhuje mobilné riešenia spoločnostiam z rôznych kútov sveta , lucia menkeová z právnej firmy rowan legal , ktorá poslucháčov varuje pred právnymi úskaliami mobilného biznisu .
k speakrom sa zaradil i marián chovanec zo spoločnosti ality , priekopníka v stále sa rozširujúcom sektore rozšírenej reality , či richard jajcay z tasr , ktorý objasní využitie mobilných zariadení v mediálnom sektore .
andrej kečkeš porozpráva o tom , ako sa mobilné zariadenia dajú využívať v športe . na konferencii vystúpia aj ďalší vynikajúci spíkri z vúb banky , monogram , microsoft , infotech , slido a crazy tomato .
konferenciu organizujú hospodárske noviny v spolupráci so spoločnosťou msolutions .
ktokoľvek , kto je fanúšikom mobilných technológií , robí s mobilnými službami , alebo to s mobilným biznisom myslí vážne , by na tomto podujatí nemal chýbať .
pozrieť si kompletný program a registrovať sa je možné na : www.konferencie.hnonline.skupozornenie : upozorňujeme odberateľov , že materiály označené skratkou ots sú poskytované v rámci originálnej textovej služby a za ich obsah nesie zodpovednosť zadávateľ.mš however , the computer system of managing the files has only covered a few zones for now but will include the rest of the zones .

sample e-paper > > > he is no stranger to the internal workings of the vatican , having served on a number of vatican congregations .
he has a reputation as a bridge builder , promoting dialogue and mediation in the face of conflict .
nor was he known to shy away from difficult issues that impinge on the dignity of human life and the church ’ s moral teaching .
by his very person , he ’ s known to generate an atmosphere of warmth and welcome , as evidenced by his first appearance on the balcony of st. peter ’ s as pope francis .

le paysage médiatique évolue à un rythme effréné .
les messages , les conversations et le contenu numérique parcourent les quatre coins du monde à une vitesse vertigineuse , et la communication en temps réel de nos jours , soutenue par les réseaux sociaux et ceux de la téléphonie mobile , nous obligent à participer et à réagir avec plus de rapidité et d 'agilité que jamais auparavant .
dans un monde en constante évolution , le rôle de marketwire demeure : renforcer la communication et la faire avancer .
alors que la technologie avance et que la société s ’ adapte en conséquence , marketwire évolue en tandem et définit aussi le rythme pour assurer une communication plus innovante .
nous nous demandons toujours ce qui est possible et nous nous efforçons de fournir des solutions intelligentes qui faciliteront les efforts de communication de nos clients et soutiendront leur quête vers la meilleure profitabilité possible .
lorsque nous parlons de communication , nous savons que nous ne pouvons parler « d ’ approche universelle .
cependant , ce qui est effectivement commun parmi les professionnels de presque toutes les disciplines – marketing , relations publiques , affaires publiques , publicité , relations avec les investisseurs , etc. est leur besoin d ’ impliquer et de convaincre leur public et évaluer le succès obtenu .
notre expertise et savoir-faire aideront à définir la meilleure solution pour nos clients et donc , nous adoptons une approche personnalisée pour aider nos clients à surpasser leurs objectifs .
de facebook à factiva , et des revues professionnelles à twitter , nous vous mettrons en contact avec le public et les personnes influentes qui comptent le plus .
peu importe où ils se trouvent .
aujourd 'hui , c 'est la communication qui importe .
vous devez atteindre votre public cible et créer des relations sérieuses qui feront avancer votre entreprise et votre marque .

human rights watch - kabul press | afghanistan press | کابل پرس | افغانستان پرس کابل پرس من > نويسندگان > human rights watchhuman rights watch " our objective from the beginning of the season was to play in the barclays cup and we are not going as mere participants ; our goal is to win and we will , " kapembwa said .
nsw senate shooters and fishers party candidates karl houseman and finley ’ s jim muirhead have introduced a bill of notice to rescind the former state labor government ’ s decision to implement national parks in the riverina.the bill was introduced in mathoura on tuesday night during the party ’ s freedom bus tour of regional nsw , ahead of tomorrow ’ s election.local forests – the millewa , moira and werai forests – were placed under the control of national parks and wildlife service in july 2010.the consequence of the nsw labor decision was the closure of deniliquin ’ s gulpa sawmill and the loss of hundreds of regional forestry jobs.mr muirhead said the nsw coalition government had had plenty of time to act on national parks since being elected in 2011.he said there had been no real push to re-open the parks for logging and sustainable use , and that the inaction had forced the shooters and fishers party to make the recision motion part of its federal and state policies . ‘ ‘ we ’ re over it , ’ ’ mr muirhead said . ‘ ‘ i have been fighting this for six years now , personally – it started with the conversion of the barham forest in victoria . ‘ ‘ nsw has said it cannot undo the labor decision , but tony abbott is saying he can scrap the carbon tax – it can be done . ‘ ‘ we have the public lands inquiry recommendation and we have the bill . ‘ ‘ getting the bill up will be a hard thing to do , and if it doesn ’ t pass it will prove that the other parties are not looking after rural issues . ‘ ‘ we will push them as much as we can but we need support on election day to be able to do so . ’ ’ mr muirhead said the shooters and fishers party would need numbers in the senate to be able to override the greens , which holds the balance of power.mr houseman said the greens ’ influence had the potential to further devastate rural australia and sway political policy . ‘ ‘ the greens have to be fought on a state and federal level , ’ ’ he said . ‘ ‘ they are an absolute cancer to rural and regional australia ; they are a disease that will kill this country . ‘ ‘ i know that some of our local members are passionate about rural australia , but they are not standing up to their parties . ‘ ‘ numbers in the senate will allow the shooters and fishers to block the lunacy or effect change . ‘ ‘ we need to get everyone we can to make ( nsw premier barry ) o ’ farrell reverse the decision , and if he won ’ t we need a new nsw premier who will . ’ ’ mr muirhead and mr houseman visited the crump sawmill in mathoura and the gulpa sawmill in deniliquin , along with shooters and fishers ’ sitting member robert borsak.the freedom bus went on to hay on wednesday afternoon , and had visited tocumwal and finley on tuesday .

throughout all of the hype elicited for such awe-inspiring pipedreams , however , some of the most unbelievable leaps forward are also the easiest to dismiss as sci-fi fantasy .
but the reality is : the future is now , and so too is the technology .
see below for some of the technology that ’ s not only turning heads but turning tech on its head , and let us know what kind of inventions you hope to see by 2025 in the comments below .
bendable smartphonesyour shiny new smartphone is cool , no doubt .
it has a ton of apps and can do just about anything — anything , but bend , that is .
military exoskeletonsci-fi films from “ avatar ” to “ elysium ” have envisioned the soldier of the future , and from the looks of it , today ’ s battlefield isn ’ t too far off .
sprayable energydon ’ t drink coffee ?
hate the aftertaste of energy drinks ?
as the standard to which we ’ ve measured how far from “ the future ” we perpetually remain , the jetpack — despite countless iterations over the years with mixed results — is now a reality , and < a href = " http : / / www.huffingtonpost.com / 2013 / 08 / 14 / martin-jetpack _ n _ 3756630.html " target = " _ blank " > it may hit the market by next year < / a > .
developed by martin aircraft , the “ jetpack ” itself is something of a misnomer — relying on two giant ducted fans for lift .
what may keep folks grounded , however , is the potential price tag .
at $ 100,000 , the martin jetpack can provide flight for one person for up to 30 minutes at a time .
these are not new technologies .
these are old technologies with new applications .
