all rights reserved.nalzaro : wa nay pork , humba na lang | sun.star kon atong tuhuan ang atong mga katiguwangan , du ­ ol kita sa peligro karong adlawa gumikan kay biyernes tree karon o friday the 13th .
kon puwede lang magpuyo ta sulod sa atong panimalay aron malayo kita sa peligro .
apan di man puwede kay matag usa kanato aduna may trabaho o panginabuhian aron adunay ikasuporta sa atong inadlaw ’ ng panginahanglan .
aw , siguro aron lang gyud ta malayo sa disgrasya mao nga magmatngon gyud ta inubanan sa pag-ampo ngadto sa labaw ’ ng makagagahum .
o ang mga bana diha , uli mo og sayo aron malayo mo sa disgrasya .
unya mas malipay si misis kon mouli mog sayo .
nunot niining kontrobersiya karon sa priority development assistance fund ( pdaf ) o pork barrel sa atong mga magbabalaod , mipagawas og temporary restraining order ( tro ) ang korte suprema nga nagdili sa mga magbabalaod nga mogamit sa ilang pork barrel karong tuiga samtang pending pa ang petisyon sa pagwagtang niini sa labaw ’ ng hukmanan .
gimanduan ang department of budget and management sa dili pagpagawas sa maong pundo .
aw , maka-ingon tang dimalas ang mga napili niadtong mayo nga eleksiyon kay wala pa ma ­ kabawi sa ilang gasto .
unya , asa man nila bawi-on ?
ania pay umaabot nga barangay eleksiyon ug sigurado kining mga mokandidato anha mamarayig og campaign funds sa mga kongresista .
aduna na goy mga kongresista nga dili na makigkita sa mga mayor o dili na makontak gumikan kay nahadlok nga pangayoan og funding .
nunot niining panawagan karon sa katawhan sa pagwagtang aning pork barrel , medyo nadutlan sa kauwaw ang atong mga magbabalaod .
sa senado , nagka-uyon ang tanan sa pagwagtang sa ilang pork barrel nga p200 milyones matag tuig .
samtang sa ubos balay-balauranan , aduna nay resolusyon nga gipakatap nga magwagtang usab sa ilang pork barrel ug matod pa ubay-ubay na usab ang mipirma .
pero dunay uban nga wala gyud mosuporta kay political suicide lagi kuno alang kanila kon wagtangon ang pork barrel .
unsa-on man nga mao may gihimo nilang gatasan sa pundo aron gamiton sa eleksiyon pinaagi sa pagpamalit og boto .
pero sa pikas nga aspeto niining pagwagtang sa pork barrel , adunay mga maayong proyekto baya usab ang napagan .
kana lang medical assistance ug schoolarship program alang sa mga pobreng pasyente ug mga tinun-an .
unang mitiyabaw ang taga department of social welfare and development ( dswd ) gumikan kay gamay lang ang ilang pundo alang sa mga kabus .
dinhi sa dswd 7 regional office aduna lay matod pa gahin nga uno punto singko milyones ka pesos ang gahin .
gamay ra kaayo kana .
apan nakahatag sila og libreng medical assistance sa mga pobreng pasyente kay ang ubang mga kongresista aduna may pundo alang niini diha sa ilang buhatan og sa don vicente sotto memorial medical center .
halos tanang kongresista dinhi sa sugbo ang migahij diha sa maong tambalanan unya ang taga dswd maoy nagsupervise niini .
kon mawagtang na unya kining pork barrel , asa naman paingon ang nanginahanglan .
daghang mamatay nga mga pasyente .
wa nay pork , humba nalang .
the arrangement may favor locals , but anyone can buy an e-zpass transponder from new hampshire to get the discount .
rdc : les combats font des milliers de nouveaux déplacés dans le nord-kivu des hélicoptères de l ’ armée congolaise , les fardc , ont lancé une attaque , mercredi , près du quartier-général des rebelles du m23 .
l ’ information a été confirmée par les deux camps , mais le président du m23 , bertrand bisimwa , dément que ses positions aient été touchées durant l ’ attaque . & rdquo ; il n ’ ont attaqué aucune cible militaire , & bdquo ; dit bisimwa ; & rdquo ; ils n ’ ont attaqué que des maisons et des résidents aux alentours de rumangabo . & bdquo ; des médecins de la localité affirment que plusieurs enfants ont été tués et des maisons détruites .
les victimes seraient au nombre de quatre — trois enfants et un adulte — selon un médecin d ’ un hamuli ) a démenti l ’ information .
une patrouille de l 'armée congolaise à kibati , une patrouille de l 'armée congolaise à kibati , le 22 juillet 2013 la reprise des combats dans le nord-kivu a augmenté le nombre de personnes déplacées soit vers la capitale de la province , goma , soit vers d ’ autres villes ou même vers d ’ autres pays de la région .
ecoutez imane cherif , chargée d ’ information à l ’ agence humanitaire de l ’ onu , ocha , au nord-kivu , nous décrire la situation .

las vegas -- matapos ang weigh-in kung saan tumimbang si floyd mayweather jr. ng bigat na 150.5 pounds at 152 naman si canelo alvarez , tumayo ng magkaharap ang dalawang boxers at nagtitigan .
inaasar ni mayweather si alvarez na nanatiling nakatitig na parang isang rebulto .
tinangka ni mayweather na ipahawak kay alvarez ang espesyal na solid gold wbc belt na ibibigay sa mananalo .
hinawakan ni mayweather ang kanang kamay ni alvarez na nagpapakita ng kanyang mga muscle .
lumayo si alvarez at sa halip ay tiningnan lamang ang weigh-in record na 12,200 fans .
itataya ngayon ng 23-anyos na si alvarez ( 42-0-1 , 30 knockouts ) ang kanyang suot na wbc junior middleweight belt ngayon sa mgm grand .
“ i was born ready , ” sabi ng mexican star .
“ i ’ m not going to let that guy tell me what to do . ”

v doplnkovej ... - ots - tasr.sk ots : v hre joker padol jackpot v hodnote takmer 35.000 eur v doplnkovej hre joker sa usmialo šťastie na hráča , ktorý uzavrel stávku v košickom kraji.bratislava 12. septembra ( tasr-ots ) - v stredajšom žrebovaní doplnkovej hry joker padol už 17. tohtoročný jackpot .
výhru 34.837,84 eura si na svoj účet bude môcť pripísať hráč , ktorý uzatvoril stávku v košickom kraji .
" šťastný hráč si doplnkovú hru joker priplatil k desaťtipovej stávke v hre loto .
jeho vklad do hry bol 7,35 eura , " informoval hovorca spoločnosti tipos , národná lotériová spoločnosť , a. s . , rastislav čépe.doteraz najvyšší tohtoročný jackpot v doplnkovej hre joker padol 28. augusta .
mal hodnotu 109.577,42 eura .
vyhral ho hráč , ktorý si v trenčianskom kraji priplatil doplnkovú hru k šesťtipovej stávke v hre loto 5 z 35 .
" za stávku zaplatil 2,15 eura , " pripomenul hovorca.joker je doplnková hra k číselným lotériám loto a loto 5 z 35 .
je to stávka na šesťčíslie uvedené na potvrdení o uzatvorení stávky , ktoré vytvorí generátor náhodných čísel .
výhra v hre joker je dosiahnutá vtedy , ak sa vyžrebované čísla šesťčíslia hry joker presne zhodujú na príslušných pozíciách s číslami nachádzajúcimi sa v šesťčíslí platného potvrdenia o uzatvorení stávky v časti joker , pri ktorom je vyznačená možnosť " áno " .
cena vkladu do doplnkovej hry na jedno žrebovanie je len 0,35 eura.tipos , národná lotériová spoločnosť , a. s . , prijíma stávky na číselné lotérie loto , joker , loto 5 z 35 , keno 10 a euromilióny okrem štandardných zberných miest aj prostredníctvom internetu cez stránku www.tipos.sk , ako aj prostredníctvom sms správ zaslaním bezplatnej prázdnej sms správy na číslo 3333 .
kontakt : rastislav čépe hovorca spoločnosti tipos , národná lotériová spoločnosť , a.s.
brečtanová 1 bratislava tel : 0911 677 877 mail : cepe @ tipos.skupozornenie : upozorňujeme odberateľov , že materiály označené skratkou ots sú poskytované v rámci originálnej textovej služby a za ich obsah nesie zodpovednosť zadávateľ.lk zll the oktoberfest , the members of the gaf and our families want express our gratitude by thanking you for having us here in new mexico . an opposing view is likely to be judged that of a fool or a tool of special interests .
one ’ s position is not merely faulty or misguided , it is characterized as the work of someone consciously plotting to destroy the environment , or stealing public benefit for private gain , or willfully corrupting the good and welfare of the community .
this is not the model of dialogue and exchange that we want or need in hawaii .
the virus of absolutism now infecting the congress of the united states appears to be seeping into hawaii – whether it is the use of public lands , dealing with gun violence , determining who may marry , or decreeing how we are to be born or die .
even caring for the sick or preparing young children for life are opportunities for mocking dismissal or patronizing skepticism .
i think perhaps it may be time to step back a bit and take a few deep breaths .
in the wake of senator akaka ’ s request that we let a sense of aloha enter our lives more deeply , could we not try a little harder to practice aloha with each other .
could we not express some generosity of spirit for each other – both in our deliberation and in our decision making ?
my thought is irrespective of what we are for or against , we cannot allow ourselves to pre-empt the raising of pressing questions we need to comprehend and address lest we lose our way before we even begin to understand where we need to go or what path to take .
how do we make use of our resources and assets , both public and private , with continuing investment security in the future ?
the public land development corporation is but one example of an attempt to answer the struggle to come out of the worst recession in memory .
what we cannot do is allow controversy over the answer to this or any other challenge to pre-empt asking or facing up to the questions before us .
therefore , our primary and priority initiatives need to be aimed at preparing ourselves as we assess the demands of the 21st century .
we need to look at state government and the budget ; our energy goals , our economy , and our kupuna and our keiki .
therefore , i have asked my department of taxation to work with the legislature to find the appropriate balance , and the proper amendments to the tax credit so that we can make the law fair for everyone , and maintain a sustainable incentive for the long-term .
if we are going to nurture and expand our local agriculture – if we are going to be talking about how we meet the challenges of the 21st century and ensure that we perpetuate “ our ” hawaii , its natural beauty and environment – the question is what must we do keep our watershed areas protected .
the department of land and natural resources watershed initiative remains a top priority .
we will modernize our tax collection process to empower our department of taxation to aggressively and effectively improve its collection of delinquent and overdue accounts .
those that fail to pay their share only unfairly burden the rest of us who pay what is owed .
it ’ s vitally important to invest in and update our it systems , infrastructure and internal processes – especially when it comes to our schools .
in addition to a new approach to school facilities to meet the needs and opportunities of the 21st century , we are transforming our teaching and learning in our public schools .
these programs must be accessible , affordable , and voluntary for families .
the goal is to ensure all hawaii ’ s four-year-olds are healthy , socially developed , and cognitively prepared to learn and succeed on day one of kindergarten .
our keiki need to be immersed in a stimulating learning environment and have positive relationships with their families and teachers so they can thrive .
our teachers and children ’ s caregivers need to be supported to help our keiki succeed .
our approach is ambitious but pragmatic .
it allows for all children to be equally prepared to learn .
school readiness is the key to efficient and effective learning .
by investing in our children , we are investing in our future as well as theirs .
a school readiness program is the best possible start you can have in life .
hawaii news now is presenting the whole story thanks to a special tv program put on by the good beginnings alliance .
it ’ s called , the “ power of preschool , ” and you can check your listings for the dates and times .
you can also read about the “ power of preschool ” in a special insert featured in the hawaii business magazine .
set strident voices aside .
you have the faith and trust of an overwhelming majority of your voters .
you have the opportunity to authenticate the role of government by acting in bold affirmations of that faith and trust .
if it was easy to solve these questions , we wouldn ’ t be dealing with them .
but we wanted to meet these challenges .
we asked the voters to allow us to do so .
that ’ s why we ’ re here .
that ’ s why i said , at its heart , politics is about doing good and relieving suffering .
that ’ s why i said if politics is done right , it ’ s about making life better for people .
let us resolve then not to get lost in the noise of the moment .
rather let us seize the moment to act with confidence in ourselves , confidence in the people of hawaii and confidence in a future we determine .
the clock is ticking ; the time is now .
burundi : un collectif contre la vie chère se monte pour dénoncer de nouvelles taxes burundi : un collectif contre la vie chère se monte pour dénoncer de le gouvernement burundais vient d ’ adopter un projet de budget révisé qui institue de nouvelles taxes , qui vont frapper tous les produits ou presque de la vie courante , et l ’ a envoyé à l ’ assemblé nationale , qui doit l ’ adopter ce mardi 23 juillet .
lundi , plus de 200 personnes ont répondu à l ’ appel lancé par le collectif campagne contre la vie chère au burundi , pour participer à une des dizaines de personnes , des jeunes et des vieux , hommes et femmes , se sont succédé au micro pendant trois heures pour dénoncer la volonté du gouvernement et pour une fois , oubliée la peur d ’ être fichés par les services secrets : les gens n ’ ont pas hésité à décliner leur identité avant d ’ exprimer librement leurs sentiments .
certains ont appelé à la grève générale , d ’ autres au boycott des transports publics ou de la bière , la boisson nationale au burundi . & bdquo ; le pouvoir veut notre mort « , a renchéri rose , la soixantaine .

comme on l ’ a vu en egypte .
n 'ayons pas peur nous aussi .
le moment est venu pour les burundais de descendre dans la rue .
« l ’ adoption par l ’ assemblée nationale du projet de budget révisé , prévue dans un premier temps ce lundi , a été reportée au 23 juillet .

« mais tout le monde sait que l ’ espoir d ’ être entendu est mince , très mince .
ce collectif se prépare déjà à un bras de fer avec le pouvoir .

these challenges demand an understanding of the world as it is and a vision of what it can become .
they require us to do as delawareans have done throughout our history , including many i spoke of in my inaugural address – not to choose what is easiest for us today , but to create a better world for our children tomorrow .
it is difficult to watch the debates in washington and be confident that we are up to the task .
progress falls prey to political posturing .
problems get kicked down the road .
delaware is not washington .
we will meet the challenges of the world we now live in because of the enduring qualities that make us unique .
we are a state of neighbors .
we know how to move forward together .
so let us shape delaware for the world we now live in , and the world our children will live in tomorrow .
learning , of course , does not end in high school .
the skill demands of today ’ s jobs are rapidly evolving .
the days of one employer , one career are over for most workers .
it is not uncommon today for workers to hold ten different jobs before the age of 45 .
lifetime learning is no longer an aspiration .
it is a necessity .
readying a workforce for the world we now live in is a key part of making delaware an attractive place to do business .
so is providing a nurturing environment for new entrepreneurs .
let ’ s start at the beginning .
businesses that start here are more likely to stay here .
new companies create 3 million jobs a year .
and delaware , which was recently rated the second-best state in the country for a knowledge and innovation economy , could be a leader in the creation and growth of early-stage companies .
we have the people .
we have the ideas .
we have the capital .
the challenge is to get the people , the ideas , and the capital together as we build the start-up state .
the key question for us is : how do we grow our economy so that those who come after us do better ?
we grow our economy by investing in our kids ’ education , in a skilled workforce , and in the quality of life that makes our communities magnets for talented people .
we will continue to find savings wherever they may be , but there are things that we won ’ t do , if it means compromising public safety or turning our backs on our most vulnerable citizens .
and while we want to keep taxes low – and delaware ’ s are attractive – we should not shortchange our children and their future to pay for unaffordable tax cuts today .
a delaware in which our workforce , our quality of life , and our responsiveness drive entrepreneurship , growth , and employment .

ang nasawi ay nakilalang si jurame pobocan , 38 , ng nha building , tala ng lungsod .
batay sa ulat , dakong alas-11 : 00 ng umaga nang matagpuan ang bangkay ng biktima na nakabigti ng sintas ng sapatos sa loob ng bahay ng ina nito sa phase 4 , bagong silang ng naturang lungsod .
nabatid na inatake ng nerbiyos ang biktima mula ng pagbantaan ng hindi pa kilalang suspek na papatayin ito kasama ang pamilya .
patuloy ang imbestigasyon kung sino at ano ang dahilan para ito ay pagbantaan. lot of " little johnny " jokes , and you know that little johnny is not that i put my heart and soul into my cooking .
( my savvy wife has been sure to compliment me highly to keep me cooking we got down here , and i started dishing out some of my specialties to selected " great " - i.e. superlatives - just aren 't in the belizean something to do with spanish , which actually only has a few superlative kinsa ba ang makatuo nga gikan lamang sa dyutay nga estilo sa panginabuhi , madala ka sa entablado sa usa ka prestihiyusong pagpaila .
ning adlawa laing istorya na sab sa kinabuhi ang atong hatagan og dugang pasidungog diha sa iyang nahimo nga maoy tulay aron siya maila sa iyang upat ka mga salon sa dakbayan sa davao .
ang atong bida mao si ms. arlyn l. basquez , tagdumala sa arlyn l. basquez salon and academy diin naghanyag og dekalidad nga serbisyo ug ang pagtudlo sa mga tawo nga mahiligon sa maong trabaho nga mahimo na nila unya nga panginabuhian .
duna nay upat ka mga salon branches ang atong bida sa nagkadaiyang dapit sa siyudad sa dabaw nga gidala sa iyang mga nahimong estudyante kaniadto .
ang atong bida graduwado sa kursong hair and aestheticienne sa usa ka fashion school sa siyudad sa davao niadtong 1995 .
nakahuman sab siya sa iyang nc-ii , tvet trainer and assesor iv , hairdressing ug beauty care course sa misunod nga mga tuig .
aron mapabiling lig-on ug inila ang pangalan sa maong salon diha sa dekalidad nga serbisyo , gipaneguro sa atong bida ngadto sa publiko nga anaa ang ilang pangalan sa listahan sa mga salon ug akademya sa pagtudlo sa mga bertud sa maong natad , busa mihimo siya 'g pamaagi aron mas mailhan pa kini .
subay niini , napili ang atong bida isip nominado sa ' search for idols ng tesda ' nga gipangunahan sa technical education and development authority ( tesda ) , ubos sa technical vocational ( techvoc ) education nga gisalmutan sa duha ka mga kategorya nga mao ang wage-employed ug self-employed category nga dunay dise-siyete ka mga entries .
gibasihan sa maong panag-indigay mao ang istorya kung paunsa sila nagsugod sa negusyo ug paunsa sila nakatabang sa katawhan nga anaa na karon nanginabuhi sa ilang natukod nga salon .
ug napamatud-an kini sa atong bida diha sa iyang pagsaysay nga gipaagi sa pagsuwat nga nahimong nakapatandog sa hunahuna ug kasingkasing sa mga hurado ug naila siya isip regional winner ug nahimong tesda idol sa national competition atol sa seremonya sa nakalabay nga agosto , 23 .
saludo kami ( sk ) : unsay sunod nga plano human sa usa ka pasidungog ?
arlyn l. basquez ( alb ) : siyempre , gikinahanglan nga i-share sab nako sa mga nagkat-on diri sa academy ug sa pipila ka mga nanag-iya og salon ang akong mga kasinatian sugod sa akong pagtanum hangtud nga namupo ko sa mga bunga niini .
sk : ang gibati karon nga napili isip idol ng tesda ?
alb : way kabutangan sa gibati nga proud sa kaugalingon , wa man god ko nag-expect nga ma-recognize ko sa mga dagko nga tawo .
need gyud ang pagsalig sa diyos aron mo-guide siya sa atoa , ug kinahanglan mapaubsanon ka sa mga higayon nga nag- proud sila nimo .
alb : alang ni sa atong mga estudyante nga gusto nila mahibalo , i-share nato ang kahibalo nga gihatag sa diyos , di idalo , gikinahanglan sab nga di ka motan-aw sa balos gikan sa imong gitudloan inay ang balos gikan sa diyos .
ug ang gikinahanglan niini nga butang mao ang pagkamatinud-anon sa kaugalingon aron saligan ka sa tawo .
sk : unsay nakita nimo sa imong mga estudyante human sila nahibalo gikan sa imong abilidad ?
alb : na-encourage sila sa paghimo pa og mga butang aron sila makat-on .
gani sa pagkakaron nahimo na nilang panginabuhian ang kahibalo nga gikan sa academy .
ang usa ka pasidungog maoy butang nga di mapapas uban sa pagdagan sa panahon , kini magpabilin sa igdulungog nga walay makabawi nga si bisan kinsa .
mamahimong mabunga pa kini nga pasidungog kung di kini ihakog sa pagpaambit ngadto sa mga tawong buot mokat-on sa abilidad nga gasa sa kahitas-an .
busa kanimo ma 'am arlyn l. basquez , uban sa imong mga hairdressers ug beauticians sa imong salon ug academy , saludo kami kaninyo !

and as far as the govt. check you referenced , i do get a check from the govt .
its called military retirement after damn near 4 decades of service .
the wars ive had to honor to serve in , the long list of missions ive been on , the pieces of shat ive buried in the ground , did not have anything to do with oil btw .
if you think that all our military does is fight rag heads over oil , you are a true idiot .
but on top of my govt. check , i get up everyday and go to work .
i couldve just stayed home , made a good living on my retirement , but as i am nearing almost 8 decades of living , im still able to work , so i do .
as far as leaving behind a toilet of a planet , let me ask you this .
have you revamped your lifestyle and habits to save the planet ?
do you use electricity ?
yeah , making electricity has no effects on the planet .
do you use gas to mow your yard ?
dang , thats not good either huh ?
what other ways are you helping the selfish bastards like me " kill the planet " ?

if you want people to notice youre protesting , they wont know youre protesting if they just see you walking .
if by protesting , you plan on making a difference in whatever it is youre protesting against or for , dont do it by quietly walking .
make some noise , be heard and seen .
or in your case , ride a train that is powered by hydrogen or a long ass power cord or something .

the 8th organizational conference of the south ethiopia people ’ s democratic movement ( sepdm ) concluded in hawassa on thursday march 21 , re-electing hailemariam desalegn and shiferaw shigute as the movement ’ s chairperson and deputy chairperson , respectively .

he ’ s not the only one to have noticed the change .
for puchalski , celebrating the past is as important as looking to the future .
the pain of the mind is worse than the pain of the body .
therapies can be classified following various models .
in the cathartic model , the patient is urged to speak , in order to expel or get rid of his suffering .
the essential at exercises spotlight various physical manifestations of relaxation in the body eg heaviness in the musculo-skeletal system and warmness in the circulatory scheme .
these are followed by consciousness of the heartbeat , breathing , the abdomen and a cool forehead .
at the higher stage of medistic psychotherapy an autogenic change takes place in the ’ cognitive field of the patient – when due to re-organisation of the ’ cognitive field structure ’ healthy cognitive frame of reference emerges by eliminating all unhealthy ideas that are responsible for mental distress or psychopathogenesis .
the technique of medistic psychotherapy may be described as a ’ paradoxical strategy ’ to intervene and remove certain dysfunctions of psychosomatic system .
it is paradoxical because it relates to the defeat of one ’ s commonsense-based expectation in treating disease without medicine .
medistic psychotherapists like to accommodating patients ’ symptoms and their special communicative functions .
accordingly , the medistic psychotherapy intends to tune up ’ ego ’ or ’ self ’ to cope with reality , to develop an insight about one ’ s own worth and ability and to become capable to rely with confidence on self-direction .

he wears black sunglasses and a kevlar helmet .
his thick moustache gives him away as a kakai .

member for farrer sussan ley retained her seat convincingly at saturday ’ s federal election polling booths , and now begins her fifth term as the local member .
ms ley said she was ‘ ‘ very grateful and humbled ’ ’ to be re-elected when speaking to the pastoral times yesterday .
‘ ‘ it ’ s about the team and not the individual — tony abbott stands by that , he is not an autocratic leader . ’ ’
labor ’ s farrer candidate gavin hickey polled the second highest number of first preference votes , but was still a far cry from challenging ms ley — 18,013 or 25 per cent of the votes .
‘ ‘ i can ’ t wait to get started but there is always a transition and these things can take time .
‘ ‘ it is more of an administration change of what was passed , in a sensible way , but we do have a lot of negotiating to do . ’ ’
on the carbon tax , ms ley confirmed media reports that the coalition may not be able to scrap the tax until mid next year .
‘ ‘ under the current senate we probably won ’ t get any change , but the new senators will know there is a strong mandate to scrap the tax – they should observe the will of australia . ’ ’
‘ ‘ my most important job is as local member , but i would be delighted to be asked to be in mr abbott ’ s ministry .
‘ ‘ i remember the words of my mentor brendan nelson who said ‘ when you look down you can see the most important people in the front , but you can make just as important a contribution even if you ’ re in the back ’ . ’ ’ the tollway .
the trip should cost 350 + baht on the meter if traffic minimal .
as at may 2009 many cabs will turn off the meter and ask you for 400 baht .
thats ok as only a 50 baht tip if going thru the tollways and to nana soi 4 sunhumvit .
if not they may stop and throw you out on the highway ? ? ?
keep the main shit as the taxi stand will already give the butt to the driver and try to remember his cab number .

19 june , 19 : 47 , by dan hossleythe us is getting ready to bug out of afghanistan . the last time we bugged out ( that would be vietnam ) , we threw all of our allies overboard in our haste to leave.nixon cut thieu out of the negotiations with north vietnam and the democrats in congress cut all aid to south vietnam as soon as we left . the communists overran south vietnam , murdering 850,000 in the aftermath . not to mention the millions killed by the khmer rouge in cambodia.i wish you luck , you & # 8217 ; re going to need it .

al-nijaifi and erdogan reportedly held a meeting for 45 minutes away from media outlets where nijaifi handed over a message to erdogan from the iraqi premier nouri al-maliki , in which the latter invited the two countries to start a new stage to consolidate relations .
upon his meeting with erdogan , al-nijaifi and his accompanying delegation paid a courtesy call to parliament speaker cemil cicek .
" turkey and iraq are like next door neighbors .
the better the relations between the neighbors , the more peacefully they can live together .
relations between iraq and turkey have been always been based on fraternity and we hope to ameliorate our relations in the future , " cicek said .
the iraqi foreign minister will reportedly be invited to pay an official visit to turkey so as to open a new page in the bilateral relations and to discuss the syrian crisis and its impact on the region .

sanga said he later on the same day transported the kapenta to ngwenya market at a negotiated fare of k300 and that whilst he was advised to sell the commodity in lusaka , he ended up selling it in mpulungu at k90 per bale .
he said he was surprised that a week after the transaction , he was arrested and detained in mpulungu over the allegation .
prayer , fasting and almsgiving are the traditional pillars of our lenten observance .
lent encourages god ’ s people .
the time of lent offers a heightened awareness of almsgiving — works of justice and charity , and tending to those who are in need .
fasting and abstinence challenge us to avoid attachments to the “ things ” of this world .
this lent as we undertake our penitential practices , we especially remember pope benedict xvi as he concludes his papacy ; the cardinals of the church as they select our next pope ; and the one all between the ages of 18 and 59 are to fast on ash wednesday ( february 13 , 2013 ) and wednesday and each friday of lent .
all others are encouraged to fast and abstain in ways if health or ability to work would be seriously affected , fast and abstinence do not apply .

then , the custodian of the two holy mosques king abdullah bin abdulaziz al saud delivered a speech to his brothers and sons , the citizens , in which he announced the budget .
following is the text of the king 's speech which was delivered by secretary general of the cabinet abdulrahman bin mohammed al sadhan : praise be to allah and prayer and peace be upon our prophet mohammad and his family and companions .
then , custodian of the two holy mosques king abdullah bin abdulaziz al saud directed the ministers to work hard and faithfully to implement the terms of this budget fully to achieve the comfort and well-being of citizens in all areas of life .

the custodian of the two holy mosques urged all to thank allah almighty for the bounties he bestowed on this country and directed all officials to work for the service of the religion and country , feeling the burden of responsibility he bears on his shoulder .
the custodian of the two holy mosques congratulated them , washing them all success .
for their part , they expressed thanks and appreciation of the custodian of the two holy mosques on the royal trust .

what kind of citizens will they be ?
how they see themselves , their environment and the country are questions no one seems to be trying to address . & ldquo ; there was once a woman named ambashe who used to live around arat kilo , & rdquo ; said fiker , a seventeen year old boy who appears to be smiling all the time . & ldquo ; she had a house and she takes as many children as she could .
the children beg for money and give it to her .
in return she provides some food and a place to sleep .
i was ten years old when she took me in .
what she does is she wakes us up early in the morning and tells us where to go .
she comes and checks if we are there and she mostly knows how much money we would get from the area she assigns us .
it is hard to cheat her so she takes all of it most of the time , & rdquo ; he says . & ldquo ; she died three years ago and to be honest i was sad .
that is not because she was kind to me .
but she was the only family figure in my head , & rdquo ; fiker said losing his smile .
fiker is a name his friends gave him on the street . & ldquo ; i have another name but my friends call me fiker .
i think it is because i am peaceful mostly .
i don ’ t like to fight and if i am around i don ’ t let my friends get in trouble .
as a result even the police are kind to me and i don ’ t get arrested as much , & rdquo ; he said smiling .

safe environment > child lures preventionclick here to enter child lures prevention web site the announcement of the " democratization package " follows the declaration this week by the pkk that it had halted its withdrawal of fighters from turkey because the government had failed to take steps it had agreed to .
en 1990 le front patriotique rwandais ( fpr ) , une organisation politico-militaire , lançait une offensive contre le gouvernement rwandais , dirigé à l ’ époque par le en 1991 , une nouvelle constitution , garantissant le multipartisme et les libertés publiques , est adoptée .
se créent alors des partis d ’ oppositions , dont trois démarrent avec un franc succès , notamment le mouvement démocratique en 1993 , des accords de paix sont signés entre le fpr , le gouvernement rwandais et les autres partis d ’ opposition .
la guerre cesse mais les tensions entre le 6 avril 1994 le président habyarimana est assassiné dans l ’ attentat contre son avion et la guerre reprend .
elle est plus intense à kigali où les accords ont permis au fpr d ’ installer officiellement un bataillon composé de 600 hommes .
au même moment les massacres d ’ extermination sont perpétrés sur la quasi totalité du territoire rwandais .
le fpr s ’ en prend aux hutu tandis que les milices anti-fpr s ’ en prennent aux tutsi et aux hutu accusés de collaboration avec le fpr .
c ’ est le génocide rwandais , devenu génocide des tutsi , excluant dès sa prise de pouvoir en juillet 94 , le fpr continue ses massacres contre mais la chasse aux hutu ne débute pas en 1994 .
en effet elle commence juste après l ’ attaque du fpr , fin 1990 .
dès cette date , les hutus des zones contrôlées par ce dernier font l ’ objet de massacres , de tortures et d ’ exploitation .
les survivants s ’ entassent dans des camps de déplacés qui parfois sont visés par des attaques de cette rébellion .
en 1993 le nombre de déplacés entassés dans des camps , dans des conditions de misères est environ de 1 million , près de la les plus importants de ces massacres d ’ avant 1994 sont : celui de ruhengeri en janvier 1991 , où plus de 500 personnes sont exécutées , femmes et enfants inclus ; celui de butaro en mai 1992 avec 150 victimes et , surtout , celui de février 1993 où près de 40 000 personnes sont massacrés par le fpr dans les préfectures de byumba et ruhengeri ( james k. gasana , rwanda : du parti-état a en avril 1994 , le fpr conquiert de vastes zones en un temps record .
les hutu trouvés sur place sont massacrés et leurs corps brûlés , jetés dans les rivières ou dans certains cas entassés à des fins de manipulation des journalistes après sa prise de pouvoir en juillet 1994 , le fpr massacre les hutu sur l ’ ensemble du territoire .
le cas le plus documenté est le massacre des déplacés hutu de kibeho , dans l ’ ancienne préfecture de gikongoro , en avril 1995 , où les déplacés sont encerclés et interdits de sortir du camp pendant plusieurs jours avant d ’ être massacrés par coups de fusil , coups de canon et baïonnettes .
tout se passe devant les militaires de l ’ onu qui observent l ’ opération , prennent des photos mais ne secourent personne .
a la fin de la journée plus de 8000 personnes avaient été massacrées , sur les 100 000 qu ’ abritait le camp .
selon un témoin direct , les corps furent entassés dans des camions transportés dans les forêts avoisinantes , où ils furent brulés ou enterrés dans des fosses communes .
dans d ’ autres régions du pays , le fpr convoquait des réunions de villages sur la sécurité ou de distribution de nourritures .
dès que suffisamment de monde s ’ était réuni , il les massacrait soit avec les armes blanches ou par balles , grenades et bombes selon le nombre des cibles ou encore les brulait vifs .
selon une enquête de l ’ onu , conduite en 1994 , connue sous l ’ appellation de & rdquo ; gersony report & bdquo ; ces massacres étaient systématiques , réguliers , visaient la population hutue et ce indistinctement , les hommes les femmes , les enfants , les personnes âgées ainsi que les malades .
ce rapport estimait qu ’ entre 25 000 et 45 000 personnes avaient été massacrées entre avril et août 1994 rien que dans les les zones des massacres étaient interdites d ’ accès jusqu ’ à ce que les victimes soient dégagées et brulées .
ce fut le cas par exemple pour plusieurs endroits de l ’ ancienne préfecture de butare , au sud du pays .
en octobre 1996 , le fpr attaque le congo où étaient refugiés plus de deux d ’ octobre 1996 à juillet 1997 , ces refugiés furent traqués , torturés , violés , délibérément affamés , privés de toute assistance , massacrés à l ’ arme blanche , l ’ onu a fait une enquête dont les résultats , & rdquo ; le mapping report & bdquo ; d ’ octobre 2010 ne laissent aucun doute quant à l ’ intention [ massacrés à l ’ arme blanche , piégés , violées avant d ’ être tuées : l ’ exemple de dans cette région , les massacres ont été organisés selon un schéma quasi identique [ à celui des autres régions , ndlr ] , de façon à tuer un maximum de victimes .
à chaque fois qu ’ ils repéraient une grande concentration de réfugiés , les militaires de l ’ afdl / apr tiraient sur eux de manière indiscriminée à l ’ arme lourde et à l ’ arme légère .
ils promettaient ensuite aux rescapés de les aider à après les avoir rassemblés sous différents prétextes , ils les tuaient le plus souvent à coups de marteau ou de houe .
ceux qui tentaient de fuir étaient tués par balles .
plusieurs témoins ont affirmé qu ’ en 1999 [ deuxième guerre après celle de 1996 , ndlr ] , des militaires de l ’ apr se seraient rendus spécialement sur les sites de plusieurs massacres afin de déterrer les corps et de brûler les à partir du 9 décembre 1996 , des militaires de l ’ afdl / apr ont tué par balles plusieurs centaines de réfugiés , parmi lesquels un grand nombre de femmes et d ’ enfants au niveau du pont de hombo .
au cours des jours suivants , ils ont brûlé vifs un nombre indéterminé de réfugiés au bord de la route au niveau de la localité de kampala , située à quelques kilomètres de hombo .
avant d ’ être tuées , de nombreuses femmes ont été violées par les militaires .
avant de les tuer , les militaires avaient demandé aux victimes de se regrouper en vue de leur au cours d ’ avril 1997 , alors qu ’ entre 60 et 120 réfugiés mourraient chaque jour de maladie ou d ’ épuisement , les militaires de l ’ afdl / apr ont , à plusieurs reprises , interdit l ’ accès des camps aux organismes et ong à vocation humanitaire et entravé le rapatriement des réfugiés vers le rwanda .
vers la fin d ’ avril 1997 , des éléments de l ’ afdl / apr ont brûlé vifs des réfugiés au niveau du village de lolengi , à 48 kilomètres de boende .
les militaires ont recouvert les corps des victimes de bâches en plastique qu ’ ils le 13 mai 1997 , des éléments de l ’ afdl / apr , à leur arrivée dans le village de réfugiés & bdquo ; .
ils se sont ensuite dirigés vers le camp et ont ouvert le feu sur le même jour , les militaires sont entrés dans le bureau de la croix-rouge locale et ont tué des enfants non accompagnés qui attendaient leur rapatriement vers le le même jour , la population de wendji a enterré 116 corps .
un bébé de trois mois environ qui était encore vivant au moment de l ’ enterrement a été tué par un militaire de l ’ afdl / apr qui supervisait les travaux d ’ inhumation .
le 14 mai , 17 l ’ onu conclut que d ’ après les résultats de son enquête , la qualification de génocide peut être retenue pour les crimes commis contre les hutus , refugiés et présent rapport , ayant ciblé de très nombreux réfugiés hutu rwandais ainsi que des membres de la population civile hutu [ congolaise , ndlr ] et causé leur mort , révèlent plusieurs éléments accablants qui , s ’ ils sont prouvés devant un en considérant les périodes des massacres , le fait que même les bébés n ’ étaient pas épargnés et que même les hutu congolais ont été visés par les massacres il n ’ y a aucun doute quant à l ’ identité des victimes ni au mobile de leurs bourreaux : les hutu étaient visés et ce , parce qu ’ ils sont nés hutu .
l ’ épisode congolais ne marque pas la fin de leur calvaire .
l ’ extermination exemple , en décembre 1997 , on estime à 8000 victimes hutues qui ont étés brulées comme mentionné plus haut , le fait que le régime du fpr a requalifié le génocide rwandais en génocide des tutsi , a exclu les victimes hutues .
la seule commémoration officielle autorisée au rwanda étant celle du génocide des tutsi , les victimes hutues se retrouvent sans cadre de commémoration officiellement au-delà de cette interdiction de fait , quiconque ose parler de ces victimes hutues est accusé pêle-mêle de négationnisme , divisionnisme , révisionnisme ou de minimisation du génocide des tutsi du rwanda , à l ’ instar de victoire ingabire , actuellement emprisonnée à kigali .
en belgique , il est traité de négationniste , génocidaire ou de membre des familles de génocidaire ( la libre.be du 7 avril 2013 ) ou pire comparé à nazi .
citons le cas du député alain destexhe qui , sur son compte twitter le 7 avril 2013 , a comparé aux & rdquo ; nazi & bdquo ; les commémorants qui entendaient honorer la mémoire de toutes les victimes de la tragédie rwandaise .
la faute de ces derniers est d ’ avoir osé aller se souvenir au mémorial du génocide rwandais à bruxelles , le 6 avril plutôt que le 7 , date de la tutsies , ibuka et d ’ avoir voulu commémorer toutes les victimes indépendamment de depuis 1990 , soit plus de 22 ans actuellement , aucune juridiction n ’ a rendu le rwanda a interdit à toute personne de réclamer justice pour les hutu et ce , par des menaces et des actes de violence .
pendant que les juridictions gacaca ont été instituées pour rendre justice à toutes les victimes , les hutu n ’ ont jamais eu une juridiction vers laquelle se tourner .
exception faite de la justice espagnole où , profitant des victimes espagnoles tuées par le fpr , des associations de droits de l ’ homme ont inclu des victimes hutues .
néanmoins , cette justice s ’ est arrêtée à lancer des mandats d ’ arrêts qui le cas le plus aberrant est certainement celui du tribunal pénal international pour le rwanda dont la mission était de juger les crimes commis au rwanda de janvier à décembre 1994 .
malgré les instructions détaillées de certains dossiers incriminant des officiers du fpr , le tribunal a toujours fermé les yeux .
pire encore , le tribunal a à plusieurs reprises obéi aux ordres du régime du fpr ou , au moins , cédé à ses menaces .
un des exemples est celui de mr barayagwiza jean-bosco .
en novembre 1999 la chambre d ’ appel a constaté que ses droits de défense avaient été violés au point que ni son arrestation ni son acte d ’ accusation n ’ étaient légaux .
elle a alors ordonné sa mise en liberté et la nullité de son acte d ’ accusation .
dès lors le régime rwandais menaça d ’ arrêter toute collaboration avec le tribunal .
la chambre d ’ appel a dû revenir sur sa décision ..
par la suite , le tribunal le condamna à 32 ans de prison et il y mourra en 2010 .
un autre exemple est la tentative du procureur du tpir carla del des fonctionnaires rwandais ont empêché des témoins de se rendre au tribunal , entraînant la suspension de plusieurs procès pendant des mois & bdquo ; .
par la suite , carla del ponte a été limogé son de son poste et remplacé par hasan jallow et c ’ est la fin de l ’ espoir de voir le tpir juger des membres du fpr .
dans d ’ autres cas , des témoins d ’ accusations sont revenus sur leurs dires et ont affirmé avoir été menacés par les services de renseignement du fpr mais également ont été entraînés pour donner de faux témoignages [ 2 ] .
malgré que ce phénomène qui semble s ’ être généralisé dans toutes les juridictions , au rwanda , en belgique et au tpir , celui-ci les a toujours ignorés .
ce fut le cas , par exemple , dans les procès de karemera ( témoin surnommé bth pour sa sécurité ) , bicamumpaka ( témoin gfa ) et en belgique dans le procès des religieuses .
en belgique , seuls des hutu ont été jugés .
plusieurs officiels affirment que la seule raison qui explique cette discrimination est qu ’ il n ’ existe aucune plainte visant les membres du fpr .
cependant , des témoins ont vu des personnes visées par les mandats d ’ arrêts espagnols aller et venir en belgique sans être inquiétés .
c ’ est le cas , entre autres , du général james kabarebe aujourd ’ hui depuis le génocide de 1994 , les hutu ont été collectivement et systématiquement l ’ objectif de ces manœuvres semble être , d ’ une part , d ’ assimiler les victimes hutues aux bourreaux des tutsi , et les bourreaux des hutu , c ’ est-à-dire le fpr , aux victimes tutsies .
ainsi le fpr se retrouve victime comme les réelles victimes tutsies tandis que ce sont les victimes hutues qui se retrouvent plusieurs éléments ont concouru à cette manœuvre cynique .
en effet , l ’ organisation de la justice a permis au fpr d ’ accuser qui il veut d ’ être prisonniers politiques , d ’ opposants et des humanitaires tels que monsieur paul le fait de voir des jugements , au rwanda comme à l ’ étranger , qui ne respectent pas le principe d ’ impartialité a fait régner une peur constante chez les hutu. justice canadienne qui a condamné une personne parce qu ’ elle n ’ avait pas été tuée pendant le génocide .
selon cette justice les hutu modérés ont été tués pendant le génocide .
ce qui fait de tout hutu survivant un non-modéré donc en plus de cette partialité , comme dit plus haut , le fpr a utilisé de manière généralisée des faux témoins qu ’ il a entrainé à mentir avant de les envoyer témoigner .
on retrouve des aveux de certains des faux témoins qui ont témoigné a cela il faut ajouter le rôle des médias et des sion de diabolisation de la population hutue et de blanchiment du fpr .
toutes ces injustices ont fait que beaucoup de hutu se cachent , taisent leur horrifiant calvaire .
etant victimes des juridictions censées les protéger , ils n ’ osent pas y avoir recours et de toute façon ils n ’ en ont pas les moyens .
en tout cas pas à la hauteur de leur bourreau , le fpr à la tête de l ’ etat rwandais , le principal et prioritaire souci des hutu est encore , de survivre à cette force est de constater que tant que la double mission sera poursuivie , les tensions entre les hutu et les tutsi continueront à s ’ intensifier et ce à tord , renforcera les criminels qui ne feront que les opprimer et les exploiter encore la question est : il y a-t- il un espoir de solution ?
la reconnaissance du calvaire des hutu ainsi que sa qualification semblent constituer une étape obligée ; sans laquelle c ’ est leur diabolisation orchestrée par leur bourreau qui continuera à autoriser , cautionner , encourager et couvrir notamment au congo .
l ’ autre condition nécessaire est celle de disposer de leaders engagés à la construction d ’ un avenir commun pour l ’ ensemble de la immigration reform and the “ pathway to citizenship ” ( by moe wosepka ) medicaid reform , expansion or rejection : what is the answer ? ( by moe wosepka ) at the legislature ’ s midpoint , how are we doing ? she implored the need for the language to be highly promoted for the country ’ s socio-economic development. in dark .
obviously , the residents cannot enjoy eid as the people can do in other parts of the country .
“ if we can pass enough of these , it would force the federal government ’ s hand to say ‘ we can ’ t depend on the states to do our job , ’ ” said state rep. gary holder-winfield , a democrat who is sponsoring legislation in the connecticut house .

" ( 9 / 6 / 2013 6 : 23 : 06 pm ) © 2013 indexmundi - all rights reservedediotoryal : kabus ang maigo | sun.star dunay mga kabalaka karon nga maapektuhan ang medical assistance alang sa mga kabus tu ­ ngod sa hukom sa korte suprema nga nagdili una sa paghilabot sa nahab iling pork barrel funds sa mga magbabalaud .
nasuta sa taho sa dept. of budget and management ( dbm ) nga ang mga magbabalaud sa sugbo mihatag og gahin nga p20 milyunes sa vicente sotto memorial medical center ( vsmmc ) nga medical assistance alang sa mga kabus .
nabalaka si gobernador hilario davide iii nga wa nay tabang nga madawat ang kabus nga mga lumolupyo sa lalawigan sa sugbo .

les deux-tiers du pays pourraient être infestés par les criquets avant septembre 2013 .
les résultats d ’ une évaluation des dégâts ( mai 2013 ) montrent que les pertes dues aux criquets en 2012 / 13 varient de 10 et 40 pour cent sur les cultures de riz dans 17 des 22 régions de madagascar .

" la bombe a été déposée devant l 'hôtel et actionnée par télécommande plus tard , vers 0h10 " ( 21h10 gmt ) mercredi , a déclaré germain ratsirombahina , commissaire principal de police du commissariat central d 'antananarivo . • harvests for the main 2013 growing season are expected to be below-average , particularly harvests of rice and maize crops in the central and southern reaches of the country due to the locust presence and the cassava harvest in the south due to the poor distribution of rainfall in that area .

ang galing .

kinanta raw lahat ni martin ang mga pinasikat niya na ikinakilig ng audience na balitang hindi magulo at walang mga aligagang fans na may mga stick glow .

may napansin silang isang magandang girl na nasa bandang harapan at panay ang video .

at narinig pa raw ng katabi sa upuan ng girl na nag-i love you si martin . tisay daw ang girl , banggit ng mga nakakita .

pero wala raw umuwing hindi masaya sa napanood nilang concert ng nang-iisang concert king na produced ng viva concerts at dinirek ni rowell santiago .

i come before you to discharge a duty as old as our democracy .
at the beginning of every legislative session , alaska 's constitution requires the governor to report on the state of our state .
that is as it should be , because in our country , government reports to the people , not the other way around .
let us stand to thank our service members and veterans - all who have stood in defense of our country .
i want to honor one veteran in particular .
he was going to be with us until technical issues at the juneau airport prevented that .
an educator , a commercial fisherman , and a veteran , rod bain represents the best of alaska , and the best of america .
the question before us tonight is not : what is the state of alaska ?
the question is : how can we keep the state of alaska strong ?
to keep the state of our state strong , let us choose a future of safety and respect .
of all alaska 's natural resources , our children are unquestionably the most valuable .
so tonight , i ask you to join me in achieving a new goal .
let 's raise our graduation rate to 90 percent by 2020 .
that 's the threshold for an a grade , and that 's what we will strive to meet .
to keep the state of our state strong , let us choose a future of more oil production , not less .
to keep the state of our state strong , let us choose a future that gets our gas to alaskans first , and then to markets beyond .
there is no doubt we have come a long way toward a gasline , but we still have a long way to go .
here 's the roadmap i propose for agdc : together , in the committee process , we will ensure that agdc can commercialize alaska 's gas for the maximum benefit of all alaskans .
it means telling us the size and scope of the liquefaction plant and lng storage tanks .
it means telling us the number of off-take points to ensure that alaskans can utilize our gas for our needs .
by this spring , i call on the companies to finalize an agreement to advance into what 's known as the pre-feed stage of a gasline - that 's " pre-front-end engineering and design , " for those of us who are not engineers .
it makes no sense for alaskans and their businesses to be overtaxed , so government can be overfunded .
the future of alaska belongs to alaskans - not to washington , d.c. albanywayne walcottbelmont-sutter areainactiveboulevardinez rodriguezbrevoortpansy nettlesbrown ( reverend ) mary wilsonbrownsvillelaura morgancrown heightsdesiree greencypress hillsdwayne faisoneast new york city lineinactivefenimore-leffertsleonard jonesfiorentino plazahelen johnsonglenmore plazadelores sylvesterhope gardensgloria estradahoward avenuenaomi m. johnsonhoward avenue / park rockrose cliftonkingsboroughmichael gaineslangston hughesnewton buchnerlenox road-rockaway pkwyinactivelindencarmen wichardlong island baptist housesramona robinsonmarcus garvey ( group a ) mattie griffinocean hill apartmentsjoyce andersonocean hill-brownsvilleinactivepalmetto gardensmarguerite andersonpinkkaren caldwellprospect plazadevelopment closedralph avenue rehabyvonne arnettreid apartmentshyacinth forresterrutland towersjohn princesaratoga squarehelen purdiesaratoga villagevivian youngseth low housesreginald h. bowmantapscott street rehabinactivetildenmarie booneunity plaza ( sites 17,24,25a ) cynthia whitakervan dyke ilisa kennervan dyke iiisiah benjaminweeksville gardenscorsalia daviswoodsonwilliam diggs ready in april : an artist ’ s impression of the redevelopment of the horseshoe tavern .

the jailing of convicted cigarette smuggler malcolm mcgowan - extradited from spain - has led the hm revenue and customs to call on exptas to come forward & # 8230 ; habang pinagmamasdan ang katuksu-tuksong posisyon si aya sa pagkakahiga , naalala naman niya ang nangyari sa kanila ni julia noong ihatid niya sa tirahan nito sa sulucan .
naging mainit ang halikan nila .
natutupok na siya at tila ibig nang pawalan ang nadarama . lalo nang na ­ ging maalab ang kanyang pakiramdam nang madama ng kanyang palad ang malulusog na mga suso ni julia .
nagpapaubaya si julia .
walang pagtutol .
gustung-gusto ang ginagawa niya .
at kung walang bumato sa bintana ng bahay , baka nangyari ang hindi dapat mangyari .
maaaring naihiga niya si julia sa sopa at doon naganap ang “ binyagan ” .
salamat din at dumating ang ate ni julia .
kung walang naging hadlang , baka hindi na siya pauuwiin ni julia at maaaring sila na nga ang maging mag-asawa .
siyempre , napakialaman na niya si julia at sasabihin ng ate nito na panagutan ang ginawa rito .
mabuti na lang at walang nangyari sa kanila ni julia kundi ang paghihipuan at paghahalikan .
ang paghihipuan at paghahalikan ay karamiwan na lamang ngayon .
kung may nangyari sa kanila ni julia , kawawa naman si aya .
tiyak na iiyak si aya at kasusuklaman siya .
at kapag umiyak si aya , makokonsensiya siya .
hindi niya mapapatawad ang sarili .
sinira niya ang pagtitiwala ni aya pati na ang kay mama brenda .
ang pagkakilala pa naman sa kanya ni mama brenda ay napaka-tino .
at kung hindi si aya ang magiging kapalaran niya , wala siyang mukhang ihaharap sa mag-ina .
napansin ni sam na kumilos si aya sa pagkakahiga .
lalo pang nalislis ang manipis na pantulog .
lumantad pa ang makikinis na hita .
napakaganda ni aya !
walang kasingganda .
napakalaki ng pagkakaiba ni aya kay julia .
ang ganda ni aya ay kagalang-galang at hindi maaaring salaulain , samantalang kay julia ay maaari nang angkinin anumang oras .
kay aya pa rin siya .
pipilitin niyang iwasan at pagtaguan si julia .
tumalikod na si sam para lumabas ng bedroom ni aya .
hindi pa ngayon para sila magkasarilinan ni aya .
marami pa silang pangarap .
makapaghihintay pa naman siya .
hindi muna niya “ pakikialaman ” si aya .
makaiiwas pa siya sa tawag ng “ tukso ” .

lim goes on air , says he ’ s ’ okay ’ mayor breaks silence ; critics feast on his ’ state of health ’ community members are calling on pet owners and deniliquin council to be more vigilant in dealing with roaming and barking dogs .
the calls for greater care in controlling dogs come after a roaming dog was hit by a car in hardinge st last tuesday .
deniliquin council manager technical services mark dalzell said the dog had come under the ranger ’ s attention previously for roaming , but had ‘ ‘ unfortunately got out again ’ ’ .
mr dalzell reminded all pet owners that it is illegal for a dog to be in public without effective control .
‘ ‘ if we capture a roaming dog a second time , and the owner has already been warned , the normal process is to seize the dog and issue a nuisance dog order .
‘ ‘ we do also have the option to go down the dangerous dog path if needed .
the owner may also be fined . ’ ’
‘ ‘ i don ’ t have a dog , but i have to listen to them all the time .
‘ ‘ i put in a complaint about a barking dog and i had to do a lot of paperwork , but the ranger does nothing .
‘ ‘ in terms of barking dogs , there seems to be an expectation that we can just take the dog away .
‘ ‘ there is a path we need to take , however , and we need to make sure we follow the process .
‘ ‘ that process also allows us to notify the complainant of the progress .

4.gold dips on worries of fed paring ; oil rises on syria 15.russia , us to meet at un to set date for geneva ii peace talks : kerry 32.israel prepares for yom kippur , jewish day of atonement , when country grinds to standstill discipleship is mission .
“ mission ” happens when discipleship is faithfully pursued .
the spirit of the lord is upon me , because he has anointed me to bring good news to the poor .
he has sent me to proclaim release to the captives and recovery of sight to the blind , to let the oppressed go free , to proclaim the year of the lord ’ s favor .
( luke 4 : 18-19 ) the guiding force for mission needs to be a commitment to discipleship , to following christ , to living resurrection and proclaiming a god of life for all people in all situations , as mission can easily be manipulated by individual agendas or motivations , even within ecclesial institutions .
there is an urgent need for a lived commitment to global solidarity , an awareness of how our lifestyles and the policies of governments and other institutions create and sustain systems of injustice and violence in the world .
there is an urgency to be with millions of people nailed to human-made crosses , and imitating jesus , to be the liberating , forgiving , healing presence of our god of life .
the current world crises are christian crises , and the discipleship of baptism calls everyone to mission – to cross all sorts of boundaries and borders , comforts and conveniences in order to be a presence of resurrection amid the crosses of our time ; and , wherever possible , to dismantle the injustices that exist , furthering the experience of the fullness of the reign of god among us .
the ice sheet both transports and concentrates the meteorites as it slips off the plateaus and churns against the mountains .
the meteorites are generally found in the ' blue ice ' areas of antarctica , which are expanses of old ice kept free of snow by constant winds .
areas of sublimating ( evaporating ) ice allow the meteorites to gradually ' rise ' to the surface .
most of the fun may be in the finding , but the science is taken seriously to the point of keeping the meteorites frozen until they can be returned to a " clean lab , " where they are treated with the same care that was given to the samples returned from the moon .

" we are young ... " she exclaims with a feigned yet convincing defiance , and how right she is , or was ?
on the precipice of being considered " over the hill " and my three year anniversary blogging for huffington post , i cannot help but admit that my college tees no longer suit my frame as they once did , and that my face crinkles with the ease of perfectly pressed origami , or that a visit to my favorite barkeep merits emergen-c with a bacon egg & cheese the next morning just to shake my lethargy .
however , it 's not my physical world that i feel has come to cause me angst , it 's my supra social ( online ) ecosystem .
are we truly living for ourselves or for the benefit of the exposition , and perpetuating our audience 's own # fomo ? also is next for the three graduates of st andrew " the huffington post " is a registered trademark of thehuffingtonpost.com , inc .

if you do let things stay the way they are , so , do us all a giant favor and make some i hope that clears up some things for you and give you and understanding of why posts do not require a signature .
welcome to thewebpagefor thedepartmentof catechesis , r.c.i.a. and lay apostolate of the diocese ofduluth .
" the definitive aim of catechesis isto put people not only in touch but in communion , in intimacy , withjesus christ : only he can lead us to the love of the father in the spirit and make us share in the life of the trinity . "
( john paul ii , on catechesis in our time # 5 ) catechesis is not only for children .
it is for every human person god ever created , and will create .
the goal of catechesis is to put all people into intimate communion with jesus christ .
this means two things .
first , all catechesis is sacramental preparation .
in the eucharist we receive jesus christ , fully god and fully man , body , blood , soul and divinity .
there can be no more intimate communion with christ this side of the grave .
second , the definitive aim of catechesis is to lead people to a life of holiness in order to live in the midst of the life-giving love of the trinity for all eternity .
yes , the goal of catechesis is to be a saint .
all human persons have a right to all that god intends , and thedepartment of catechesis , r.c.i.a. and lay apostolateis dedicated to forming catechetical leaders and catechists in this mission .
catechist prayeryou , o god , are my strength , my patience , my light and my councel .
it is you who make responsive to me the students confided to my care .
abandon me not to myself for one moment .
for my own conduct and for that of my students , grant me the spirit of wisdom and understanding , the spirit of knowledge and piety , the spirit of holy fear of you , and an ardent zeal to procure your glory .
i unite my effortsto those of jesus christ , the master teacher , andi beg the most blessed virgin , st. joseph and pope st. pius x , to assist me in the exercise of my teaching ministry .
amen .
smalltownpapers - the mountaineer , big sandy montana100 000 unikátnych návštevníkov teraz.sk - novinky - tasr.sk nový spravodajský portál tlačovej agentúry slovenskej republiky teraz.sk za necelý prvý mesiac prevádzky navštívilo už viac ako 100 000 * unikátnych návštevníkov , ktorí si spolu pozreli viac ako 600 000 * stránok .
portál , ktorý odštartoval 7. marca , zverejnil zatiaľ 3 500 správ z tasr , viac ako stovku fotogalérií a verejnosti sprístupnil aj viac ako 200 videí z produkcie tasr .
generálny riaditeľ tasr jaroslav rezník je rád , že „ nový portál teraz.sk sa hneď od začiatku zaradil svojim raketovým štartom medzi relevantné spravodajské weby a potvrdilo sa , že ľudia majú záujem o rýchle a objektívne informácie , ktoré nie sú spoplatnené . “ už v apríli by mali byť k dispozícií aj aplikácie teraz.sk pre ios a android , dodal j. rezník .
tlačová agentúra slovenskej republiky je verejnoprávna , národná , nezávislá , informačná inštitúcia , ktorá poskytuje službu verejnosti v oblasti spravodajstva .
it was interesting to note that a lot of cebuanos are now wine connoisseurs .
this was attested during the wine tasting of bibendum wines at their shop in mld building along banilad row recently .
yes , in attendance were a good mix of cebu ’ s social set who are also wine lovers , enthusiasts , and collectors , as well as media and patrons of bibendum wines .
ilustračné foto foto : tasrbratislava 4. apríla ( tasr ) - portály tlačovej agentúry slovenskej republiky ( tasr ) v marci rekordne rástli .
spravodajský portál teraz.sk mal podľa štatistík google analytics 285.922 jedinečných návštevníkov , ktorí spravili 541.618 návštev a pozreli si viac ako 1,7 milióna stránok .
mobilná verzia portálu teraz.sk zaznamenala 28.305 jedinečných návštevníkov a mobilné aplikácie pre android a ios ďalších 263.451 návštev , ktoré si spolu pozreli viac ako 2,17 milióna stránok .
rástol aj portál webmagazin.sk.
kým vo februári ho navštívilo 51.608 jedinečných návštevníkov , v marci sa ich počet zvýšil na 81.255 .
podobne si polepšil aj jedinečný projekt tasr pre žiakov , študentov a učiteľov skolskyservis.sk , ktorý z februárových 19.248 jedinečných návštevníkov narástol na marcových 37.132 návštevníkov .
portály tasr zároveň koncom marca vstúpili do aim monitora , ktorý oficiálne monitoruje návštevnosť slovenských webov .
denné výsledky návštevnosti sú dostupné na online.aimmonitor.sk.
prvé mesačné výsledky návštevnosti vrátane sociodemografickej analýzy návštevníkov budú k dispozícií začiatkom mája .

malimit , naririnig kong pinag-uusapan ako ng mga kasamahan ko sa dibisyon dahil dapat daw ay sa mas bata napunta ang trabaho , hindi sa gaya ko na kung tutuusin ay hindi na ito kailangan .
gusto ko na sanang patulan pero , naisip kong hindi ako dapat na bumaba sa kanilang lebel at ipagdunggulan sa kanilang mga ilong ang katotohanan kung bakit hindi pa ako ganap na makapagretiro .
alam ng aking boss ang aking kalagayang pinansiyal .
nang sumakabilang buhay ang aking mister , malaking pera ang nagastos ko sa ospital pero hindi rin siya nailigtas sa karamdaman .
bukod pa ang pagkakautang sa casino at nakasanla naming bahay at lote .
kapag nasasaktan ako sa mga parunggit na pagkainggit ng aking katrabaho , gusto ko sanang mag-resign .
pero naiisip ko na hindi dapat iasa sa aking mga anak ang mga bayarin .
payuhan mo po ako .
dapat ba akong padala sa mga inggit at selos ng aking ka-trabaho ?
humahanga ako sa pagiging ulirang ina mo .
wala kang dapat intindihin sa mga katrabaho mo .
dahil wala sa sino man sa kanila ang makakaunawa .
wala ka rin dapat ipaliwanag .
ituon mo ang atensiyon mo sa iyong trabaho at idalangin mo silang lahat na pagpalain din gaya mo para mawala sa kanila ang inggit at selos .

bratislava 11. septembra ( tasr-ots ) - silvester krčméry bol významnou osobnosťou , ktorá sa zapíše do histórie slovenska .
aktívne sa zasadzoval za občiansku a náboženskú slobodu a rešpektovanie ľudských práv po nástupe totality .
kvôli svojmu presvedčeniu a angažovanosti bol komunistickým režimom odsúdený na 14 rokov väzenia za vlastizradu.ako podpredseda vlády som v roku 2011 navrhol prezidentovi republiky , aby udelil silvestrovi krčmérymu a jeho spolupracovníkovi vladimírovi juklovi štátne vyznamenanie a aj takto ocenil ich celoživotný prínos pre slovensko .
k štátnemu sviatku dňu vzniku sr 1. januára 2013 sa tak stalo - prezident sr udelil silvestrovi krčmérymu štátne vyznamenanie - rad ľudovíta štúra i. triedy .
v prípade v. jukla to už bolo in memoriam.ako predseda kdh som osobne viackrát navštívil silvestra krčméryho .
bol priateľom ľudí z hnutia .
v júni 2012 som mu odovzdal pamätnú medailu kdh za formovanie kresťanského vedomia a demokracie na slovensku .
silvester krčméry bol inšpiráciou pre kresťanskú demokraciu .
veľmi mu záležalo na tom , aby kresťania na slovensku boli aktívni vo verejnom živote a v politike .
bol známy svojím životným optimizmom .
okolo seba rozdával radosť a povzbudenie .
zohral veľkú úlohu pri formovaní mnohých vysokoškolákov a mladých ľudí .
bol pilierom tajnej cirkvi na slovensku .
silvester mal vždy záujem o ľudí a snažil sa im pomôcť .
silvester krčméry zanechal po sebe úctyhodné a rozsiahle dielo .
boli to nielen publikácie a svedectvá , ale hlavne služba druhým a formovanie osobnosti mladých ľudí .
mnohí , ktorí ho poznali , sa inšpirovali jeho životným príkladom .
ukázal celému slovensku , že sa netreba báť kráčať proti prúdu , že je dôležité stáť na strane pravdy , hoci to vyvoláva nenávisť a útoky od mocných tohto sveta .
pravda napokon vždy zvíťazí .
život silva krčméryho je pre nás povzbudením a inšpiráciou .
nech je jeho odchod spomedzi nás pozvaním k úcte a vďačnosti za všetky obete v zápase o slobodu a tiež k zodpovednosti za jej napĺňanie na slovensku , v spoločnej európe a vo svete .
stáť na strane života , pravdy a lásky má vždy zmysel.odkazy : http : / / www.kdh.sk / spravy / z-domova / jan-figel-navstivil-v-den-boja-za-s lobodu-demokraciu-silvestra-krcmeryho http : / / www.flickr.com / photos / krestanskodemokratickehnutie / 8196673388 / http : / / www.kdh.sk / spravy / z-domova / jan-figel-navstivil-silvestra-krcme ryhoján figeľ , predseda kdh podpredseda nr srupozornenie : upozorňujeme odberateľov , že materiály označené skratkou ots sú poskytované v rámci originálnej textovej služby a za ich obsah nesie zodpovednosť zadávateľ.lk ed when prescribed by a doctor for use at home and when provided by is covered , and whether a supplier is approved , by calling what is our resident gardener lucy hewett up to this week ?
buried in plums , we understand .

bowling first , the personalities had an early wicket when cullen pounced on the ball and ran locals batsman ben thompson out . محفوظ و متعلق به سايت کابل پرس ( افغانستان پرس ) می باشد.cart ( 0 ) bratislava 13. septembra ( tasr-ots ) - dopravný podnik bratislava sa dôrazne ohradzuje voči výrokom poslanca nr sr alojza hlinu , ktorý svojím nezodpovedným konaním a šírením nepravdivých vyjadrení môže spôsobiť vážne znepokojenie časti obyvateľstva.dpb , a. s . , nadobudol podozrenie , že verejné výstupy a výroky pána poslanca hlinu v uplynulom období môžu napĺňať znaky skutkových podstát viacerých trestných činov - trestného činu šírenia poplašnej správy a zároveň jeho ataky voči vedeniu dpb , a. s . , môžu byť posudzované ako trestný čin ohovárania.dňa 30. augusta 2013 bol zverejnený na internete videozáznam poslanca hlinu , ktorý v autobuse bratislavskej mhd cestujúcej verejnosti adresoval nasledovné vyjadrenia : " ... veziete sa v autobuse sor , ktorý vykazuje vážne konštrukčné chyby a vady , napriek tomu sa bežne používa v cestnej premávke .... sú potenciálne schopné ohroziť účastníkov ... " okrem skutočnosti , že poslanec hlina porušil prepravný poriadok , ktorý jasne v bode 8 hovorí : " cestujúci je povinný sa vo vozidle správať tak , aby svojím správaním neohrozoval bezpečnú a plynulú prepravu ostatných cestujúcich ... neobťažoval a nespôsoboval škodu ostatným cestujúcim a oprávneným osobám dopravcu .
cestujúcemu nie je dovolené najmä : a ) pôsobiť rušivo na vodiča pri výkone jeho služby , o ) ... hlučne sa správať , hrať na hudobnom nástroji alebo verejne počúvať reprodukovanú hudbu a reč a zakazuje v prostriedkoch mhd obťažovať cestujúcich reprodukovanou hudbou alebo slovom " .
zároveň menovaný poslanec nr sr nastúpil do vozidla mhd bez vedomia dopravného dispečingu dpb , ktorý v zmysle interných predpisov po dohode s vedením udelí povolenie na nakrúcanie vo vozidle mhd , ak zváži , že tým nebude cestujúcu verejnosť a vodiča obťažovať .
za najzávažnejšie a vrcholne nezodpovedné konanie poslanca nr sr však dpb , a. s . , považuje jeho výroky o konštrukčnej chybe autobusov , ktoré môžu ohroziť cestujúcu verejnosť .
tieto výroky sú absolútnym , preukázateľným klamstvom a môžu vážne znepokojiť obyvateľstvo hlavného mesta sr.konanie poslanca však týmto výstupom neskončilo a pokračoval s útokmi voči vedeniu dopravného podniku bratislava v rozhovore publikovanom v týždenníku plus 7 dní 37 / 2013 ; 11 / 09 / 2013 ; s .
28,29,30 ; autora lukáša milana s titulkom provokatér , kde poslanec nr sr hlina uviedol nasledovné : " bezprecedentne sa tu niektoré veci porušujú ... ježišmária ... tých príkladov , prečo by sa mali ľudia postaviť , je veľa .
napríklad vedenie dopravného podniku v bratislave bez problémov nechalo jazdiť nové autobusy s výrobnou chybou - praská nosná konštrukcia a chudáci opravári ich po nociach zvárajú .
normálne v zahraničí by poslali pokazené autobusy späť výrobcovi , nech to opraví , žiadali o náhradu škody a nedovolil by si ich pustiť do prevádzky .
autobus predsa nie je bránka na maštali .
za všeobecné ohrozenie a hazard s ľuďmi by mal ísť niekto do basy .
a tu ?
nič sa nedeje , všetko je v poriadku ... " dopravný podnik bratislava vyhlasuje , že všetky výroky poslanca hlinu týkajúce sa konštrukcií autobusov sor sú nepravdivé s cieľom znepokojiť cestujúcu verejnosť .
zároveň vyjadrujeme názor , že poslanec hlina si takýmto konaním zabezpečuje účelovú politickú kampaň na zviditeľnenie svojej osoby .
nestalo sa tak prvýkrát , čo sa snažil diskreditovať vedenie dpb a takéto konanie z jeho strany považujeme za nekorektné a obzvlášť nebezpečné.autobusy , ktorým podľa jeho vyjadrení praská nosná konštrukcia sú bezpečné a v dpb sa nepotvrdil ani jediný prípad prasknutej konštrukcie .
rovnako nepravdivé je jeho tvrdenie , že by sa autobusy mali vrátiť späť výrobcovi , aby ich opravil na vlastné náklady .
výrobca preventívne zabezpečil zvolávaciu akciu a na vlastné náklady realizujú výstuž konštrukcie , ktorá však na slovensku nevykazovala žiadne chyby .
výrobca tak koná na základe skúseností v prahe a dpb to považuje za znak zodpovedného konania , aby sa podobným situáciám predišlo aj v iných mestách .
zvolávacia akcia je štandardným procesom u ktoréhokoľvek výrobcu a je vizitkou zodpovedného výrobcu .
potvrdzuje to aj vyjadrenie zástupcu výrobcu ing .
jindřicha chudého spoločnosti sor libchavy : " dopravní podnik bratislava , a.s. , k dnešnímu dni provozuje celkem 100 autobusů nb 18 a více jak 95 autobusů typu bn 10,5 , bn 9,5 , b 9,5 a c 10,5 .
první dodávky autobusů se uskutečnily již v roce 2000 a za tuto dobu nebyly řešeny žádné závažné reklamace .
provoz autobusů v podmínkách dp bratislava , a.s. , patří k nejnáročnějším a vyžaduje neustálou pozornost jak ze strany dpb , tak i ze strany dodavatelů dopravní techniky.sor se vždy snaží zkušenosti z provozu v takto těžkých podmínkách promítat nejen do konstrukce nových vozů , ale také na vozy již v provozu s cílem bezproblémové a dlouhodobé životnosti .
současně je třeba podotknout , že autobusy nb 18 dodané 5 / 2010 mají každý najetý cca 200 tis. km , autobusy dodané 11 / 2010 cca 170 tis. km a autobusy dodané 4 / 2012 mají najeto přes 80 tis. km .
v městském provozu se jedná o nadstandardní výkon , což nám potvrzuje správnost výše zmiňovaných přijatých opatření.prováděné úpravy se týkají především doplňováním výztuh v oblasti dveří a spojovacího kloubu , kde by vlivem dlouhodobého těžkého provozu mohlo dojít k únavě materiálu některých částí .
v žádném případě nemůže dojít k ohrožení bezpečnosti provozu ani cestujících .
technický stav autobusů sor je trvale monitorován našim technikem , který provádí pravidelné kontroly .
v případě jakéhokoli zjištění je vše ihned odstraňováno pracovníky společnosti sor .
všechny náklady s tímto spojené jsou hrazeny naší firmou , a to i u vozů mimo záruku . " dpb v súvislosti s konaním poslanca nr sr alojza hlinu podniká právne kroky vo veci podania , či nebol spáchaný trestný čin ohovárania a šírenia poplašnej správy .
zároveň poslanca vyzýva , aby nespôsoboval paniku medzi obyvateľstvom hlavného mesta sr a takýmto nedôstojným a zavádzajúcim spôsobom nezviditeľňoval svoju osobu.upozornenie : upozorňujeme odberateľov , že materiály označené skratkou ots sú poskytované v rámci originálnej textovej služby a za ich obsah nesie zodpovednosť zadávateľ.mš " a judgment of god and also a judgment of history upon our actions are inescapable , " he said .
but the pope insisted that " never has the use of violence brought peace in its wake .
war begets war , violence begets violence . "

this new frontier had mawson in its spell and he knew he had to return .
mawson was near death - his feet were bloody , his skin was falling away and he had lost a lot of weight .

tirso “ the mananagat ” lapinig is one of the small fishermen in barangay puerto here .
he is a father of three , and a good husband to her beautiful wife , edith lapinig .
he has been a fisherman for around fifteen years , and he feeds his family through his catch .
“ the sea is my home , and the sea is at home with me , ” he said after sharing a story about fish sanctuaries and how he guards them .
aware of the dangers he is about to endure , and with hopes of a bountiful catch so he can put something on the table the next day , he paddles hard together with the other fishermen toward the seemingly familiar but life-threatening waters .
“ naa gyud panahon nga zero gyud kung mamasol ka og gabie ... luoy kaayo ang panginabuhi , ( there are times when we can ’ t catch anything , ” said tirso .
tirso ’ s buddy wilmer sambaan is also a hardworking fisherman from bonbon .
but amid his efforts , he can barely provide for his family ’ s needs .
“ kung naa pud na sila dili nami makakuha ... sa ako lang makakuha rako og isa ka gallon ( if the commercial fishing vessels are around i can only catch one gallon , ” said julito casilac , a fisherman also from barangay puerto .
the glimmer of the waters going out to the seas as the high tide ebbs , and the slow constant rush of small waves rock antonio ’ s pump boat swaying with the motion of the sea .
that “ nothing ” is the fish locally known as sardines or tamban in the local dialect .
most of them depend on catching tamban in the bay .
it also causes , at times , the high cost of tamban which is supposed to be very affordable , “ when the tamban have all been fished by the trawlers , the price can go as high as 80 pesos per kilogram , “ when the trawlers harvest them , it can dip as low as 20 pesos per kilo , ” another fisherman explained .
one of the culprits why wilmer and the rest of the fishermen could not catch anything is the commercial fishing in municipal waters that has been going without letup on for the last six years .
“ daghan kaayo na sila commercial fishing boats ... dili lang na isa tapos mag balik-balik na sila hangtod nga halos mahurot na ang isda ( there are a lot of commercial fishing vessels ... and they would repeatedly hoard the fishes until almost nothing is left , ” said wilmer .
this unfair competition from big trawlers not only tramples the rights of the fisherfolk but also violates the catch ceilings clause of the ra 8550 .
but the fisherfolk argued that it is not “ stealing ” because the fishes inside municipal waters should be for them and not for the commercial fishers based on the fisheries code .
“ kanang lucy nga commercial fishing vessel mao na ang kusog mamusil .
ang kanang digs mao na ang kusog mamangga ( the commercial vessel lucy is responsible for the shooting .
digs is responsible for running over the fisherfolks ’ boats ) , ” said wilmer .
“ nanglutaw gyud na silang tonyo ba kuyog ang katong taga jasaan pagka-tunga sa ilang bangka ( tonyo and his companions floated in the water after their boat was wrecked into half ) , ” wilmer said .
“ paghuman atong dialogue ang among hangyo gyud nga ipatuman ang ra 8550 , ” said wilmer .

registrationproducts and services requiring paymenthow we gather information from youcookiesweb beaconssharinglegal disclaimeraggregate informationthird parties may receive or collect information through ibdibd forumscommunication via emailsubscribing to and unsubscribing from emailsupplementation of information with affiliatessite and service updatessecurityphishingcorrection / updating personal informationpersonal information you disclosechildrenchanges to our privacy policy web beacons , also called web bugs and clear gifs are used in combination with cookies to help us understand the behavior of our customers .
a web beacon is typically a transparent graphic image that is placed on our site or in an email .
the use of a web beacon allows ibd to record the simple actions of the user opening the page that contains the beacon .
this privacy policy covers the use of cookies by ibd and its affiliates only and does not cover the use of cookies by any advertisers orthird party partners who help us serve ads ..
if you have any questions about the security at our web site , you can contact us at www.askibd.com.
